author: {'steamid': '76561198208231989', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 446, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 446, 'last_played': 1711155556}
review:
I have been going through my tamagotchi renaissance, but as an adult with a job it's hard to constantly be on top of them real time. Someone on reddit recommended the Princess Maker series, and I can't believe I've never heard of it before! I would have lost my life to this game as a kid. I see a lot of nostalgia in the comments, for good reason, but for the noobies like me I'd say it definitely scratches the tama itch. 

The premise is you play as a girl's adopted father and it's your job to raise her. Depending on the jobs she does and the classes she take, different stats will go up and down. Every activity contributes to her stress, which you have to manage to keep her working/studying effectively. Depending on all these factors, your daughter can grow up to be anything from a princess, to an adventurer, to a woman of ill-repute ;) I haven't discovered even a fraction of the endings, but I heard there's something like 70 different outcomes. WOW! 

My one con is it really throws you into the game with no tutorial and no in game guide. I definitely watched a couple videos and pulled up some guides, which is essential to even understand the basic mechanics.  I've got around 15 hrs of play time, about half on the DOS and the rest on the Refined version (it works amazingly on the Steam Deck). The graphics are great in both versions, I suppose it's up to preference, but without any doubt the unofficial DOS translation is better. The Refined translation is fine, but it's lacking "refinement" so to speak. You can tell they didn't get a native-english speaking translator. The voice acting is lovely, but after the hundredth time speeding through your duties you're really not taking notice. 

As far as the censorship issue, the nudity is basically equivalent to those embarrassing bathtub photos as a kid, and a rather groomer-y ending where you (as the father) end up marrying your daughter. Personally, I think the patch should be optional, something you can toggle on and off in the menu or something. Either way it's easy to find and install the uncensored patch if you want the full game, even on the steam deck. I also wish you could toggle between the original and refined graphics, I do love them both but I prefer to play on my steam deck. It's the perfect cozy game to play on the couch or in bed. 

I'm excited for the new remake, I hope the translation is better and that they add a couple qol features. For example, I can never tell when my daughter is overweight because the change in the character sprite is so subtle. A little pop up or icon would be nice, or even a mark on the stats page that shows that border. Being able to change between Metric and Imperial would be nice, as an American I always have to do some mental math to figure out what 45 kg is, and even then I don't know what's considered a "healthy" weight for a 13 yr old girl by 1993 japanese standards. My first run I apparently had a chunker, even though she's cute and not particularly overweight in the character art. Woops. 

As far as the price... 20 dollars for a 30 year old game you can find for free online (with a better translation) is certainly a choice... as much as I love the game, wait for a sale. I picked it up a couple of weeks ago for 10 bucks, which I believe is a much fairer price.

review:
I love the game, it's quite fun to get to explore everything the game has to offer and get a look at the many different endings for your daughter. And it's also a lot shorter than princess maker 3 and 5 with a speed up option.

However, i do NOT recommend the game for achievement hunters, it's possible to get all the achievements, but it will literally take forever, as each ending is an achievement. And some endings are REALLY difficult to get.

author: {'steamid': '76561198815949380', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 15048, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13753, 'last_played': 1707218447}
review:
中文翻譯不是很優，像是武術修練過程中，皇家守衛說「小姐，需要跑腿嗎？」但原文只是「小姐午安」，提早返家後「剩下的幾天，主角都在家中渡過」這句子裡天數跟主角名就錯置。豐收季的「頒」獎典禮，最後感謝詞的「感謝父親的尊尊教誨」應為諄諄教誨。
但是，有繁體中文，可以鍵盤控制，這已經可以無條件直衝１００分了，祝福重繪版順利出場。

author: {'steamid': '76561198113098229', 'num_games_owned': 1154, 'num_reviews': 132, 'playtime_forever': 355, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 150, 'last_played': 1703645577}
review:
i debated on buying this for a long time, i had thought that the $20 price tag wasn't worth what is essentially an abandonware game and a game you can play for free in your browser. 
originally i played this through dosbox, and in my honest opinion:
princess maker 2 refine is ultimately the "better" version of the game. it should be said that while the visuals are "improved" (they're no longer pixel sprites) and the ease of saving, controlling, and more are there. as well as a dedicated english translation that previously was cancelled in 1993~ meaning that you don't have to apply any translation patches to the japanese retail or anything and this game works straight out of the box. however, there's no way to change the resolution??? i think that's probably the biggest thing that this enhanced version gets a bit wrong.
for the sale price of $10, i think it's very worth it, but for $20? ehh maybe if you REALLY loved princess maker 2.

author: {'steamid': '76561198282428974', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 273, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 273, 'last_played': 1625251112}

author: {'steamid': '76561198083478122', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 293, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 293, 'last_played': 1676858500}
review:
I love raising simulators. The points go up, the character does a little dance, people die, everyone's happy. This is the grand-mac-daddy of them all, even if it is the second in a series. 

Child labor gets a bad rap these days but Princess Maker 2 proves it's not only a great way to earn cash but also a great way to build stats and kill God. If you want to raise a daughter lovingly for eight years, watch her grow and blossom, hold her hand through good times and bad, and have her marry and then kill the Devil, this is your game.

Just don't be creepy.

You know what I mean.

I'm talking to you.

author: {'steamid': '76561199586670777', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 414, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 244, 'last_played': 1703254584}

author: {'steamid': '76561198357547502', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 8196, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8196, 'last_played': 1677277703}
review:
I adore this game, I didn't play it in the time of its initial release sadly as I'm sure I would have adored this as a child however even playing it as an adult decades later it stands up. Its simple and yet so detailed with so many possibilities and endings. I've played this for so many hours and gotten so many achievements but I still keep coming back its such a classic. Very much worth your money as long as you don't mind the outdated graphics personally though I think they are easy to ignore and even have their own 90s anime charm to it

10/10 Please give this game chance

author: {'steamid': '76561198064385637', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 1539, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 897, 'last_played': 1702129645}
review:
まずWin10でプレイする場合はIMEの設定を、以前のバージョンのMicrosoft IMEを使う、に設定しないと途中動かなくなる不具合があるみたいですね。ここは気を付けてください。


ニコニコでとある教授の動画を見てプレイして見たけど結構面白かったです。ただUIが古臭いので結構操作が面倒なところは確かにあります。一応文字送りの速さとかは表示の所の設定で、早いとかウエイト無しにすればだいぶ快適になりました（ただウエイト無しは最速ではあるけどアルバイトの結果が吹っ飛ぶので使い分けは必要）。プレイする上で初回以降はWIKIは見た方が良いと思います。自分も今3週目プレイなんですがこのゲームは娘の将来の職業がかなり多いみたいなのでただ単にステータスを高める効率プレイだけでは望んだエンディングに辿り着け無さそうです。ただそうは言っても娘がすくすく成長していくのをみる効率プレイもなんか楽しいので、不自由な所あるけど総合的に面白いゲームだと思います。あとなんか娘に情が湧くので悪いエンディングに行かせたくないから実績埋めるのはあきらめました。


追記　武者修行で敵を倒してお金稼ぎする場合は、このゲーム別に娘を動かさなくてもエンカウントするみたいで、目的の敵が出る場所で放置してれば敵が勝手に出てくるみたいです。

author: {'steamid': '76561198059571565', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 587, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 277, 'last_played': 1706733629}
review: Fun simulator, I think I've played a bit more off of steam. The fun int really in raising the kid, its the weird, soothing sensation of managing everything and watching it play out. Number go up, monkey brain happy. It's also pretty interesting to see all the divergent pathways in the game and it has a sort of charm too it. I was pleasantly surprised by the voice acting, it's nothing special, but it's nice that it's there for such an old item.

author: {'steamid': '76561198078316471', 'num_games_owned': 310, 'num_reviews': 195, 'playtime_forever': 1083, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1083, 'last_played': 1649462127}
review:
Досить добрий, хоча і старий, симулятор виховання. Відносно багато персонажів, видів діяльності та кінцівок. Після 1-2 проходжень раджу звернутися до вікі по цікавинки. Шкода що пізніші проекти серіі виявилися менш популярними. Якщо вас таке приваблює, можу порадити сучасний аналог цієї гри - Volcano Princess.
8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198354378792', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 120, 'playtime_forever': 648, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 164, 'last_played': 1694566146}
review:
>buy this game with the sole intent of making my daughter as much of a sinful miscreant as possible
>be the absolute worst dad I can, send her to work every day and put her in bad situations the instant they get presented to me
>through accident or by chance, she ends up getting pretty good at hairdressing
>keep doing that because she's making a lot of money
>she keeps running away, need to try and keep her happy so she stays and makes me more money
>she finally likes me and doesn't run away as much
>she finally becomes an adult and can't find a husband because of how socially inept I've made her
>but she's the greatest hairdresser in the entire land
>has a successful career doing hair full time
>writes me a letter thanking me for all I've done and how I enabled her to be a successful woman
>i feel... emotion?

greatest game of all time

review: I enjoy the game for how much freedom you are given in raising your daughter, how well the game builds a memorable and interesting setting, and the game's ability to make you feel emotionally attached to your daughter.  However, I will concede that the game is a bit confusing and overwhelming at first, and it will take some learning to fully get what it's all about.

author: {'steamid': '76561198094719591', 'num_games_owned': 109, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 724, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 523, 'last_played': 1692351149}
review:
小時候第一款美少女夢工廠遊戲！真的相當懷念～
玩了這麼多代還是最喜歡這代畫風～
可惜BUG實在太多，光是按鍵盤會造成視窗當機就很無言了.....
建議遊玩時全程都用滑鼠就好，避免不知名的錯誤。

author: {'steamid': '76561198850233613', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 654, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 654, 'last_played': 1689387727}
review:
有配音是亮点，且可以直接切换MIDI 和 WAV 音源
缺点删除了神秘商店，好像也删除了旧版一些旅行时的图，全屏并非固定原始比例，
会导致人物看起来扁扁的，因此正常比例只能窗口模式，但这样在4K屏显示器里就1/4的窗口，
玩起来有点影响沉浸感 - - 不过也适合边看攻略边玩

情怀向作品吧，补票和不想折腾模拟器可以入，建议打折期间入手，
另DLC 4个文件夹是不同版本的音频，
PC98  DOS  FM-TOWNS  Refine ，这些老bgm有种独特的感觉

review:
I have played this game on and off for YEARS now and I bought it to try to get one of the A tier endings that I never have.

I am sad that the cheat store isn't available, but considering there was a "nude" option, I know why it went away.
You want to work for your success? Get this game.
You get frustrated at seemingly arbitrary rules?  Run like hell.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031580559', 'num_games_owned': 631, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 597, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 494, 'last_played': 1682910749}
review:
I genuinely love playing this game and have grown SO attached to this fictional child lmao. I'll try to list things in a set of pros and cons.

[h2]PROS[/h2]
[list]
[*]Fun music- It's not the most LEGENDARY music by any means, but it's not music I've gotten tired of after 8 hours of it. 

[*]Straightforward gameplay- I say this with a caveat. I had to look up a LOT of information about the stats, classes, and jobs, because the game really doesn't tell you about any of them. Once you pick up on it though, even if you've messed up, you've got LOADS of time to really get into a decent ending, I think. I haven't finished it yet, but I don't see myself getting a terrible ending at all. My daughter is behaved, well taken care of, and I'm starting to try to figure out what stats I should actually work on because I've maxed out the ones I cared about the most, despite never having played a game like this in the series. I haven't looked up TOO much information, either- I tried to avoid spoilers and figure things out on my own, at least until I realized I still had no idea what was going on and finally looked it up.

[*]She feels like she has personality- I honestly do feel like my decisions for her have changed how she behaves, how she thinks, what things she'll say, and what she interacts with. It's kind of exciting to see how the world responds to the fact that she has SUPER high combat skill.

[*]Replayability is very high- DEFINITELY on this point. I learned about a few things much later, and while I don't think I could push her down a path of delinquency, I do want to see what it would be like to try with actual knowledge of how to do so to make her a Princess- you know, achieve the titular achievement, lol.

[*]Fun things to discover- This part is definitely true. Some things, I can't imagine you'd discover without sheer coincidence level of luck, because without certain skills/stats being SUPER SUPER high (like over 100), you'd just... never even know that event existed. Some things I stumbled across online, so without reading too deeply, I went to investigate once I could to figure out what it was.

[*]I actually like the overworld battles. That's it, that's the point, lol. There's like an RPG element to this. It can be kind of repetitive, grindy, and unattractive, but it still feels really cool.

[*]Strategy- I love that even on my first playthrough, I'm strategzing all the time. I still don't know EVERYTHING about the game, even after she's gone from age 10 to 16, but I really have realized that it's pretty dang forgiving. You don't need to win everything, you don't need to succeed right off the bat, you can be pretty flat broke for a while and just have her farming for like three months to cover lessons and STILL do really well overall. It's pretty rad.
[/list]

[h2]NEITHER A PRO NOR A CON[/h2]
[list]
[*]Iffy translation- I don't know that I'd say it's as bad as other people are toting it to be. I'm pretty picky and judgy when it comes to translations, but this is honestly above average. It's not terrible. There are some goofy translations- like winning a battle will say "Your daughter was beaten by enemy!" Even though you won. It still calculates right, lol, but it's just funny.

[*]Some of the achievements have activated despite my not actually doing them. Like I think I was informed I got an achievement for giving a demon trinket to a demon, but I didn't even OWN the achievement, which was interesting. 
[/list]

[h2]CON[/h2]
[list]
[*][b]You can marry your daughter.[/b] That's a whole a$$ con right there. I hate that that exists in the game, and I hate the fact that there's a LOT of art that makes it REALLY OBVIOUS that it's an option. You take your daughter to the beach, and get rewarded with a still of her with no clothes swimming in the water at age 16, or a SUPER sheer t-shirt and suggestive pose at age I think 14. I'm not even gunning for that ending, but I'm still getting these really awkward cut scenes in what should be super innocent cut scenes. Seriously???? SERIOUSLY????? I hate this. It's the BIGGEST black spot for me in a game I'm otherwise really obsessed with.
[/list]

[h2]SUMMARY[/h2]
You can definitely see the disparity here lol, a lot of pros and one REALLY big con. That con bothers me so much... I know it's not a GOOD ending, but the art itself also makes me feel so sleezy. I'm supposed to be playing as her dad, you know? I know the point is that I can choose to be a terrible dad, but man, the ART is what makes it so awkward, because I'm stuck with that art even when I'm not gunning for it. We don't even have a high enough relationship stat for her to celebrate my birthday lmao.

All in all, it's probably still one of my favorite games. I just wish you could have the NOT art that comes with what should be completely innocent cut scenes.

author: {'steamid': '76561198023709147', 'num_games_owned': 635, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 871, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 871, 'last_played': 1676687537}
review:
If there’s one game that you’ll never play solely because of the name, it’s probably this one. You might be shocked to find out that this isn’t a kids game where you play dress up with princesses. Instead you play as a renowned warrior who is tasked by a god to become a parental figure for a ‘starchild’ who you must raise from the ages of 10 to 18.

Every in-game year you will receive a stipend which you can spend how you see fit, such as enrolling your daughter in specialist classes, buying her new clothing/presents, change her dietary plan, or to give as an allowance. At the start of each month you set a schedule of activities for her, these can be classes, part-time jobs, resting, or a vacation. As she does classes/jobs you will see short animations of her succeeding or failing at that activity, her performance dictating how much her stats improve and how much she gets paid. It’s not all easy though as classes are expensive and overworking your daughter causes her to fall ill from stress, but it also increases her resentment towards you which can cause a whole mess of problems to occur; she will purposely slack off at work, run away for weeks at a time, go shopping by herself and waste your money, and she may join a gang which can result in her being arrested.

Despite what the name would have you believe, you’re not raising your daughter to specifically become a princess, though you can if you want to. What she grows up to be is dependent on the skills, stats, and relationships that she developed as she grew up, which will determine the ending you get. She can grow up to become anything from a lowly maid to the new ruling queen. There are even a bunch of “sinful” endings that can occur if your daughter grows up to be a bad person. There are actually 74 endings, and thankfully the game developers played it smart by not having 73 bad endings and 1 true ending. Every ending is unique and is given its own epilogue and artwork, meaning the true ending can be whatever you want it to be. Whatever ending you get, the god that gave you this task will return to grade you based on certain factors, such as how well you raised your daughter and the type of person she grew up to be. There is an unintentionally hilarious side of this if you do badly as the god who tasked you with raising the perfect daughter chastises you and calls you a terrible parent because she grew up to become a bandit, for example.

A playthrough of this game will take probably anywhere from 3-10 hours. If you keep schedules limited to things like classes, jobs, and resting you can get through this game in 3 to 4 hours. The time required for a playthrough encroaches on double digits once you start doing ‘errantry’. Errantry has you send your daughter out to nearby lands where she can explore for treasures, fight monsters, meet characters, and follow questlines. The catch? You’re playing as her in a sort of top-down lite JRPG sequence akin to classic Dragon Quest. There are four locations to pick from with each having its own degree of difficulty. You can rest easy knowing that she can’t die when doing errantry as when her HP reaches 0 your demon butler swoops in and saves her, though she will have to spend any remaining time recovering at home, resulting in wasted days. The stats that your daughter raises through jobs and classes determine her errantry stats, so if you find yourself getting destroyed in the first area by basic enemies it’s a sign that she needs more training. If this aspect of the game doesn’t sound interesting there’s nothing forcing you to do it as it’s only really required when you are raising her to be a fighter or a magic user.

Though this is a raising sim, consider the fact that for roughly 95% of the game you will be staring at either a calendar or a JRPG overworld and you can see why this game might be boring or tedious, and though there are options to up the game’s speed, that only helps so much. What you are playing for is that remaining 5% - to see what ending you get. And in that regard there is fun to be had from playing the game blind and seeing how well you can do, and then taking what you learned into a second playthrough to see if you can do better. If you’re the type of person who favours a ‘one and done’ type game then it’s probably best to give this one a pass. If, however, you’re the type of person who likes to replay games to see as much of its content as possible whilst working things out on your own and seeing the impact your choices have then this might be worth a look.

author: {'steamid': '76561198342052841', 'num_games_owned': 242, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 4043, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2081, 'last_played': 1709821290}
review: Princess Maker 2 has easily become one of my favorite games to replay. There is a vast amount of content throughout each different route and ending you choose, on top of charming animations and details for every little thing you can interact with. There is also a wholly competent errantry system that is a lot of fun to explore and complete. However, the only thing stopping this game from perfection is some of the unsavory content, specifically [spoiler]a couple of endings and drawings[/spoiler]. This game has not aged the best in regards to the multiple unnecessary [spoiler]half-naked portraits of your daughter[/spoiler]. Not to mention the few endings that are basically just [spoiler]manipulation or grooming[/spoiler]. If you can look past this however, (or just steer clear of these endings entirely), I think you will have a wonderful time with this game. Most of the class related and work related endings are completely free of those negative issues making them a very easy choice to go for. Plus the games' "true" ending is also free from those issues. With all of that in mind, this isn't an easy game to recommend, and it's certainly not for everyone, but I think if it sounds interesting to you and you're willing to give it a try, you will have a very enjoyable time with Princess Maker 2.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026852317', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 829, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 825, 'last_played': 1681179066}
review:
The Bad
-the translation is pretty awful (but funny at times)
-At lot of stats are confusing or unclear. You'll pretty much need the wiki to make meaningful progress
-the gender politics are extremely outdated and somewhat creepy
-controls for the Errantry sections are trash. navigating menus can be rough as well

The Good
-Tons of endings 
-Build your princess for a number of roles
-The art is pretty wonderful and varied

Recommended for a certain taste, all others may want to look up reviews first.

review:
Pretty fun game, addictive, the hardest part is starting out since you don't know how to plan out you're daughter's schedule, it's an old game, but pleasing enough to play. The graphics and music are both fine, and there's a plethora of endings you can get at the end of the game.

I do recommend reading a guide or viewing some tips before starting the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198215146027', 'num_games_owned': 136, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1157, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1114, 'last_played': 1710296273}
review:
In one playthrough, you can get your daughter famous as a hero who fights monsters just like her father.
In the next, she can join a gang and get arrested.
There's so many different ways to raise your daughter and it's reflected in the large amount of endings you can get, and you can get good and bad versions of each ending too. 
The art is charming, gameplay is simple but understandable. It's a really good remake and I highly recommend anyone play it if you like management style games and cute girls.

author: {'steamid': '76561198383107203', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 763, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 763, 'last_played': 1673193130}
review:
为什么我一个拯救了王国的大英雄一年工资只有500？？？连一年吃饭的钱都不够，还要我几岁的女儿去打工
因为太穷了把比武大赛赢的剑卖了国王还要指责我扣我声望值？？？他不应该反省一下自己钱是不是给的太少了吗？
一开始想好好培养女儿稍微赚点儿钱就送她去上课，没怎么让她好好玩过。几周目之后学会打怪刷钱了天天带她出去旅游，结果才发现如果好感度够高女儿是会给我过生日的……
还有，不要像我一样为了减肥扣女儿餐饮费，体力值会狂掉。每年夏天带她多去海边旅游几次体重就下去了

author: {'steamid': '76561199228580830', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1058, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 870, 'last_played': 1678743711}
review:
15시간 동안 진짜 아버지가 된 느낌을 받았습니다. 현실처럼 선택지에서 비롯되는 다양한 영향. 
그리고 디테일하게 바뀌는 사소한 것들이 몰입감을 늘려줍니다. 
그리고 마지막에 나의 선택으로 인해 만들어진 자식의 미래를 보고 있자니, 그리고 떠나보내자니... 
정말 부모가 된 기분이 들더라고요. 근데 스킵, 빨리감기. 이런 편의성이 추가되면 더 좋을듯. 근데 엄청 예전 게임이니까 이해는 합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198896103185', 'num_games_owned': 109, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 603, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 136, 'playtime_at_review': 466, 'last_played': 1712384490}
review:
这部最大的问题就是平衡性做的太差了，进不进战斗系统真是2个游戏。不进结束的很快也摸不到好结局，进了一把漫长得想吐。
靠刷怪赚钱太耗时间了，报酬太高了，以及其他工作收入低得可怜。
但refine画风比绮丽好看，适当的dos风看着很舒服。并且相比绮丽版删掉了部分福利，剪了一些福利画面，个人而言玩起来清爽了不少。
无恶行BUG，买了即可直接玩，不需要调兼容性。

author: {'steamid': '76561199014084999', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 372, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 372, 'last_played': 1672410336}
review:
This is that one game where it looks boring asf through gameplay but you actually play it and its very entertaining

obviously not a whole lot of gameplay 
you just click around and do stuff thats about it 

if youre in dire need for a time killer then this is it. There's no amazing gameplay or amazing lore or whatever but it does have the addictive element of making the player want to take care of the girl more and get a cool ending or whatever 

I personally have a soft side for it because I've watched a gameplay of it before when I was very little

graphics are cute :D they give super retro vibes and the art style is like old anime kinda style 

super cuteee although the game intrinsically just has a lot of misogynistic texts LMFAO 
just take it with a grain of salt bc its an old game tho (at least its funny)

also there are slightly concerning routes you can take within the game which one of them I believe is like marrying your daughter

as long as you don't touch the routes you should be good!!

overall super cute I'd prob give it like idk 7.5/10?

review:
手軽に遊べて奥が深い子育てゲーの名作。
パラメーターによっては戦いの道に進むものもあれば料理を極めるものもある。
あるパラメーターが高いと家出することも…
竜族との異種族結婚やはたまた自分の娘が魔王になったりと色んなEDがあったりする。
ちなみに花嫁修業（○ート）とかあんまり良くない職に就かせてしまうとお前人の子をこんな風にしてしまうとは…とか小言を言われる
小言を言われないようにしっかりと父親を演じて、良い職に就かせてあげよう。娘との関係が良ければ娘と結婚もワンチャンあるぞ！

author: {'steamid': '76561198140689689', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 2035, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2035, 'last_played': 1670987057}
review:
I really want to love this game - but the poor translation is difficult to overlook. Example: my daughter won various rounds in the combat tournament and the game text informs me that she lost when she clearly did not.

It would have been great to have included achievements for all of the endings. 

The teeny tiny game window isn't awesome either - it makes for a frustrating experience when playing. The ability to adjust the resolution would be appreciated but does not seem possible as this is an older game.

When you complete the game there is a letter from your daughter and sadly I've never been able to read it as the text speeds through making it impossible to see what she's said. It's the end of the game and you'd like to know what she had to say about your parenting skills, not just what the deity thinks.

I'd wait for this game to go on sale and buy it with low expectations. The actual game play is enjoyable but with these oversights to detail and translation I can't recommend paying full price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198387305610', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 97, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1669707599}
review:
추천에서 비추천으로 돌아섬.
고전은 고전. 불친절하고 단순하며 노가다의 색이 짙음.
똑같은 반복 리액션 지루하고 빨리감기도 안되고 잠오고 끝내 머리까지 아파짐.
무엇보다 모처럼 휴일이 아깝게 느껴짐. 내 시간을 이 게임에 주기 싫어짐.
1시간 30했다고 나오는데 환불요청하니까 2시간 했다고 뜨네.. 환불 되려나 모르겠다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198423879017', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 207, 'playtime_forever': 453, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 453, 'last_played': 1669380562}
review:
고전이자 메이커 게임의 원조임에도 가장 완벽한 게임.

혹시라도 안해봤을 유저들을 위해 간단한 팁을 주자면,
시작 후 스트레스로 인한 불량화나 질병을 막기 위해
아르바이트 - 성당과 목장을 돌리며 용돈과 시집으로 스트레스를 해소하라.
스트레스가 어느정도 쌓여도 감당할 체력과 도덕이 뒷받침되면, 그 이후 님들 하고 싶은거 하면 됨

author: {'steamid': '76561198260862544', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 163, 'playtime_forever': 2082, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 960, 'last_played': 1669701128}
review:
育成ADVの金字塔、プリメシリーズでも、特にファンが多い作品。
娘を10歳から、1ヶ月3行動(王国祭開催月は王国祭のみ)で、8年間育てる→（3×11＋1）×8＝34×8＝256回のスケジューリングを行う。
武者修行を行うと、フィールドワークに出て魔物と戦闘したり宝箱を拾ったりできるという、若干のRPG要素もある。
スケジュールやイベントで、娘のステータスが変動し、8年後のステータスやフラグ状態で、EDが決定する。
古い作品であるものの、メッセージの瞬間表示もあるので、コンスタントに遊べる。
[b]メッセージログがシステム的に存在しない[/b]事のみ留意。
あと、[b]イベントで娘や人外キャラのおっぱいが、けっこう拝める[/b]。

クッキークリッカーの何が面白いのか。それは[b]数字が増えると嬉しいのだ[/b]。
タイムアタックで何秒縮めたり。ハイスコア狙いで稼ぐ方法を考えたり。
乱数で高ダメージが出たり。ゲーマーは数値1つで一喜一憂する。

[b]この手の育成ゲームのデキが悪いものは、ただ効率のいいコマンドを選び続けるだけで、本当に作業的・ワンパターン[/b]である。
しかしプリメ2では通常のスケジュール以外のイベントもあるので、ただ同じコマンドを選び続けるだけでは、最大効率にはならないステータスが多い。
何より極端にステータスを高めると、狙いのEDに到達しなくなるという構造から、ただ多様なステータスを上げるのではなく管理能力も求められる。

基本的にオススメのゲームだが、[b]膨大なED1件1件が実績として実装されてしまっているので、実績全開放を狙うのはかなりしっかりと取り組む必要がる[/b]。
さすがにそれはやりすぎなので、特に職業系のEDは1つにまとまっていてもよかったと思う。
あと、[b]実績達成の判定が不安定で、筆者のデータではゲームクリア済にもかかわらず、12歳になった時の実績が達成されていない[/b]のは特筆。

review:
그야말로 고전 게임 중 수작.
사고를 유연하게 가질 수록 딸을 얼마나 더 훌륭하게 키울 것인가가 정해짐.
참고로 저는 여왕 즉위, 왕자와의 결혼, 모든 평가 500 넘겼음.
모든 평가 600 넘기는 분들도 계시리라 추정함.
어쨌든 굉장히 재밌는 게임.

author: {'steamid': '76561198885521918', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3150, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 237, 'last_played': 1669165747}
review:
Princess Maker 2 is unique. It was made in 1993, and it's close to a bishoujo game where you romance female characters, which means there's some risque stuff here, to say the least, but there is just nothing else like this game. I especially like the endings in Princess Maker 2, where your daughter reads a letter to you about the time she spent with you. I also love the detailed descriptions of how she did at the job she chose when she grew up. It makes for a very satisfying ending. I love how there are so many different things that our daughters can be! This kid does it all!

If anyone reading this is struggling, constantly running away means that her sensitivity is higher than everything else and you should change that. Delinquency means her morals and faith are too low, or her stress is too high.

author: {'steamid': '76561198220594051', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3864, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3863, 'last_played': 1664726481}
review:
Eng version below
สนุกมากค่ะ จะเล่นแบบมั่วๆแล้วลุ้นว่าจะจบไปเป็นแบบไหนก็ได้ หรือจะเล่นแบบมีอาชีพที่อยากให้เป็นก็ดีย์
เล่นไปแล้วมีหลายอารมณ์ค่ะ555555 แต่อีหยังนะเป็นส่วนใหญ่ คือเล่นแล้วดูไกด์ไปก็ไม่เสียความตื้นเต้วในการเล่นค่ะ เปิดได้เลยๆ
อาชีพที่น่าสนใจก็เช่น เมียน้อยราชา ราชินี ฮีโร่ ทหาร ทหารรับจ้างที่เราไม่เคยได้ นายก ภรรยา บิชอป สาวน้อยเวทย์มนต์ แล้วคือแต่ละอันก็มีรายละเอียดยิบย่อยไปอีกนะคะ เช่นได้เป็นทหารตน.สูงในวังมั้ง ถ้าค่าศีลธรรมน้อย ลูกเราจะพาทหารหล่อๆเข้าห้องทุกคืน โถ่ลูกแม่ แม่ผิดเองที่สอนหนูไม่ดี
นั้นเหละ คือลูกเราสามารถเป็นที่ลูกที่น่ารักน่าภูมิใจน่าหอมหัว หรือน่าหยุมหัวตัดจากกองมรดกก็ได้ หรือแต่งงานกะเราก็ได้ ถ้าน้องเราไม่ได้แต่งกะราชาอะนะ
Very fun to play. You can do what you what and see what happen in the end or have a dream ending to win.
This game have many feeling....such as feeling that make you say oh my god!???????.
You can use guide to play if you have your dream ending .It still fun.
Interesting ending for example is Royal concubine, Queen, solider, mercenary, prime minister, housewife,Bishop. and there are good and bad ending in each ending
For example my lovely daughter have a job as a high knight position but she have low moral so she bring handsome knight to her room every night....
To conclusion,your daughter can be the adorable girl or the girl who you want to kick her out of your home or maybe marry her? is all your choice.
Have fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198162258813', 'num_games_owned': 226, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 525, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 525, 'last_played': 1662963615}
review:
[h1] My daughter married me and threw away all her potentials to become someone great so that she doesn't have to work to earn her living [/h1]
=======
My daughter grown up into a fine healthy lady. 
She has mastered many skills that will be beneficial for her adulthood and contribute to the society. 

She can be a renowned painter for her artistic skill is far superior to anyone in the kingdom. 
Even the master of all painters bows before her and inspired by her painting. 

She is the master of cookery, she can open her own restaurant and feed the country with her succulent delicacy. 
Or she can choose to follow my path of a hero and protects the kingdom as she is an adept of combat, she has won the gladiator tournaments and has beaten a literal dragon at the age of 14.

When she turned 18, it is time for her to leave me for her own path. 
With all the education and training I've gave her, I was sure that she'd surely turned into a great person of the kingdom and contribute to the society and upheld the status of the daughter of the hero. 

In that fateful day of her 18th birthday, she reveals that she does not wish to work and instead wish to be a simple housewife. She claimed that she wants to refine herself into a perfect housewife. She rejects all the possibility of becoming the next successful great person of the kingdom despite all the qualification she processes.

And for some reason, she also confess to me that she is madly in love with me: [i] her very own father [/i], and married me and refuse to work to earn her living and siphon money from me instead.

author: {'steamid': '76561198063426606', 'num_games_owned': 356, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 1479, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1479, 'last_played': 1662151812}
review:
It gets pretty repetitive if you're playing through it multiple times to try and get as many different endings as possible.
I'm throwing in the towel for now, but will likely get back to it.

There are a lot of small details to this I really enjoy, how the different stats impacts your daughter's behaviour and how she treats you and is treated.

There's also a big frustration for me, that doesn't impact the gameplay, but a lot of the 'easiest' achievements are bugged. As a result thy are the most rare achievements for this game when looking at the global achievements, making it pretty infuriating if you're going in as a completionist.

author: {'steamid': '76561198401907532', 'num_games_owned': 1132, 'num_reviews': 301, 'playtime_forever': 935, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 935, 'last_played': 1659628211}
review:
2022年8月4日，成就通关了《Princess Maker 2 Refine》，大约16小时。作为《美少女梦工厂》系列中最受好评、获奖最多的作品，尽管这款游戏并不算符合当代玩家的口味，但也有不少值得讨论的地方。画面不够精美震撼，但是考虑到这是1993年，大约30年前的游戏了，这方面显然不应该要求太多。

这是一个养成类游戏。玩家扮演一位父亲，要在没有母亲的情况下把一个小女孩从10岁养到18岁，抚养8年时间，然后看她能够取得什么样的事业和婚姻成就。虽然我作为父亲是一名骑士，但是平时好像就无所事事，一年只有500金币的俸禄。而这里的物价是怎么样的呢？初级课程上一天课要30~40金币，高级课程上一天课要130~190金币，而这里的8年就是8个365天。我真想知道这位骑士平时都在做什么，居然要十几岁的女儿自己打工养活自己。去做婴儿保姆或者教会义工这种也就算了。去当守墓人或者酒吧女郎，不觉得太过分了吗？不过转念一想，可能这是上世纪的日本文化吧？未成年人利用课余时间打工是司空见惯的事情。

当然毕竟是童工，赚钱的话，效率不是很高，比如说在教会服务，一天的收入是一金币，如果成功次数比较多的话，可以升职加薪，最多好像可以加薪三次吧，也就是一天四金币。初级打工中收入比较多的农场工作，也就是一天10金币，而到中级工作，一天20金币的美发师，那就对感受和艺术有比较高的要求了——我曾经连续给女儿安排三旬的美发师打工，结果全都是大失败，一分钱也没有赚到。

比较有趣的是，这里有类似RPG游戏的冒险机制，冒险的时候还可以去龙之国度看呢——这个游戏有4张探险地图，分别是森林，沙漠，湖泊和冰川。龙之国度是沙漠地图中的一条支线。在打败龙之国度守门人之后，可以和青年龙结婚。但是最讨厌的事情在于，求婚的时候龙族青年和龙族家长全都是人！类！形！态！这么遮遮掩掩的，是为了入乡随俗吗？打不过龙之国度守门人也不要紧，花200个金币就行，第1次去的话一定要花200金币进去，因为进去之后在迷宫里走大概15秒钟，就可以看到一个宝箱，里面有800金币。

这个游戏的结局数量众多。即使是视觉小说也很少有这么多结局吧，一共76个。结局是分系列的，比如说武术系列有这么六七个。魔法系列有这么六七个。打工系列，每一份职业有两个结局。一个是全职工作，一个是兼职工作，比如伐木工，农场工人，餐厅工人，教会工人，守墓人。另外，这里的职业结局和婚姻结局是分开的，在1993年能做到这一点，可谓相当追求男女平等了——而之后的作品反而越活越回去了。比如《美少女梦工厂4》职业结局和婚姻结局是互相覆盖的。只要结婚了，就不用抛头露面，只需要相夫教子而已。令我不太满意的是，这里的故事情节实在是太简单太琐碎了。即便是钦定男主角的王子结局，也不过是每年一月到宫廷里面和他说几句话，每次说的话不因为属性、装备或者评价而有任何变化。

author: {'steamid': '76561198358262414', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1428, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1428, 'last_played': 1638094656}
review:
딸 혈액형으로 스트레스 유무나 스텟 요소가 차이나는게 좀 그렇긴 하지만 뭐 태어난 월로도 스텟 여부가 따져지니까 딱히 뭐라하진 않겠음. 뭔가 초반 아르바이트가 대부분 농사일로 굳혀지는게 아쉽긴한데

고전게임 명작인만큼 딱 추억회상/ 스트리밍 용으로 괜찮은 것 같음
고전 게임이니만큼 답답한 부분이나 현대로 와서 생각할 것들은 조금 많은데 그 때 시절 감성으로 얼머부리는 듯
색체나 퀄리티, 디자인이 고전 레트로스러워서 좋았음

플레이타임을 그렇게 많진 않지만, 그만큼 심심할 때 하면 좋은 게임인듯.
근데 글쓴이는 한 번 할 때 엔딩보자류라서 조금 힘들긴 했음
뭔가 공략 안보면서 엔딩 볼 때는 딱 재미있는데 도전과제용으로 갈수록 어려운 게임인듯
걍 도전과제 상관 없는 즐겜러라면 시간 떼우고 육성하는 재미로 할만 함

근데 돈 값한다는 생각은 그다지 많이 들진 않음
어떻게 보면 나름 일회성 게임일거라 생각이 듦

딱 추억회상 레트로 게임
과몰입러 주관으로 내 딸을 이렇게 키워도 되는가 싶기도 하고 영웅이 한달에 500원만 받는 것도 그렇고 킹받음
아니 인형이 120원인가 여튼 그런데 월급을 이렇게 짜게줘도 되는거임? 딸 왕비 만들어도
용사가 차후에 돈 많이 받는지도 모르고 신 냅다 나와서 넌 딸을 잘 키웠느니 뭐니 이렇게 말만하니까
아버지 된 도리로써 딸 이쁘게 키웠는데 눈물 남 뭐 아버지 입장으로 딸 시집가는거 보니까 좀 대견해서 눈물 나오는 걸지도
맨날 라이벌들한테 까이던 내 딸 흑흑

여튼간에 스텟게임/ 육성게임치고 컨텐츠도 많고 이벤트도 많음
근데 모험 싫고 그냥 스텟투자만 좋아 파에게는 비추천
이벤트의 대부분이 모험에서 있음

게임 자체는 쏘쏘함 근데 왜 추천하냐면
디자인이나 색체나 캐릭터성이나 좀 마음에 들어서 추천 줌

author: {'steamid': '76561198427382337', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 211, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 211, 'last_played': 1657509044}
review:
I love this game, but it's still a pretty buggy mess.

The localization needs a lot of work, fighting mechanics are pretty janky, and I'm unlocking achievements for things that I haven't actually done. Probably shouldn't complain too much though, since I got the achievement for beating the War God without actually beating the War God. On the other hand, I should have won that fight anyway, but again - janky combat.

Princess Maker 2 is near and dear to my heart, though, and as much of a mess as this port is, I can't hold its faults against it. Nothing I ran into was game-breaking, and a decent amount of effort was put into refining the art assets, the soundtrack, and the voice-acting.

If you want to play the best version of this game, go grab the DOSbox version. The translation is very good, and you can enable cheats if you just want to mess around in the game.

But if you want a more convenient alternative to going through the DOSbox system, this isn't a terrible option. Especially if you can catch it on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198074441513', 'num_games_owned': 146, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1656490552}
review:
如果說在STEAM上面有什麼一定要補票的神作
那麼應該只有【美少女夢工廠2】是唯一選擇

486電腦時代誕生的最強神作
也是系列作品中的最經典
更是我個人的第一款電腦遊戲

多重樹狀結局因它而誕生
想當年為了完成各種結局的嘗試
公主、女王、娼女、武神、龍族老婆、
惡魔王女、學者、貴族老婆、富商情婦......
還有那密技商店以及萬惡的國王新衣

養成遊戲整合迷宮探險RPG
即便是國中只有日文版，為了女兒的奶奶
也必須知道哪個是豐乳丸與瘦身藥

即便電腦還收藏著遠古盜版DOS模擬器
依舊還是下單補票



最大遺憾就是這版本是一個閹割版
沒有密技商店也就算了，居然連國王新衣都沒有
只期望有一天能夠回歸
即便是DLC也沒關係

另外就是當機問題
用WIN10開啟遊戲，沒開相容模式居然一分鐘連當4次
不是程式停止不動，而是鍵盤滑鼠都不能控制
尤其不能按ESC，也不能輸入漢字
(日文舊版應該是能打日文字才對)

author: {'steamid': '76561199095038100', 'num_games_owned': 72, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 1905, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1160, 'last_played': 1708262296}
review:
프메는 내인생겜중 하나임 
어렸을적 사촌언니들이 하는걸 뒤에서 구경하는게 그렇게 재밌었는데
다 큰 성인이 되서 집적해보니 더 재밌음
가끔 할것 없을때 한번씩 하게되고 공략을 보면서
어떻게 키워야 되는지성장시키는 재미가 쏠쏠함 
앞으로 나이를 더 먹어도 질리지않을 나의 최애 육성게임

author: {'steamid': '76561198144427989', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 175, 'playtime_forever': 699, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 699, 'last_played': 1533906399}
review: The sequel of Princess Maker does most of what a sequel should do, better gameplay tweeks, more things to do, more cute activity graphics. I feel it suffers a bit less from what I found issue with in the first games so that's something too. Altogether it's a staple of the schedule controlling vn genre and should probably be played through a few times to explore most of it.

review: 진짜 인생겜인데 아쉬운 건 앨범 기능 없는 거랑 오프라인에서는 도전과제/플레이 시간 다 날아가는 거.. 근데 나름 용산데 1년에 500G는 좀 너무한 거 아님? ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ 용사 고용 사기 당한 거 같은데

author: {'steamid': '76561198858826805', 'num_games_owned': 80, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 795, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 637, 'last_played': 1675528935}
review:
처음 딸을 나름 최선을 다해서 키웠을 때 18살이 되고 병사가 됐다.
사실 등급으로 보면 이도저도 아니고 그저 그런 엔딩인데도 그 애가 이후로 일을 잘해나가다 못해 스스로 노력해 승진까지 했다는 이야기를 듣자 마음이 울컥하드라...

오히려 여왕 공략을 하면서부터는 내 딸을 너무 수단으로 여기는 것 같아 오히려 마음이 안 좋고 재미도 잘 안 느껴졌다. 내 딸을 위해 그 어떤 것도 보지 않고 봤던 첫 엔딩이 여운이고 미련으로 남을 것 같다.

author: {'steamid': '76561199212792039', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 756, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 756, 'last_played': 1647612142}
review:
어렸을 때 했던 게임인데 으른 되서 하니까 더 재밌어요,,
시작하자마자 딸내미가 불량해지더니 용돈을 안주자 "쳇, 구두쇠" 요러길래 육아의 벽이 생길랑했지만..! 딸내미가 성장해가는 모습 볼 때마다 뿌듯하네요ㅎ 추억도 생각나고ㅎ 역시 고전갓겜 프린세스 메이커는 시즌2가 제맛이다 이말이야~!

author: {'steamid': '76561199071056168', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 450, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 364, 'last_played': 1666427721}
review:
왕으로 만들고 싶엇을 뿐인데 약하다고 무시하는 엔피씨가 넘 많아서 전투충으로 만들었습니다. 피땀흘려 모은 돈으로 수업 보냈더니 아무런 성과가 없다하는 걸 볼 때면 부모로서 복장이 터집니다.
+검사 하라고 검술도 마법도 격투술도 농장알바에 무사수행까지 보내줬건만 도덕성이 개같이 멸망해서 SM클럽 남성들에게 훈련의 성과를 맛보여주던데요.

author: {'steamid': '76561198093287865', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 2227, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2227, 'last_played': 1642072476}
review: Хорошая игра на первые два прохождения. После её ещё хватает на два-три прохождения. Концовок много, а их условия часто похожи, из-за чего на некоторые концовки можно выйти только с помощью гайдов, ибо интуитивно трудно понять, что требуется сделать. В итоге после трех-пяти прохождений, когда игрок уже понял что к чему, у игры рушится образ симулятора отца и она превращается в набивание нужных характеристик с однотипным геймплеем. Лучше бы концовок было поменьше, а их достижение более понятное.

author: {'steamid': '76561198094883590', 'num_games_owned': 1193, 'num_reviews': 98, 'playtime_forever': 1756, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1756, 'last_played': 1638371443}
review:
[h1]以公主為目標？不，我以罪孽結局為目標。（真香）[/h1]

☑簡體、繁體中文

[h1]遊戲介紹[/h1]

■退休勇者的你成為了從天而降的少女的父親，擔當起撫養她10歲到18歲的責任。
遊戲一個月可以安排三種行程：上課、打工、適當的度假跟休息，或者出門當個冒險者打怪賺錢。你所做的選擇都會影響女兒從10歲開始的身體、心理（數值），例如飲食管理選擇健康，女兒可能會變胖衣服穿不下、魅力過高，女兒整天春意蕩漾，胸部也會變大讓你結局工作順利；而心理的變化也會讓女兒自己去決定一些事情，例如答應成為別人的妻妾、隨便跟人出去吃飯。金錢的部分也是父親要好好控管，除了王國每一年給予的退休俸５００元（好少！），要如何賺取到女兒的生活費又要讓女兒成為想要的職業，都是需要經過思考的。

★網路都可以查到上課、打工數值加減以及各個事件的攻略重點，也可以查到如何快速賺錢，少走金錢冤枉路。

■在18歲時會做一個總結，女兒會講一段話，然後帶入一段小劇情去描述如何開始工作。婚姻跟職業是拆開的，整體遊戲時間不長，如果存檔抓的時間點好，可以一輪完成多結局不是問題。
本作的的結局分類多了一種叫做罪孽結局，意指罪孽值過高，道德過低時就會進入的路線，通常女兒會埋怨你，並且結局可能在一般人感覺上都不是那麼好：例如流氓、娼婦等。不過星座的守護神就會一直念你了，覺得真不該把女兒交給你
例如：占卜師介紹工作，女兒最後成為了SM女王。但如果在17歲時把戰士跟魔法師的評價刷低，就會變成高級娼婦喔（？）

[h1]優點[/h1]
1.幾乎全語音
2.寫實且些許的色色內容：武者修行打輸特殊事件的強盜可能會被嘿嘿嘿、打劫路人太多次會被抓。
3.可以培養戰鬥取向的女兒，雖然武者修行只有四張地圖，但不再只有以公主為目標的上課內容。
4.這一代的度假花費……真心便宜（雖然CG圖也不多就是）。
5.結局及CG都很精美。
6.打工、上課小動畫很可愛

[h1]缺點[/h1]
1.存檔只有十個欄位
2.語音與文字不同步。把文字按掉，語音還會繼續。
3.翻譯錯字多、句子漏字、不同步（道德跟品德）
4.對話頭圖沒有很好看，跟立繪有差距。

[h1]結論[/h1]
經典養成遊戲、大名鼎鼎的美少女夢工廠二代重製版，主要是針對畫質做了精緻化，翻譯的狀況有點糟糕。

至於為甚麼前面提到很多色色的重點呢？我覺得這是這一代會受歡迎的原因之一。XD
雖然上steam變成了普遍級，國王的新衣被砍，還是有不少隱喻的部分，奇幻世界養育女兒不應該都只會碰到愛與勇氣與希望的故事。當然整體培養還是很老少咸宜的，不刻意碰罪孽結局就好；想要隨機養或刻意養都很有樂趣，看結局故事CG會很有成就感。

以前在漫畫書店一次投十塊遊玩、購入代理實體綺麗版，這次上steam才真正有空地好好體驗這一款經典作品，雖然整體畫面我還是比較喜歡DOS版，看起來問題好像很多，但表現還是不讓人失望，且我已經順利遊玩過好幾輪了。如果以前已經錯過或只是聽人家推薦過，不妨趁上架到steam，收一套到收藏庫來遊玩。


[quote]＃喜歡我的評論請幫我按個[b]值得參考[/b]，或者關注
[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/34499560/]電波發射✩實驗室[/url] 
謝謝你(`・ω・´)[/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561197964641301', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 312, 'playtime_forever': 726, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 726, 'last_played': 1603333727}
review:
So there I was, a kid who didn't understand much about English back at the end of the 90's, checking websites that were offering abandonware games. To this day, there's still this one named "Home of the Underdogs", which provides some really amusing reviews about some unusual gaming titles. Among them, there was this one called "Princess Maker 2"

While the title didn't seem promising enough, I decided to see what this was all about anyway. Even though I couldn't really understand certain parts of the review, I still thought that it could be an interesting idea to give it a try and so I did (I just don't remember if I've found available there or elsewhere)

Anyway, when you start the game you're presented with a cliché story where mankind lived in peace, then it got corrupted so the demons came to invade the realm. All of a sudden, a young hero shows up and sends the fiends back to hell. The hero is praised, the king decides to hire him by paying him an annual salary which somehow still feels like it's less than a fast food worker does in a month

Now, if the hero was a bachelor that wouldn't be so bad, right? The only problem is that the gods of this realm have a really sick sense of humor. While the protagonist was struggling with the massive havoc that was going all around, they were probably all eating ambrosia popcorn accompanied by celestial wine or some shit like that, while making jokes about him. After the conflict was over they were like: "Oh, is it already over? Wait, I have another idea". And that's when they decided to "present you" with a child for you to raise as your own, who's probably the fruit of some incestuous relationship between them. Ah well, at least she's already 10 years old, so you won't have to worry about diapers

So, each "round" of the game consists of a weekly plan where you create a schedule of activities for your daughter to do. She could either study, work, go on an adventure / vacation or simply just slack around like a delinquent. You have the options of praising or scolding her, which is up to you to evaluate whenever is the right time to take action (especially when the little brat decides to run away). There's also this incubus who's your butler, for whatever reason, which advises you what to do sometimes

Anyway, for your foster child to progress, she's gotta study, right? Ok, but such as in real life, everything costs money. And your annual funds can barely cover even the most basic daily costs. So what's my personal opinion about this? I think that the hero actually receives a much higher amount from the king, but since he never really asked anyone to become a nanny for the gods, he just decides to spare a small percentage for this ordeal, while he pockets the rest to spend it all on some other interesting activities (use your imagination)

Right, what do you have to do, whenever it comes to that? Oh yeah, why not drop the weight of the world over the child's shoulders, kinda like saying: "Hey kid, if you wanna survive in this world, you're gonna have to work hard for it. Wanna blame someone? Then blame the gods, you little rascal!". So you send your kid to work as a mason, chopping trees or even get her a job as a cabaret dancer, when she's got old enough for it (?). If you think that this isn't already sick enough, what about sending her to spend a whole week in the desert fighting demons? If you stop to think, that hero isn't any better than the gods.. Either way, whenever you choose this option, all of a sudden the gameplay turn into a J-RPG and, at least in my opinion, it's the most entertaining part (and also the easiest way to make some money)

There's also this yearly harvest festival, which for some reason takes a whole month and it has 4 different categories to choose from. While you're still a beginner, the other contestants will definitely wipe the floor with you, but after some valuable lessons (and an insane amount of money), you're gonna have a chance to fight them on equal grounds. If you get to win, you can make some coin too

After 8 long years of this "celestial reality show", your daughter decides to follow a certain path in her life and then one of the gods comes to present you a report of their opinion about you. Well, screw those pricks, it's not like they've ever done anything to help you in the first place

So, there're several different endings that you can achieve and each one of them relies either on your actions or your stats to be unlocked. Some can be quite tricky, but I've found some community guides that were really helpful, something that was a bit lacking back in the day. Spoiler alert: You can actually get the "Woody Allen" ending, depending on how you play your cards

Overall, it's a very addicting game, but it kinda gets old after going through a few runs. In my personal opinion, it's the kind of title that should be played from time to time. If you're going after every achievement available, I praise your patience and I sincerely wish you good luck!

author: {'steamid': '76561198388149057', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 4422, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 689, 'last_played': 1639375781}
review:
昔、やったことがあるならお勧めできます。
ゲーム自体は、非常に面白いと思います。

あくまで昔のゲームなので、操作性がよくなかったり、
無駄に時間がかったりします（発売当時はそれで問題ないと思ってた）。

武者修行に行くとフリーズする問題については、私は解決できました。
ただ、多数の報告があるのに対策されてないのは、どうなのかなと思います。

review: Ever since playing it with my friends, I couldn't help but fall in love with this game. Every playthrough is unique and the outcome varies significantly depending on all (even minor) player choices.

author: {'steamid': '76561198181568587', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 2592, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 817, 'last_played': 1637241020}
review:
プリメ２か～子供の頃に夢中になってやってた作品だったなぁ。あの頃から二十年が過ぎた今、俺は立派なアラサーになってこのゲームをSteamで発見した。あまりの懐かしさとあの時になかったフルボイス仕様に対する期待感でワクワクしながらSteamで購入。
やべぇ、これ今やってもめちゃくちゃ楽しすぎじゃないか…！もう一層グラフィックだけ変えて発売しちゃっても万人に受け入れそうなゲーム性してると思う。これぞ時代を超越した正真正銘の名作だと言えるのではないだろうか。

author: {'steamid': '76561198119778853', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1284, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1279, 'last_played': 1636389136}

한 뒤에는 내딸은 아무한테도 줄 수없다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198155978299', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 4606, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 642, 'last_played': 1676203788}
review:
Very fun gameplay and cheerful music. Ideal for a chill afternoon.

Only real negative and low point is that when you lose a battle to a named bandit there is a tasteless and rather grotesque event.

author: {'steamid': '76561198144376988', 'num_games_owned': 97, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 1787, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1636, 'last_played': 1668318406}
review:
娘を育成するゲーム。ここsteamには無いですが、当時買ったプリメ２の説明書は大変すばらしかった。ファンタジーゲームの説明書なのにアルバイトの求人情報が載ってたり、習い事教室のPR情報が載ってたり、当時子供だった私は説明書を見ながらニヤニヤしてました。今大人が遊ぶとただの能力値変動ゲーにしか見えないのが悲しいところ

ちなsteam版ですがきちんと起動します。段々と成長していく娘に感動したり、最初は非力な娘が数々の敵を倒せるよう指導したり、娘にいけない服を着せたり、流石プリンセスメーカーと言えばのゲームです。やりようによっては簡単かつ時間をかけずにクリアできるのでシリーズ最多のエンディングを楽しむことができます。

author: {'steamid': '76561198446635753', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1941, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1866, 'last_played': 1640693187}
review: 感觉有点难度，比如叛逆后不好好打工、数值不够打工会失败等等，有的时候会入不敷出，没钱上课。但是挺好玩，各种事件也挺有趣。甚至还有病故的结局。外出修行也很好玩，会遇到各种事件。有的道具也会触发某些事件。

author: {'steamid': '76561198030125068', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 45335, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43803, 'last_played': 1700255760}
review: Tons of different outcomes for how you go about raising and interacting with your daughter. Not going to lie, some of the good endings had me feeling a good deal of pride and joy. I refuse to do the bad endings for the achievements.

author: {'steamid': '76561198872260596', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 360, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 360, 'last_played': 1617929882}
review:
game isn't worth twenty dollars, in my honest opinion. would not recommend playing if you don't enjoy level raising and nothing else. there is no plot. there are no interesting characters. the sole influence your grinding ekes upon your daughter is the occasional change in dialogue + a won event or two. 

do NOT buy this unless you're locked in by nostalgia, it's a waste of money and time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198406363203', 'num_games_owned': 29, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 383, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 120, 'last_played': 1668609956}
review:
기록보다는 많이 했음 오프라인으로 해서 그런가.. 두 시간이라니...
옛날 게임이라 꽤나 짜증나거나 화나는 부분이 많이 있음 내 딸이 미성년자라는 것을 생각하면..... 그리고 여캐/여성체 몹들이 자꾸 벗고 나옴. 누군가 내 모니터를 볼 수 있는 상황이라면 조심하는 것이 좋겠습니다.
그렇지만 옛날 게임이라서 더 재미있음 이거 하고 자란 세대는 아닌데 마치 그 세대인것 같은 착각 속에서 게임을 즐길 수 있음.. 극강의 딸내미를 키워내는 재미도 있구.. 보람도 있고... 나름 추천!

review:
4시간 정도의 풀타임으로 이리저리 노가다하는 것 같기도 하지만
꽤나 이 게임이 익숙해 진다면 딸래미 대회 보내는 맛도 있고
사냥하러 가서 보물 찾는 재미도 있고
딸래미 반항하는 모습들을 보면서 부모의 마음을 느끼는 것도 나쁘지 않네요/
저의 어릴적 모습을 되새기게 되는 그런 게임이지않았나, 싶습니다 
잼난 게임 만들어주셔서 감사합니다^^ 모두모두 즐겜~

review: this is one of the greatest games ever to be made. even if most gameplay is repetitive, frustrating, and sometimes just downright questionable in terms of its content, princess maker 2 is definitely worth giving a shot at. heck, it should get more recognition beyond being a "cult classic". princess maker 2 is a gamechanger in the canon of video game history for all i care for, and no one will stop me from not believing so.

现在我富有10000G，可能神秘商人才上门一两次。
如果这个是BUG，请告诉我修复的方法。

author: {'steamid': '76561198844322785', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 588, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 588, 'last_played': 1617531013}
review:
어릴 적 멋도 모르고 불법 다운로드해서 플레이했던 과거를 뉘우치며 게임을 샀습니다. 겸사겸사 한 번 플레이해볼까 하다보니 9시간이 지나버렸네요. 지금해도 재밌는 게임이에요.

지금보니 어둠의 전당, 색기 등 어린 아이가 할 법한 게임에 들어가면 안 되는 요소들이 많았는데 그 때는 어리긴 어렸구나... 싶네요. 워낙 엔딩이 다양해서 어떤 교육을 시키고 어떤 아르바이트를 시킬지 많이 고민하면서 했습니다.

아래는 단순 공략팁..

#1 스트레스 조절이 가장 어려웠던 것 같아요. 그런데 한 주를 휴식으로 보내기도 아까워서 계속 인형을 사서 스트레스를 인위적으로 깎았습니다. 또, 인형을 한 번에 되팔아서 스트레스를 999로 만든 후 스트레스 0으로 만들어주는 이벤트를 보고 오는 형식으로 조절했습니다.

#2 애가 어릴 때는 농장 아르바이트가 짱입니다. 체력을 잘 올려둬야지 더 많은 스트레스를 잘 견딜 수 있습니다. 농장 아르바이트 많이 시키세요. 불량 소녀가 되지 않게 만들기 위해서는 도덕성이나 신성력이 필요합니다. 농장아르바이트와 함께 성당 자원봉사?를 돌아가면서 시켜주면 최곱니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198104662064', 'num_games_owned': 126, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 2625, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1970, 'last_played': 1617088164}
review:
[h1]※フリーズバグ回避方 [/h1]
[b]Win10で、IME設定→全般→互換性「以前のバージョンのMicrosoft IMEを使う」をオン[/b]
これで僕の環境ではキーボードが普通に使えるようになりました！
Win10におけるIMEのバージョンアップが不具合の原因だったようです。
武者修行でフリーズする方は試してみてください。

*****************************************

シリーズ5作品中で一番の名作と言われているプリンセスメーカー2のリファイン版です。
旧Win版と比べてもグラフィックが格段に綺麗になっていて、プリメ2の独特でファンタジックな世界観を存分に楽しめます。
フルボイスも思った以上にいい感じで、娘役の西村ちなみさんの声も最高にマッチしています。
昔プレイしたことのある人はもちろん、新規の人にも十分にお勧めできる完成度だと思います。


娘の育成の自由度がとても高いのが最大の特徴です。
娘には体力、筋力、知能といった一般的なパラメータ以外に、感受性、信仰心、気品、モラル、色気、さらには料理、掃除、話術等、様々な能力値が設定されています。
ダンスをしたり絵を描いたり、剣術や魔法を習ってライバルたちと競い合ったり、モンスターを退治することもできます。
エンディングの種類も、娘の将来の職業や結婚相手等、かなり豊富です。
プロポーションもある程度自分好みに育てられます。


世界観も素晴らしくて、ふんわり優しいながらも引き締まった、印象に残るものです。
季節ごとに父娘で海や山に行くバカンスイベントや、習い事とアルバイトのミニアニメーションは、グラフィックの向上でさらに印象的になりました。
王国の住人たちや森の妖精たち、モンスター等、本当によく描き込まれ、作り込まれています。
オープニングでさらっと語られるバックグラウンドストーリーも、シンプルながら素晴らしいです。
堕落し滅びかけた都が復興していく過程と、娘の成長がオーバーラップして語られます。
（個人的な話ですが、オープニングで守護神から娘を託されるシーンでは毎回必ず泣いてしまいます…）
世界観の作りこみが、このゲームに深みを与えてます。
一冊の絵本のようだというレビューを見ましたが、同感です。
古いゲームなので演出面はあっさりしていますが、とても奥行きを感じます。


[strike]最大の問題点は、フリーズバグの存在です。
これは起こる人と起こらない人がいるようなので環境要因だとは思いますが、僕の環境では起きました。
簡単に言えば、キーボードを使うとフリーズします。
このゲームでは主に武者修行の移動でキーボードを使うので、武者修行で固まるという報告が多いですが、実際にはどのシーンでもキーボードを押すと固まります。
仕方ないので武者修行はマウスで移動していますが、ここでキーボードが使えないのは少し面倒です。
マウス操作のみでプレイすれば大きな支障はありませんが、この程度のバグはいい加減対応して欲しいです。[/strike]

他には、実績関係でバグがちょこちょこあります。
占い師に会っただけで占った実績が解除されたり、武神に負けても倒した実績が解除されます。
この辺も直して欲しいところです。


チュートリアルが一切なく、ゲーム開始とともに放り出されてしまう点も少し問題です。
自由度がかなり高いゲームなので、新規の方は何をしていいのか途方に暮れると思います。
特に序盤は金銭的にきつくて、適当にプレイしてると習い事どころか食費すら足りなくなります。
一番簡単なのは農場で稼ぎつつ体を鍛えて、徐々に武者修行に行けるようにすることです。
普通にプレイしてるとまず気づかない隠し要素や隠しイベントがあるので、、二周目以降は情報を見るのもありだと思います。
色々な攻略法があってそれがゲーム性の深さに繋がってるのですが、せめてもう少しヒントがあるとよかったですね。


このゲームが何より素晴らしいのは、娘を育ててるという実感があることです。
小さかった女の子が、背もだんだん高くなって、言うこともどんどんしっかりして、成長を感じるんですよね。
この辺をちゃんと表現できているゲームは、他にはなかなかありません。
不思議と繰り返しプレイしたくなる……名作です！

author: {'steamid': '76561198063082124', 'num_games_owned': 82, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 651, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 367, 'last_played': 1616737275}
review:
고전명작이라고 하길래 해본 게임,
육성겜은 잘 안해봤는데 정말 재밌게 했다.
이게 내가 태어나기 전부터 있었던 게임이라는게 믿기지 않을 정도로 방대한 육성법이 있고 그에 따른 결과가 있다는게 놀라웠다.
단점이라면 일러스트 앨범같은게 있으면 좋을 것 같은데 없는게 살짝 아쉬운 정도?
도전과제로 해왔던 결과들을 대충 볼 수 있지만 플스처럼 도전과제 달성순간이 캡쳐되는것도 아니라 여러모로 심심했다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198111085665', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 788, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 604, 'last_played': 1673784025}
review: 나 초딩때 게임 입문작. 프메 2 안했으면 게임 입문 안해서 공부를 더 한다던지 더 생산적인 일을 해서 내 미래가 달라지지 않았을까... 생각함. 근데 지금보면 위험한 성적 코드들이 많아서 (강...간당하면 매력이 오름) 애들이 할만한 겜이 아닌데 순수한 어린 시절엔 그런거 모르고 플레이함ㅋㅋㅋㅋ 인형놀이 하는 느낌으로 하다보면 시간 순삭ㅋㅋㅋ 이 작품 땜에 게임 입문해서 남들은 드라마 볼때 게임 방송 챙겨봤던 내 학창시절이 아련하게 떠올라서 그냥 웃김. 그 후로 블빠 되어서 스타, 스2에 내 인생을 갈아 넣고 겜 직관도 쫒아가고 프로 게이머한테 싸인도 받고 그랬음. 그게 나비효과 되어서 게임 프로그래머 되겠다고 공대 테크트리 탄 그냥 내 인생을 바꿔버린 게임이라고 할 수 있음. 요망한 작품임 아주.. 내가 이 작품 안만났으면 20년 넘게 겜창 인생으로 살지 않았을거임...

author: {'steamid': '76561198013245759', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 824, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 348, 'last_played': 1615750270}
review:
A nice game that you will certainly enjoy if you like the premise. Still, I have to add the pretty big caveat that the translation is awful and that does detract from the experience. Sorry, I meant, the "trnaslation" since that's how it is actually credited at the end of the game. Yeah... It's that bad... and reading is what you're mostly going to do in the game.

That being said, this is once again, not a dealbreaker (at least for me) the appeal of trying out different things and seeing the result on your cute virtual daughter is well worth some janky translation and I'd invite anyone to at least try it since you'll know pretty quickly whethe or not this game is for you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198859541622', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1479, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1153, 'last_played': 1615105695}

author: {'steamid': '76561198393863122', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 2494, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 487, 'last_played': 1670056672}
review:
还在上初中的时候，第一次接触了Princess Maker，那个时候的我玩游戏很菜，只玩过梦幻西游和网页小游戏，这个游戏一下子就吸引了我的注意力。我还记得我第一次玩什么都不懂，但是深深地被这个游戏的画面迷住了，很复古，也很华丽，女儿有那么多好看的裙子（虽然我没钱买）。对于一个中学生来说，那个时候还没有正版盗版的意识，我上着贴吧，看着同人文，刷着优酷和土豆，还装扮着我的QQ空间，一切都很美好而单纯。
       在我的心里，美少女梦工厂2永远是我最喜欢的游戏之一，我甚至记得我第一次打出来的结局是艺术家！！！因为我喜欢画画，所以上来除了农场打工就是学画画学艺术，最后画出来那个画我还吐槽，怎么这么像文艺复兴时期的名画杂糅起来的作品？我还打出来了女王+跟王子结婚的结局（小时候觉得太完美了！虽然我用了那个作弊键，但是steam上的好像不能作弊QAQ）后来上了高中学业繁忙，没有时间重复地玩了，但是周末偶尔还是会打开回味一下。大学之后我还下载以后玩过，大学时候作业要求写游戏鉴赏，我还写过美4的鉴赏得了个不错的分数，毕业工作以后就没有再玩过了。
       今年我在看steam的时候，发现上面竟然有PM2，而且还在打折，我马上就买了，就当是童年补票了！今天不上班，我第一次打开了这个游戏，结果疯狂地玩了7、8个小时，不知道是游戏有毒还是我有毒，感觉回到了很多年以前那个快乐的我，感觉好幸福！第一次打出来了跟王子结婚的结局，但是女王没达成，有一项评价差一些……
        不过游戏里面很多翻译感觉有点问题，年轻的龙称呼老龙“古蓝帕”，这个翻译有点让人无语，把Grandpa翻译成祖父不行吗……里面还有的地方标点放的不对，感觉很多NPC的台词和名字翻译的也有点问题，希望能稍微改改。还有那个魔王的别墅为啥在那睡觉魔王第二天不会出来啊，下次玩的时候再研究一下！

author: {'steamid': '76561198028435073', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 601, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 601, 'last_played': 1525707250}
review:
The fact GAINAX (the anime studio) had a wildly successful nineties side hustle making "raising simulators" is incredibly funny to me. This series started on the PC-98 and MSX computer systems like so many other otaku favorites like Touhou and the Metal Gear franchise. GAINAX realized they were so good at this, they branched out into (obviously) Neon Genesis Evangelion with the Girlfriend of Steel and Ayanami Raising Project games [spoiler]there is also a Shinji Ikari Raising Project PC game where you can be very, very gay[/spoiler]. Considering the recent re-dub of Evangelion on Netflix and the new rebuild movie that will realistically come out in 300 years, I wonder if these games will ever get a PC release in English? Probably not but...you can hope. [b]Play this one if you're new to the series, but please check out a guide because the mechanics and inidividual stats for your kid aren't that well explained.[/b]

The RPG parts are probably the weakest for me, but I know some people like them. Those segments were very common and sorta expected in games like this, anyways, but they kill the pacing. This is very much a [i]management simulator[/i] when it comes to strengths and weaknesses gameplay-wise. Please take care of your daughter. Or not. I'm not your dad, dad. There are [b]74 possible endings[/b] by the way. Back in those days, you raised your [url=https://themillions.com/2013/08/the-death-of-the-ingenue.html]ingénue princesses protagonist[/url] for endless hours on dial-up, I guess.

author: {'steamid': '76561198185533667', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 3148, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2892, 'last_played': 1678666032}
review: My daughter ran away, stole my money, and killed god. 10/10 would raise heaven child again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198817716702', 'num_games_owned': 9, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 7692, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3468, 'last_played': 1693356313}
review:
Pour un jeu datant originalement de 1993, j'adore le concept. Cette version est bien meilleur avec ses graphismes retravaillés: après 50+ heures de jeu, je ne me lasse pas de regarder les animations mignonnes quand Olive travaille!

Cependant, je comprends que certains aspects de ce jeu sont...perturbants. Par exemple, pour certaines fins, il faut absolument surveiller le poids de l'enfant jusqu'à la taille de sa poitrine. Il y a même une fin où Olive se marie avec le joueur, son père...

Malgré tout, je recommande ce jeu puisqu'il et assez unique! J'adore le concept et j'ai bien hâte de compléter les autres fins. Elles ont difficiles, mais très satisfaisantes à réussir. Puisqu'une fin prend en moyenne 3-5h à terminer, Princess Maker 2 est un bon jeu pour passer le temps.

review:
BUG多到数不胜数，多到比地下蚁国还多（不是，不管你在玩什么内容、不管你玩到哪个进度、甚至不管你是不是真的在玩，都能给你出bug！我的实际游玩时间不超过5分钟，这几个小时的游戏时长是在购买下载后就直接后台运行，停止游戏关不掉、重启steam都关不掉，开了任务管理器杀后台才关掉。然后进游戏，起名字，突发奇想按了一下键盘，卡死……重启……进入战斗场景，弹出对话框，卡死……
我甚至还为本游戏特地购入了Borderless Gaming，但是就这个移植诚意，你对不起我的童年，滚吧。

review:

I definitely recommend looking up a guide if you intend to achievement hunt every ending. I'm still working on a few, and have gotten to the point where i have a physical paper tracker to keep score on the few endings i have left. author: {'steamid': '76561199138931508', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3069, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 69, 'last_played': 1703856749}
review:
ゲームは素晴らしいですが

他の方数名も仰っているようにフリーズが起きます。

当方当初はdmm版で普通に楽しんでいたものの、突如フリーズが頻発するようになりsteam版に移行。

steam版でも同様だった為、当時レビューにフリーズ報告が上がっていなかったのもありおま環と思い(メモリやディスクが100%近かった為)

最底辺スペックノーパソから入門グレード程度のゲーミングデスクトップを購入し再度プリメ2 を起動するも改善せず。
今レビューを見てみたら同様の方多数…。

武者修行のエンカウント時に100%フリーズ
だと思っていたのですが、どうやらキーボード操作が入ると100%フリーズする模様
武者修行でなくてもプリメを起動した状態でキーボードを使うとフリーズします。

環境を変える良いきっかけにはなりましたが
バグなら早急に対応頂きたい

review:

追記
武者修行の際にキーボートを使えていたが、画面クリックのみの操作になった？

author: {'steamid': '76561198027414817', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1360, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1351, 'last_played': 1612653604}
review:
This is a fairly good conversion of the old DOS Princess Maker 2 to modern systems. It has been retranslated -- probably the lowest part of the conversion, but a perfectly serviceable retranslation. Some of the old cheats from the DOS PM2 have been removed, which does make the game quite a bit more difficult, especially as some items you may want to get are very rare drops indeed!

None of that compromises the basic enjoyment of the game however. Recommended!

author: {'steamid': '76561198072253823', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 573, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 551, 'last_played': 1624084938}

author: {'steamid': '76561198282645050', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2441, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2017, 'last_played': 1612702658}
review:
자꾸 여성에게 결혼은 가장 중요하다고 해서 홧김에 이혼녀로 키웠습니다. 아버지랑 결혼하는 엔딩 보고 뒷목 잡고 쓰러질 뻔해서 마왕과 결혼시켰습니다. 마왕이랑 결혼하는 건 간지가 나지 않아서 그냥 마왕으로 키웠습니다.
자식농사 망치는 재미로 게임해요.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068245857', 'num_games_owned': 1663, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 2723, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1844, 'last_played': 1677562913}
review:
[h1] Absoluter Klassiker! [/h1] 
[list]
    [*] Bei Princess Maker 2 Refine handelt es sich um eine Lebenssimulation. Man zieht seine eigene Tochter groß.
    [*] Das komplexe Gameplay ist absolut interessant und bietet einen extrem hohen Wiederspielwert.
    [*] Auch die Vielzahl an möglichen Enden, ist absolut begeisternd.
    [*] Ein weiterer Pluspunkt bietet der Retro-Anime Stil, der perfekt zum Spiel passt.
    [*] Der einzige negative Punkt ist der doch relativ hohe Schwierigkeitsgrad für manche Enden. Ich selbst habe einen Guide dazu anlegt und trotzdem fehlen mir selbst bis heute manche Enden.
[/list]

author: {'steamid': '76561198045655704', 'num_games_owned': 3553, 'num_reviews': 207, 'playtime_forever': 4473, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2377, 'last_played': 1613335611}
review:
[h1]♪ Voilà que tu viens comme une reine juste à la pointe du jour
Avec dans son écho de porcelaine ton appel au secours
Comme un signal pour que s'égraine ce temps qui s'enfuit à son tour
D'abord les heures, les jours, les semaines et puis les années d'amour ♫[/h1]

[i]« Il y avait un royaume, où le roi étalait sa domination, et le peuple tombait dans la paresse et la cupidité. Personne ne parlait de la grâce du ciel. Personne ne se lamentait de son indolence. Et ainsi la colère du Roi des cieux invoqua le seigneur des bêtes. Le Seigneur Démon de l'abîme envoya ses troupes vers le royaume. Et c'était la volonté du ciel. La bataille était sans espoir. L’armée royale, ramollie après des années de paix a été décimée par la puissante armée du Seigneur Démon. Les remparts ont été démolis et la ville consumée par d'imposantes flammes. Ce n’était qu’une question de temps avant que les murs du palais ne tombent. Alors, un guerrier errant vit le sort du royaume, et rejoignit la bataille contre le Seigneur démoniaque. Couvert par l’obscurité d'une nuit sans lune, le guerrier se faufila dans le campement ennemi. Après un duel à mort, le Seigneur Démon fut vaincu et se retira dans le monde souterrain avec son armée pour récupérer de sa défaite. Reconnaissant d'avoir sauvé la capitale, le roi et la reine promirent de dorénavant en faire une ville de bien. Le héros étant sévèrement blessé par ses affrontements, le roi lui proposa de rester au palais et de l'aider à reconstruire la capitale. Ainsi, le héros s'installa à la capitale et reçut une pension de la part du roi.
Plus tard, par une nuit étoilée, le héros se sentit obligé de quitter le palais, comme si quelque chose l’appelait. Une voix venue du ciel l'appela par son nom. Lorsqu'il leva les yeux, un météore s’élança du ciel avec une traînée de lumière et tomba sur une colline non loin de lui. Il s'y précipita, et là il trouva une grande boule de lumière. Il s’approcha et remarqua qu’à l’intérieur de la boule il y avait une petite fille. La voix céleste lui confia alors la petite fille, sa vie et son destin sont maintenant entre les mains du héros.»[/i]

[i][b]Princess Maker 2 Refine[/b][/i] est le deuxième volet de la série des [i]Princess Maker[/i], série demandant au joueur de s'occuper d'une fillette de ses 10 à ses 18 ans. Et quand le jeu se lance un an après l'introduction, c'est tout ce qu'on sait. Comme dans une bonne éducation à l'ancienne, le jeu n'a pas de tutoriel et c'est au joueur de tout découvrir, depuis la signification des icônes jusqu'à l'utilité de toutes les activités qu'il est possible de faire faire à sa fille.

Élever la fillette passera chaque mois par la conception d'un emploi du temps. Sur 3 semaines de 10 à 11 jours, on lui choisira des activités (1 par semaine) pour modifier ses statistiques, gagner de l'argent, partir à l'aventure, etc... 
Chaque activité agira sur une ou plusieurs de ses stats en les augmentant ou les diminuant. Le travail nous fera également gagner de l'argent (si pas d'erreurs commises pendant les jours de travail), argent qui ne tombe pas du ciel (sauf une fois dans l'année, c'est la pension du héros) et qu'il faut gagner pour nourrir notre fille et lui permettre de prendre des cours, cours qui permettront d'augmenter des stats spécifiques que travailler ne permet pas ou peu. Mais comme vous le savez tous, travailler et étudier génère du stress. Plus le stress est élevé, et plus la gamine est susceptible de faire des erreurs au travail. Il faut donc également lui donner l'occasion de souffler en lui donnant du temps libre ou en partant en vacances.
Les statistiques dans le jeu sont nombreuses et agissent sur beaucoup de choses. Par exemple, une bonne endurance facilite la réussite au travail, augmente les points de vie et évite de tomber malade. La morale évite que notre fille tombe dans la délinquance. Mais attention aux effets à double tranchant. Par exemple, avoir une haute sensibilité permet de voir les esprits et parler aux monstres, mais si la sensibilité est sa stat la plus haute, la fillette peut s'enfuir et se cacher durant tout un mois. Bref, je ne peux pas parler de tout, mais les stats de notre fille sont ce qui régit globalement les événements du jeu. Et comme il y en a beaucoup, c'est compliqué.

Contrairement à [i]Princess Maker Refine[/i] premier du nom, dans [i][b]Princess Maker 2 Refine[/b][/i] il n'y a pas qu'une seule réputation à augmenter pour déterminer la fin qu'obtiendra notre fille, mais 4 différentes. Il y a une réputation sociale, de combat, de magie, et de...tâches ménagères. En fonction de leur niveau (et de certaines stats), on obtiendra différentes fins selon celle qui est la plus développée. Mais il y a aussi des fins dites "générales" lorsque l'écart entre la réputation la plus faible et la plus forte est inférieur à 50.
Ces réputations augmentent et baissent en fonction de certains événements et de nos choix durant ceux-ci, mais elles dépendent également de statistiques qui leur sont directement liées. Par exemple, l'attaque et la défense augmentent la réputation de combat, la cuisine augmente celle des tâches ménagères, et l'art augmente la réputation sociale. Attention toutefois à cette stat d'art, car si c'est la stat la plus élevé de son bloc alors vous n'obtiendrez [u]que[/u] des fins artistiques. Les catégories de fins sont soumises à une hiérarchie dans laquelle certaines dominent et bloquent l'obtention des autres. En bref, c'est compliqué.

Et pendant que je parle de ce qui est différent par rapport à [i]Princess Maker Refine[/i], notez également que dans ce deuxième jeu, tomber malade ne fait plus perdre 1 point par jour dans chaque stat, ce qui réduit considérablement le malheur de tomber malade. De plus, sachez aussi que même si notre fille fait des erreurs pendant qu'elle travaille, certes elle ne gagnera pas d'argent, mais ses stats et son stress augmenteront quand même. Voilà 2 changements qui facilitent grandement l'obtention des stats et fins désirées.

[i][b]Princess Maker 2 Refine[/b][/i] est donc bien différent du premier jeu. Il reprend la même formule, l'assouplit sur certains points, mais rajoute aussi tellement d'éléments qu'il se complexifie grandement. Au début, ça donne le tournis, d'autant plus que comme je l'ai déjà dit le jeu ne nous prend pas par la main, c'est à nous de tout découvrir. Avoir joué à [i]Princess Maker Refine[/i] au préalable ne peut être qu'une bonne chose parce que ça permet d'avoir au moins une idée de comment fonctionne le système du jeu. Mais même avec cela en tête, il y a tellement de choses à prendre en compte que ce n'est pas évident. Il est donc important d'y aller pas à pas, à son rythme, voir même de lire deux-trois guides à côté pour avoir une vision d'ensemble plus précise. Parce qu'une fois qu'on visualise une bonne partie des éléments du jeu, ça va tout seul (surtout si on sait utiliser les secrets du jeu car cela permet d'obtenir ce qui semble en premier lieu impossible).

Je vois ce que beaucoup veulent dire en déclarant que le deuxième jeu est supérieur au premier sur tous les plans. Effectivement, il est bien plus complet. Il y a beaucoup plus de secrets, d'événements, de fins, etc... Par conséquent, il demande aussi du coup bien plus d'investissement, de volonté et de temps pour en faire le tour, ce qui n'est pas anodin. Néanmoins, il reste aussi agréable à faire que le premier (que j'ai adoré), si ce n'est plus. [i][b]Princess Maker 2 Refine[/b][/i] fait typiquement partie des jeux sur lesquels on se dit : "allez, encore un petit quart d'heure et j'arrête"...et lorsqu'on éteint le jeu, il s'est passé deux heures... Pour qui cherchera le 100%, 20€ n'est pas cher payé. Et pour ceux qui ont aimé le premier jeu et n'ont pas peur de plus de challenge, n'hésitez pas, foncez.

[code]Vous avez aimé cette évaluation? Retrouvez-en d'autres en suivant notre groupe de rédaction : [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/9753228/]On les préfère froids.[/url][/code]

author: {'steamid': '76561198184767053', 'num_games_owned': 74, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 915, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 828, 'last_played': 1631944822}
review:
La misma magia que experimenté hace años, ha vuelto. 

Pasé horas y horas en mi adolescencia jugando éste título en una vieja PC con Win98... y he aquí que me encuentro una grata sorpresa al ver que el juego ha sido mejorado en ésta versión Refine. El dibujo de la protagonista, simplemente hermoso, el soundtrack es perfecto, las voces ufff le dan un feeling de mucha más profundidad. 

Actualmente hago stream de éste juego, y contrario a lo que se podría pensar, lo pasamos muy bien y nos echamos unas buenas risas. 

10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198990146480', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 2404, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 231, 'last_played': 1667042579}
review:
처음에 어떻게 시작하는지 헷갈렸지만
하다보니 조작이 익숙해져서 갈수록 재밌었습니다
캐릭터들마다 풀보이스도 내장되어 있는 점도 좋았습니다
왕으로서 딸을 어떻게 키우느냐에 따라
각 분야의 능력치 변화가 생기고 가호를 받든지 하며
각각 다른 엔딩으로 이어지는 점들이
열심히 플레이한 맛 나게 해줬습니다
개인적으로 근력도 열심히 키워 늠름한 나무꾼이나 병사로
성장시키려 노력했는데 어째서 빚더미 사기꾼 새끼한테
결혼 가서 졸지에 이혼녀가 되는 엔딩으로 갔는지 궁금하네요
몰입한 나머지 딸이 너무나도 안타까웠습니다 ㅠ
고전 게임이지만 현재 플레이해도 아깝지 않은 게임입니다
대신 옛날에 만들어져서 그런 사고 방식인지는 몰라도
중간에 가끔씩 여성에 대한 말들이 왜 그러는지는...
여튼 약간 이런 점 외에는 딱히 나무랄 데 없는 좋은 게임이었습니다
시간 나면 다음에 또 도전해서 그땐 멋진 병사로 키우겠습니다

author: {'steamid': '76561198109413138', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 851, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 817, 'last_played': 1695331048}
review:
Friend recommended this to me because I love recettear. This is mostly a menu game about raising a daugther. There's many endings on how she can end up. Her career choice and who she marries depending on how you raise her. I personally enjoyed this game quite a lot and did 2 playthrough. I'll most likely end up playing it even more. I got a meh ending the first time since I had no idea what I was doing but it was very enjoyable. The second time I got a very nice ending which I'm really happy with. 

Many of the things like stats are not very well documented so there's going to be a lot of you figuring things out if you go blind for your first playthrough which I think is part of the fun. You got speed options if you think text is slow. I realised this when I was almost done with my second playthrough.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972694609', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 170, 'playtime_forever': 715, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 715, 'last_played': 1606834561}
review:
As I approach my mid 30s it becomes clearer by the day that I'll never be able to find a good wife and have a beautiful daughter to raise. Youth withers away and the fleeting moments of chance pass by unnoticed by the spectators idly standing at the doorstep of the Future. Is it modern society? Is it how people view us, or how we view them? Is love just a mercenary's arsenal of deception, will the new generations ever reach the same happiness of our fathers and their fathers before them? Sometimes I wonder... how sweet would it be if everything could end happily as bright and strong as a fairytale.

... and that's why Pricess Maker exists! Tired of another existentialist crisis? Bored in that infinite loneliness? Feel like offing yourself? NO MORE! Get to know your new virtual daughter and turn her into a sleazy cabaret performer just like you'd end up doing in real life, because your social skills are low and your anxiety would destroy her self confidence.

Overall, a pretty solid game, I really enjoyed it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198212476613', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 213, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 213, 'last_played': 1537687354}

author: {'steamid': '76561198184136427', 'num_games_owned': 106, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 2891, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2756, 'last_played': 1662950479}
review: El hecho de que un juego lanzado hace más de 25 años me haya enganchado más que algunos AAA modernos habla de la gran calidad del titulo. No hay que dejarse engañar por su estética, el juego tiene su grado de complejidad y te tomara su tiempo dominarlo. Dado que el azar prácticamente no influye en la partida, una vez conozcan bien las mecánicas podrás planificar cuidadosamente tu partida. Hay más de 70 finales, no creo que valga la pena sacarlos todos, ya que hay varios que son malos / mediocres, pero definitivamente vale la pena esforzarse en conseguir los mejores finales y obtener una buena puntuación.
