author: {'steamid': '76561199095989919', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1201, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1088, 'last_played': 1605437579}
review: 고전게임계의 전설적인 게임. 발매된지 수십년이 지나도 전혀 게임이 유치하거나 구시대적인 느낌이 없음. 오히려 이후에 나온 프린세스메이커 시리즈들이 이 작품의 존재 하나로 전부 평가절하당할만큼 시대를 앞선 느낌임. 기본적인 육성에 무사수행이라는 rpg적 요소를 추가하고, 다양한 이벤트나 행동이 물 흐르듯이 자연스럽고 어색한 느낌이 들지 않음.  다양한 엔딩을 수집하는것도 재미 요소중 하나로, 아이를 어떻게 키우느냐에 따라 용사가 되기도 하고 길거리 광대가 되기도 하듯이, 양육자의 판단이 아이의 미래에 큰 영향을 끼친다는점이 마음에 드는 부분임.

author: {'steamid': '76561198142452530', 'num_games_owned': 311, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 3363, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 293, 'last_played': 1661255373}
review:
[h1]Princess Maker 2 Refine[/h1]

Je ne vais pas vraiment m'éternisé sur la présentation du jeu car je sais que vous êtes que là pour lire la note final.
Le jeu a été crée et édité par CFK Co., Ltd, publié le 28 Septembre 2016. 

Il a été passé assez inaperçu pour beaucoup de gens, puis connais un succès monstre grâce au Joueur du Grenier.

[b]Histoire: 7/10[/b]

L'histoire est plutôt correct: vous devez vous occupez d'une fille de 10 ans, venu d'un Dieu, et qui devra grandir tout en apprenant et travaillant (oui, on fait bosser les enfants à l'église dès 10 ans, et dans les bars illégaux dès 15 ans.). Lorsqu'elle aura atteint ses 18 ans, l'histoire prendra fin et se mariera.

[b]Gameplay: 8/10[/b]

Ce jeu est pour moi un exemple des fin alternatives: il y en a environ 30 différentes, choisissant comment vous avez éduqué votre fille. Si vous l'avez éduquer avec les gardes forestiers, elle aura énormément de force, et finira soldat. Elle gagnera de l'expérience en fonction de son métier et de ses études. Les études contrairement au travail, sont réellement très chère. C'est un luxe, mais ses compétences augmenteront plus rapidement que en apprennant via le métier, qui lui fait gagner de l'argent mais très peu d'expérience. Vous pouvez aussi lui donner des vacances sinon elle sera stresser et commencera à se rebeller (par exemple elle volera votre porte monnaie, après tout, c'est son argent à la base). Vous pouvez aussi acheter de l'équipement, la goinfrée de patisserie et viandes, ainsi qu'acheter des armes et armures, qui elles, vous permettrons de voyager. Et c'est le voyage qui est réellement horrible: musique pas accrochante mais restant dans la tête, en plus qu'elle est dans les 4 régions. Dommage.

[b]Bande sonore et ambiance: 7/10[/b]

Les musiques sont correctes, il y en a différentes, du style, quand vous êtes à l'école, au travail, entrain de squatter ou vous balader avec votre fille, et la musique d'aventure, comme je l'ai dis avant, nul à ch*er. Nous pouvons surtout remercier les voix japonaises qui elles sont excellentes.

[u][b]Note final: 7,3/10[/b][/u]

Princess Maker 2 Refine montre un réel plaisir à faire et refaire toutes les fins possibles et inimaginables. Dommage que l'aventure a mal été crée.

[spoiler](Ps: ne faîte pas de votre fille une fille de joie par pitié)[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198353983632', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 305, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 305, 'last_played': 1534839924}
review:
1で娘が貴族の嫁に行ってしまい会ってくれません。

そんな時私にもう一人のカワイイ娘を授けてくれました。
今回は冬に夏服を着せるようなことはさせません。
キコリのバイトをさせて荒稼ぎし、料理をさせまくる事で父ちゃんはお金にも困らず、美味しい料理で最高のパパライフを過ごす事が出来ました。娘様々でございます。
料理が美味しいせいでしょうか、おっぱいもすくすく成長し96㎝を超えました。すっごい！
自然と目が釘付けになってしまうのが悩みの種となっています。

貴族の嫁にはなってほしくなかったので貴族嫌いになるような漫画ばかり読ませていたせいか、嫁には出ませんでした。
貴族からお金を搾取する画家として素晴らしい成長を遂げました。
これで安心…お墓を守ってくれることでしょう。

author: {'steamid': '76561198346497575', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 16469, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7489, 'last_played': 1694942872}
review:
不条理な分、マジにならずやり込める。
初めに言っておきますが、自分はこのゲームを「育成ゲーム」とか「育児シミュレーション」だとか、そういう分類に入れるのは間違っていると思います。イマジネーション次第なんでしょうけど、やっぱりエンディングは納得したいところ。家事評価が高いだけで花嫁修行一本道はしょっぱいですし、花嫁修行についてもぽちゃ娘好きとしては、娘の体型で評価が決まるのがいただけません。
因業ルートならともかく、娘が真っ当な職に就いても程度によってエンディングでは何とも言えない評価になったりと、「いやいや、これはプリンセスをメイクするゲームなんだぞ」と言われればそれまでですが、育てゲーとしては自由度が低いと言わざるを得ないでしょう。グラフィックやボイスも古くさいですし、良いお値段のリメイク版とはいえ所詮は一昔前のゲームなんだな、という感じです。

ただこのゲーム、自分はタクティクスゲームだと思っています。
育成ゲーと言えない所以は序盤の初動の難しさにもあるんです。まだまだ小さい娘ですから、職場体験より情操教育が先だと思うんです。というか王家に仕えつつ有能な執事を右腕に持ち、ついでに立派な家にも住んでる元英雄の養育費が500Gポッキリっておかしくないですか？しかも娘って言ってもただの娘じゃありません、大事な天の授かり子ですよ。それに王家からの俸給も少なすぎです。年に一度だけ、それも500Gですよ。詩集が400Gの世界です。むしろ詩集が高いんですかね、実は一冊じゃなくて、それもダンテの神曲とか分厚いやつだったりするんでしょうか。
とにかく、そういう渋っちい金銭事情が背後にはあります。それをどう管理して計画通りに遊んでいくか、そういう遊び方が一番面白いと思いました。

つまり、良いってことです。泥えびすながら遊びようはあります。もう少し安くても良いかな、とは思いますが、オススメです。

author: {'steamid': '76561198289557268', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 1462, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1462, 'last_played': 1499016743}
review:
« Papa, Papa le garde manger est vide et nous n’avons presque plus d’argent ! »
« Ne t’inquiètes pas ma fille, je t’ai trouvé un contrat avec des bûcherons pour aller couper des séquoia géants dans la forêt de l’enfer. »
« Mais père je n’ai que 10 ans ! »
« Détails, détails. »

Bienvenue dans « princess maker 2 », un jeu de gestion et d’ »élevage » de jeune fille. 
Non,non je ne me suis pas trompé de terme, il ne s’agit pas ici d’élever un petite fille, mais bien d’élevage.
Autant vous prévenir tout de  suite, ce jeu n’est , ni inclusif, ni féministe, ni « SJW friendly », mais au contraire fleure bon le patriarcat. Tout le charme des Jeux des années 80.

Tout à commencé de façon très classique. J’étais un héros et je faisais mon travail de héros à savoir trucider du démon et sauver le monde, quand soudain, les Dieux ont décidé de me récompenser de mes hauts faits d’armes.
D’abord j’ai trouvé cela un peu étrange, étant donné que c’était les Dieux eux mêmes qui avaient lâché cette horde de démon sur le monde dans le but de punir l’humanité. Je m’attendais plutôt à ce qu’ils me punissent aussi pour avoir contrarier leurs plan, comme Ulysse un vieux potes à moi.

J’aurais du me douter qu’il y avait anguille sous roche. Naïf que j’étais.

Car pour me récompenser, au lieu de richesse, de titre de propriété, de gloire ou simplement d’une vie longue et heureuse, voila que les Dieux me demande de prendre soin d’une petite fille jusqu’à l’age de sa majorité.

La bande de rascal ! Ils savent bien qu’en tant que héros je ne peux pas abandonner un être dans le besoin.
Le problème c’est que nourrir, habiller, éduquer une petite fille, ça coûte cher : et ce n’est pas avec la maigre pension que le roi nous alloue pour avoir sauver le royaume, que je vais pouvoir nous faire vivre, moi , ma fille et mon majordome.
…
…
Oui je sais, je suis pas riche , mais j’ai quand même un majordome… Ne cherchez pas la logique ; on est dans un jeu des années 80.

Alors  que faire ?
…
…
Ben exploiter ma fille et la faire travailler comme une esclave afin qu’elle rapporte de l’argent bien sur ! Et croyez moi ce ne sont pas les exploiteurs d’enfants qui manquent.

En fonction des métiers effectués, des (chères) études suivies et  des personnes rencontrées au cours de ces 8 années, (ce qui prendra environ 4 à 5 heures de jeu), vous aurez droit à un aperçu du futur radieux de votre fille… ou pas.

Il y a en effet des dizaines de fins différentes possibles  allant de femme au foyer, à général en chef des armées, ministres, princesse, paysanne, prostitués, reine des enfers… en fonction des actions que vous lui aurez fait faire ...ou pas.

Alors le verdict.

Princess maker est un jeu de gestion très fun. 
Le nombre de paramètre que l’on peut faire varier est très nombreux, ce qui assure de nombreuses parties bien différentes et des fins elles aussi très différentes.

Mais il présente un seul petit défaut tout de même. Il ne dispose pas de didacticiel. Vous ne savez absolument pas quelle caractéristique ou quel événement va déclencher telle ou telle fin ( il faudra fouiller internet pour cela), et il n’est pas rare de se retrouver avec un fin non prévue malgré tout nos efforts.

Mais bah… c’est aussi un des charmes du jeu.

review: Easily the best game in the Princess Maker series. The adventure aspect adds an RPG element that your don't really see in other management games. Even decades after it's original release, it still adds up. That being said, though, I liked the original pixelated version much better as it had more charm. Not to mention this version doesn't actually show images of what Olive gets you for your birthday, which kinda had me sad. Overall, though, it's still a good game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198097003986', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 1299, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 863, 'last_played': 1594408008}
review:
Fun management game. So many different endings. Very satisfying to get them.

On first playthrough, you'll want a guide on what stats do and what jobs affect which stats.

Some of the pictures and concepts are sort of creepy/sus in the typical 90s Japan way. (You can marry your own "daughter", buy her bust-enhancing pills, there's a pervy dragon who gives you a skimpy costume, etc)

author: {'steamid': '76561198025658024', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 128, 'playtime_forever': 330, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 330, 'last_played': 1593741321}
review:
A resounding "meh".

The best way to implement this remake:
1) Buy the soundtrack
2) Play the soundtrack while running the DOS version of PM2.
3) Relax in the knowledge that you didn't get this "remake".

The absolute best that can be said about Princess Maker 2: Refine is "the music is pretty okay, I guess". The next-best items are "there's a handful of options", followed by "most of the "remastering" didn't ruin the original art" followed by "there is indeed voice acting".

This remaster... exists.

There's voice acting. It slows the pace of the text boxes (even when turned off). It exists. It wasn't terrible, but it slowed the game enough (due to character issues with the translation - I'll get into that) that I turned it off almost immediately.

Playing this June/July 2020, I *can* say that they've fixed the no-text issue with the ending letter. I can't call that an improvement, since it means they restored something found in the original game that didn't need to be removed in the first place.

The name-entry text is, for some reason, a blinding contrast-less yellow, hard to see, and you have to deal with it longer as, unlike the DOS version, keyboard entry does not appear to work in this section. So you have to mouse over and click each tiny letter.

The engine - the game - is almost identical to the original. It's not a remake, it's a remaster (I hesitate to call it even that, but it's still more accurate than "refine". Nothing about this seems refined). It is functionally identical to the original DOS English release, except for all the parts where it's worse.

The "remastering" appears to come 90% from them auto-smoothing the character portraits and, for some reason, re-drawing all of the Daughter at home art. The former is usually not terrible (there are even points where it's evident an Actual Human Being went "oh hell the remaster!" and intervened to clean up some colors and line quality), and the latter is legitimately fairly cute. Neither were remotely necessary, however. Even though I can agree there were rough spots in the original art, nothing done here addressed any of those effectively, and much more often changed things that were fine. Hell,[spoiler] the Prince[/spoiler] looks WORSE, given the nature of how auto-smoothing works and that his portrait was almost, but not *quite* symmetrical enough for the engine to work well with.

Speaking of art, remember the Uncensor Patch for the DOSBox version? I didn't use it much myself, since the default art was rather charming and I didn't personally find it necessary (the sole exception i'll mention in a sec). Anyways, that's been applied by default to this game -including in places I don't think it affected in the original- but appears to have been done separate from the auto-smoothing. In short, all of the uncensored things look like CRAP. They are butt-ugly. They appear to have been traced by a bored kindergartner. Also, despite the handful of options provided, this cannot be turned off, which is kind of uncomfortable during the Summer Beach events, personally. The sole exception, as with the original, is the Spirit of the Spring: her censoring is a bit incongruous in the original.

Also, speaking of crappy uncensoring - the Harpies. They're now just naked women with feathers glued to their shoulders. The feather onsie might seem a bit silly to some but removing it unbalances the entire design.

Making uncensoring an OPTION would have cut out maybe 95% of the above text, but it's not. In fact, most of the options have their usefulness cut by the shaky work of the remaster. The Text Speed would be convenient - except the new translation affects sentence length, which can increase the number of text boxes, and the Voice slows it down even when turned off - which is to say, Fast Display is on a level with the option-less original in most cases. Never Wait is convenient, but much of that convenience, again, arises from it having to negate things the remaster added unnecessarily. Aside from those, the only Option of interest is the ability to switch between MIDI and WAV music (the other options are reflected in in-game menus or base DOS functionality, depending, and you can't even reload or save outside with the Options during cutscenes and adventures, just like in the actual gameplay).

Also, what the hell is with the Day/Night cycle in adventures? The timing is WAAAAAY off no matter what Display speed I start the Adventure or Month at. It makes getting through them much trickier than it should be.

As you might have noticed, my biggest problem here is that the remaster has effectively added absolutely nothing, while compromising the good that already existed. And I haven't even gotten into....

THE TRANSLATION
Here's the thing: Princess Maker 2 already has an English translation+localization. It was a pretty good one, too! It was made in the 90s, before the anime boom really hit the US, and there's a few rough spots, but overall, it was lovely and perfectly functional.

So why the **** did they retranslate the ENTIRE. DAMN. GAME?

It's not, as you may have noticed with [i]every other[/i] Princess Maker game review on Steam, a very good one. I hope CFK Co. puts the $10 I paid for this copy to good use, hiring someone better.

It is, technically speaking, functional and mostly understandable. But it, like EVERY OTHER CHANGE, is [i]completely unnecessary[/i]. Often, it even weakens things - Temperment->Personality? Art->Art Skill? Multiple instances of "decrease" being translated as "increase", multiple instances of "Daughter defeated opponent" being translated as "Daughter was defeated by opponent"? The dragon boy calling his fiancee the literal translation of Onee-san, aka "SISTER"? 

It's a mess. It's an inadequate, pointless, unnecessary mess, and frankly the worst offender of any of these problems. The character limit weeps. Ancient Milk and Valkyria's Swords' descriptions are so long they run off the box - AND THE TEXT THAT RUNS OFF STICKS AROUND ON SCREEN. 

With the exception of a handful of sentences and some names (her convincing the dragon boy to stay around, "Muscle" Halbar), it's just... pointless. The font is bad, the localization is bad, the character limits are bad, it's just.... mediocre and painful.

TL, DR: Unless you *really* love getting Achievements? Just play the DOS version.
If you do love achievements, DO NOT BUY THIS AT FULL PRICE. The best I can say at this point is it's not the [i]worst[/i] way I've spent $10.



[strike](also, are we gonna talk about how the game STARTS with you getting the "tiny child is obese" achievement? wtf Japan)[/strike]

author: {'steamid': '76561199050751530', 'num_games_owned': 40, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 8497, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 486, 'last_played': 1691837746}
review:
버그투성이임 100시간 플레이하며 찾은 버그알려줌

· 16세 이후로 오아시스 가면 감수성 안 올라감. 이건 버그가 없을 때도 있었고 한달만 안 올라가고 그 다음은 잘 올라갈 때도 있었고 그냥 계속 엔딩 때까지 안 올라갈 때도 있었음.

· 14세 이후로 격투술 가면 전투기술 50까지만 오르고 안 올라감. 이것 역시 이럴 때도 있고 아닐 때도 있었음. 바로 전전달 데이터로 로드해서 해도 똑같이 안 올라갔고 1년 전 데이터로 로드해서 하니까 제대로 올라갔음.

· 교회 보내면 도덕성이 적게 올라감. 계산해보면 A형이라 매달 올라가는 +3은 정상적으로 적용 되는 거 같고 교회 보내면 올라가야 할 분량이 안 올라가는 거 같았음.

· 남부 마지막 보물상자 열면 상자가 열리는 그림만 보여지고 칠흑의 비늘이 안 나옴. 7번 플레이 중 4번 겪었고 바로 전 날짜 데이터로 로드해서 다시 하면 나왔음.

· 엔딩 때 옵션 느리게 체크 한 후 봐도 글자가 너무 빨리 넘어가서 보기 힘듦

· 게임 껐다가 켤 때마다 옵션 체크 초기화 되어 있어서 계속 성우 off, 멈춤없이에 체크 해줘야 하는게 너무 불편함 (인간적으로 이런건 진짜 기본 중에 기본 아니냐?? 양심 있으면 이딴건 돈받고 팔지 마)

더 찾으면 추가함

author: {'steamid': '76561198358104807', 'num_games_owned': 498, 'num_reviews': 129, 'playtime_forever': 564, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 564, 'last_played': 1584138045}
review:
Discovered this game from yo boy Peebs, PeanutButterGamer (Quality Content, go check him out)

If you're into life simulator games, and being a parent this game is good for you
I love the fact that this game has multiple endings 
My daughter literally stole some of my money and bought a really bad outfit for her LOL DAUGHTER Y U DO DIS
Just make sure your daughter is really happy and have her take a break/vacation half way through the months
or she will become a gang member or delinquent 
Most of the time i like messing around to be a bad father/mother to my daughter just for fun
Sometimes our daughter talks about inappropriate things like her boobs or butt 
She is growing after all LOL 

Cons/Disappointments/Nitpicks: 

This game is LONG, it took me 9 hours to finish one playthrough of the game, until my daughter became an adult 
Besides that I didn't really have any complaints about the game. 

Is this game worth full price??

Nah, get this game on sale. 
Always try to get games on sale

author: {'steamid': '76561198194127093', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 1159, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1152, 'last_played': 1619908982}
review:
Princess Maker 2 Refine is a raising simulator that allows you the player to raise their (not-related by blood) daughter to become whatever you want her to be. It is as the adults have told many kids growing up "You can be whatever you want to be." which is true when it comes to this game. You can have your daughter become a lumberjack, a nun, a knight, a hero in might or magic, a jester, a Queen, a whore, a tutor, the dark lord, your wife, a farmer, a concubine, etc. The possibilities for what your daughter can become are endless. 

This game is a rather fun time sink as nearly not every run is the same as you might have your daughter go into other careers or fields of study, trying to make her into a promising pillar in society. Another thing to note that once your daughter becomes 18, the game will end, you will see her career, and who she is married to (if she is married to someone), and you will receive a score from god. The god will tell you whether or not you did a great job or you if you disappointed them. 

Overall I recommend this game as it is an interesting experience that keeps me coming back whenever I want to just do a single playthrough.

author: {'steamid': '76561198084279708', 'num_games_owned': 309, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 2381, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1589, 'last_played': 1621756121}
review:
Замечательная игра, которая подарила мне много часов теплоты и хорошего настроения. Но у конкретно этой версии есть несколько проблем, которые делают её чуть-чуть хуже старой версии под ДОС. 
Начнём с плюсов.
+ В игре полностью перерисовали все спрайты, чтобы те перестали быть пиксельными. Старые спрайты меня никогда не беспокоили, но новые при этом ничуть не хуже, так что, почему бы и нет. 
+ Появилась возможность выбора скорости промотки текста. Всего есть четыре режима: медленный, нормальный, быстрый и без ожидания. Последний режим полностью проматывает все анимации мгновенно. Это относится как к анимациям работы, так и к анимациям проматывания текста. Об этом чуть позже.
+ Появилась японская озвучка. Меня она особо не беспокоит, но я стараюсь играть без неё. К счастью, её можно отключить и включить обратно в любой момент. 
+ Теперь можно начать новую игру без нужды пересматривать интро. Те кто играл в оригинал помнят, что интро длится довольно долго, особенно на слабых машинах, пропустить или ускорить его нельзя. Теперь можно его просто не смотреть, чему я очень рад. 
+ Собственно, главный плюс, это возможность запускать игру через Стим, не прибегая ко всяким Досбоксам.
А теперь к минусам и просто не очень приятным изменениям. 
- Изменен принцип выдачи текста в диалогах. Теперь текст появляется в окошках как анимация, то есть, его нельзя пропустить, кликнув дважды. В оригинале была проблема - текст иногда появлялся слишком быстро и я не всегда успевал его читать. Тут же проблема противоположная, текст появляется слишком медленно и его нельзя пропустить. Выше я упоминал про режим без ожидания. В теории, он мог бы решить эту проблему и, чаще всего, он помогает. Но нередко текст в окошках диалога состоит из большего количества строк, чем окошко может вместить. В таких ситуациях, текст скроллится автоматически и вернуть его назад, чтобы прочитать начало реплики не представляется возможным. Кроме того, играя на режиме без ожидания, высокий шанс того, что вы забудете его переключить на нормальный или медленный перед концовкой, из-за чего рискуете пропустить часть концовки, либо всю концовку целиком.
- В режиме приключений теперь нельзя ходить по диагонали. Какого хрена? В оригинале можно было зажать влево и вверх и идти наискось. Теперь нельзя. Жутко неудобно. 
- Имя дочери и ГГ теперь ограничены по символам до 8 знаков, что, на минуточку, в два раза меньше, чем в ДОСовской версии. Что пошло не так? Не хватило памяти? Это ограничение означает, что вы не сможете назвать свою дочь Priscilla, Elisabeth, Annabelle, или как либо ещё, не прибегая к коверканью длинных имён. Меня это изменение сильно удручает, особенно если вспомнить, что имена до сих пор нельзя прописывать с помощью клавиатуры. Какого хрена?!
- Перевод не так хорош, как старый. Он не очень плох, особенно если пропускать большую часть диалогов (которые всё равно повторяются), но старый был лучше, вот. 

Стоит ли покупать игру? Конечно же стоит. Это всё ещё очень милая, тёплая игра, которая займёт не один ваш вечер.

author: {'steamid': '76561198388968610', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 5206, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 20, 'playtime_at_review': 192, 'last_played': 1711984330}
review:
40% 세일 하길래 돈 주고 사서 플레이 해봤는데, 너무 재밌었음.
앨범 기능은 없지만, 스팀 안에 도전과제를 클리어 하면 앨범 보는 것과 같이 엔딩을 모을 수 있기 때문에
그런 건 별로 신경쓰이지 않았으며, 재밌는 무사수행과 다양한 이벤트 덕분에 재밌게 플레이 할 수 있었던 것 같다.
가격도 그리 비싼 편도 아니고 완벽 한글화에 가까울 정도로 해석이 잘 돼 있는 게 특징이다.
간편한 인터페이스와 나이를 먹을 때 마다 변하는 딸의 일러 등등, 까내릴 부분이 하나도 없는 게임이다.
육성 시뮬레이션 중에서 최고봉이라고 칭할 정도로 정말 완벽한 게임이었음.
강력 추천한다!

author: {'steamid': '76561198396062580', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 5718, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5714, 'last_played': 1592002717}
review:
I've played PM2 when I was a kid, so I have a huge sentiment for this game.

However... if you like to collect all achievements in the games you play, you must be warned: seeing all endings and collecting all 162 achievements in PM2 is a pain in the . . . . and takes really a lot of time. Raising your daughter over and over again for achievements sooner or later gets boring.

Anyways, PM2 is nice and worth to give it a shot. You never know with what kind of daughter you will end up by taking your choices in game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198105115612', 'num_games_owned': 547, 'num_reviews': 163, 'playtime_forever': 586, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 289, 'last_played': 1663636924}
review:
Princess Maker 2 is a game where you make decisions that will affect directly who your daughter becomes. Kind of a big deal. 

You can choose what she studies, what she works with, who she talks to and if she goes on adventures or not. By updating her skills she can achieve more and all that. Typical stuff we're all used to, and that I specially love. 

This game, in particular, has tons of endings and achievements that you can get, which is great. Also you have the option to battle and, once a year, participate in a competition of your chosing. Plenty of stuff to do. 

My only real complaint is that sometimes it can get boring since it takes quite a bit time for you to finish a gameplay. I want to see all the endings, but I really have to work for them (or get an old save and try to make some stuff different, which is what I've been doing, but). Either way, it's a great game and I already like it very much. I'm ready to get the achievement about her boobs and all the devil/bondage endings possible lol let's go.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057130452', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 564, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 242, 'last_played': 1583640513}
review: You can raise your daughterwife and make her either a fighter to explore dungeons or a fine young lady to move the ranks in the kingdom. You manage her activities and each of them raises and lowers certain stats you need in order to access each activity, while also earning/spending money on tutoring and equipment. She can also become a gang member if you neglect her/make her work too much. Extremely fun and addictive, best 8€ I've spent in a long while. Amazing art by Gainax too. The translation has some minor issues but the rest of the game more than makes up for it in my opinion.

author: {'steamid': '76561199030265348', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3204, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 278, 'last_played': 1699699287}
review: 어릴때 추억으로 다시 해보는 중인데 재밌어요 ㅜㅜㅎㅎ다운로드 받자마자 여왕엔딩+프린세스 성공!

author: {'steamid': '76561198857685456', 'num_games_owned': 156, 'num_reviews': 158, 'playtime_forever': 1394, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 333, 'last_played': 1585885537}
review:
할인하길래 사서 추억회상 겸 플레이해봤습니다.
리파인 버전이라 구버전과 일러나 일부 시스템이 다르고 한글화 과정에서 글씨체 등 조금 아쉬운 점은 있지만,
음성도 있고 확실히 프린세스 메이커 시리즈 중에서는 가장 완성도가 있다고 봅니다.
여담으로 인게임 내엔 앨범 기능이 없지만 도전과제가 어느정도는 앨범 역할을 해줘서 좋네요.

author: {'steamid': '76561198183772097', 'num_games_owned': 319, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 1297, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1297, 'last_played': 1582990993}
review:
女儿才十岁就让她跑去北部冰山拿东方片刃剑和启动资金，并且乐此不疲地SL了几十次。
某种意义上也算是另类的鬼父了吧？
（还不是游戏不让我亲自出马！NMD住着大房子雇着管家，每年育儿开支才肯出500元，非要让女儿去打童工；女儿外出武学修行自己也不陪同，遇到危险还要靠管家救；明明钱都是女儿挣得还假惺惺的从中剥削一点当做“零花钱”送给女儿……）
综上所述，用游戏机制把玩家逼成带资本家的游戏是屑中之屑；即使如此还含辛茹苦把女儿培养成一国女王的我简直就是鉴中之鉴（迫真）。

author: {'steamid': '76561198192530131', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1171, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1099, 'last_played': 1587153902}

author: {'steamid': '76561198978956963', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 3602, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 424, 'last_played': 1674642932}
review:
虽然这么多年过去了，这个游戏的界面看着这么纯（古）真（老），但是这并不妨碍我对PM2的热爱。几部PM作品中除了PM1我没玩过，喜爱程度就是4＞2＞3＞5。三代因为第一眼看见王子以为是个拐卖儿童的小哥无好感，并且三代获胜条件比较迷（有遇见过999落选第一情况），五代则是因为太长太复杂。
版本目前没找到进入神秘商店的办法，另外翻译比较迷还有错别字，但不影响理解。
同时期待steam上PM4啊。

review:
pm2确实是个好游戏，但是steam上的pm2不是。

author: {'steamid': '76561198040591582', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 1292, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 855, 'last_played': 1582496501}
review:
This is a recommendation, but a tepid one. Read carefully.

This game is old and a remake, so you expectedly have antiquated gameplay elements. After a single playthrough (around 8 hours) you realize how tedious the gameplay is. From the combat to having to listen to people say the same line for the 100th time with no skip option to balance issues. 'Trial and error' gameplay. The story isn't great. By the end of 1-2 playthroughs you're burnt out on the game.

But there are a lot of good things too. The length of the game is decent for the price. There are a lot of statistics and some random variables which are engaging for a while. Dozens of unique endings adds to replay value. Cute art for it's time. Voice acting (in Japanese with english subtitles). Okay music.

This game is originally from 1993 so I'll give it some leeway on the tedious gameplay issues. But get this on sale. $20 is too much.

review: Lots of replayability, though the game does end up being very grindy in the long run. Especially when hoping to aim for the endings that require lower parameters, as it either requires knowing how to influence parameters down the line or spamming Free Time to get to the end of the game already. Still as fun as I recall the original version to be, with the addition of voices. Which can be turned off, if you feel like it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198268712887', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 968, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 386, 'last_played': 1670074084}
review:
I just finished my first playthrough in two days...And it was so much fun! The amount of choice you have in raising your daughter is amazing; it made me slightly understand how tough it is to lead your kid onto the right future.

I accidentally made her too strong and maxed out her strength and stamina whilst forgetting to boost her less physical stats as much. Make sure to raise her balanced so that she can achieve a good (or more interesting) ending! She can even get married by surprise which is even more exciting XD

But honestly, this game may get a bit tedious at times but there are always surprising events that resume interest. And it's the most wonderful feeling when you see the conclusion of how you raised her.

Seems like a simple game; but the amount of choice and variety is amazing. I RECOMMEND THIS!!

author: {'steamid': '76561197965354997', 'num_games_owned': 945, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 286, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 286, 'last_played': 1577566106}
review:
王子請聽我解釋！
我真的沒有跟奇怪的直銷商人買過任何奇怪的藥！
我只不過是被敲了幾次門，我甚至不認識他！
房間掛著的那套異國服飾只是為了女兒寫作時的參考…
真的，門衛還有將軍請先把武器放下，這個成就真的是自己跳出來的！
誰知道養著養著女兒就長得那麼大了！
我可是疫苗陰謀論者，要是女兒病倒了絕對是親自看病，絕對不會去買什麼莫名其妙的藥！
請相信我……相信拯救國家的勇者……等等，女神你那什麼眼神？
不要～我是無辜的～那個成就真的是自己就這樣跳出來啊——

author: {'steamid': '76561198283854699', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 2261, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 632, 'last_played': 1579457911}
review:
집에 있는 브금만 들어도 마음이 뭉클해질정도로
어린시절의 향수가 담겨있는 작품인데 나이 먹고 해보니
이젠 더 이상 순수한 시각으로만 바라볼 수는 없는 겜이됐네요.

그땐 여왕 만들겠다고 그렇게 길을 쓰고 별 짓을 다했는데
요새는 남성에 종속적인 직업들보다 강한 여성류의 엔딩들이 
더욱 끌리더군요. 그도 그럴게 워낙 플레이 중간중간에
성별에 따른 역할을 강요하는 NPC 대사가 많이나와서..

사실 딸이 행복한 엔딩으로만 끝난다면 주부든 뭐든 좋지만요 ㅋㅋ
성장하는 모습과 딸내미 목소리 듣는것만으로도 행복해지는 게임

해당 버전인 리파인은 성우가 추가되서 무엇보다 심심하지 않고 좋네요.
한국어 버전은 약간 아마추어 분들도 녹음하셔서 어색하고
각 캐릭터의 모습에 매치되지 않는 목소릴르 쓴 경우가 더러 있습니다.
완성도 높은 성우버전이라면 기본 버전인 일본어 버전으로 하시는걸 추천합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198346945689', 'num_games_owned': 104, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 1495, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1495, 'last_played': 1589609639}
review: This game is really complicated. It's one of those games where you'll have to have the wiki open the whole time until you memorize how it all works. With this in mind, it's fairly easy to learn and beat, but really hard if you want the perfect results. There are tons of outcomes, but only a handful that are easy to end up with. Most of the outcomes have to be sought purposefully which is where the wiki comes it. Causal game this is not, there are so many ways to make your daughter upset if you're not careful, especially if you're going for certain builds. It has a lot of replay-ability and is very addicting once you learn the basics.

author: {'steamid': '76561198141201307', 'num_games_owned': 120, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 30, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1575811889}
review:
[i]"Damn, I thought this is some kind of a 'Maker' genre like 'Super Mario Maker' or 'RPG Maker', but nope it's more of a Life Simulator."[/i]

...When I first saw this game, I was curious. After checking the gameplay of it, I was intrigued. Suddenly, I couldn't stop thinking it. It was so mesmerizing. Maybe I've never played a Japanese game before. Maybe my brain never thought about the idea of taking care a daughter as a game. Whatever the case, all I want to do is to play this game. I... fell in love with this game. This feeling.... It was so complex and mysterious.

After learning a bit of the background of this game, it turns out that the game is dead. It makes me so sad. Then, I realized that I was heartbroken. Wow, I've never thought that my feeling can be manipulated by a game. I mean, I've read stories in many other games, and I always thought that anything that happens in the game, stays in the game.

But this one.... It's different. It didn't stay in the game. It also stayed in my heart. I lost some sleep thinking about this game. My studies were interrupted by this game. It occupies my brain. All of a sudden, all the other games that I played becomes dull and boring to me. I'd forget all the flaws and weaknesses of this game. Sure, it's a tedious micromanaging your virtual daughter. It's also very old, the series itself is [i]27[/i] years old. But I still want to play this game.

I wish this game was alive a little while longer. I wish this game was released outside Japan. I wish the game received some popularity, and not just a niche thing, so I could find someone I could talk this game to.

[h1]Daughter Raising Simulator 2 (Refine)[/h1]

Okay, that one was a serious talk.

You don't 'make' a princess. Instead, you raise her! The gods have granted you a 9-year old daughter for you to raise. They wanted to prove that if humans are still good enough to be accepted to heaven. You obviously don't want to let them down.

You had one simple job: Raise her at age 10 and finish at age 18. The gods doesn't really care about how you do, they only care about the results. Feel free to raise her to whatever you want. She's a very obedient girl, and will accept whatever task you give. Just don't do the rookie mistake of over-stressing her in the first month.

In the end, she'll have to start looking after herself. Depending on how you do, you might live up to the name of the game and make her the princess! Or instead, you failed her and she becomes a prostitute (or even marry a demon!), you monster. [spoiler]Even worse, you might have failed before the mission completes and your daughter dies![/spoiler] After that, the gods will come to evaluate your parenting. Hopefully they might grant you access to heaven after you die. Or they might be disappointed and regret giving you a child (they won't punish you, that's not their job, that's the hell's job). But you don't care, because this is just a game.

By the way, the refined version sucks. The upside is that you get voice acting, remade musics, and redrawn graphics (and also multi-language support). The downside is that the cheat shop is removed and the translations were horrible (the original version actually had better translation!). Also, the random encounter mechanics in adventure (errantry) is different, so any strategies in original version can't be used in the refined version. You get a random amount of encounters per day while the original version has a fixed 2 encounters per day.

I suggest getting the original version instead of this. 

I've refunded this game because of the reason above. Until they fix this game, I'll stick to the original version.

[h1]This game, explained in terms of other games[/h1]
The parenting section in [i]Outside[/i], except you're locked in the daughter option and it's the 13th century where magic powers are still allowed in the server.

Gameplay: You get to decide whatever your daughter has to do.
Activity: Dead. No more patches. Well, it's a 1993 game being remade in 2016, who cares?
Story: Like in the first installment, it all starts by you have singlehandedly beaten [strike]Satan[/strike] Lucifon while he's steamrolling the kingdom, and you work for the king now. Then, you get your daughter from the sky. Ending: You have multiple endings, with each ending resulting in either good, okay, or bad outcome; and marriage endings, depending on your qualification. Also, [spoiler]your daughter can die if she's terminally ill![/spoiler]
Realism: It's set on Fantasy setting.
Graphics: It has some DOS-quality graphics, but the refined version only had reworked daughter portraits AFAIK.
Playtime worth: 2 hours, if it took a little bit over 1 minute to decide for 1 month. +1.5 hour per ending collected.
Remarks: There are 76 endings IIRC.

author: {'steamid': '76561198936028529', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1441, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 242, 'last_played': 1695658760}
review:
2代相比于1代很多设定合理了很多，并且时长和节奏都刚刚好，游戏性很强，十分耐玩。
不足的地方：
1.画面液化过度，虽然高清了很多， 但是个人觉得不太好看，总有一种油腻的感觉，感觉把所有的细节都给磨掉了一样，dos版和黄金版的像素风就会更好看一点，真的是有点可惜；而且主机版的pm2的女儿可是会眨眼呢，这个版本的却不会；
2.如果加上了3代4代5代那样的相册就好了！只可惜没有；
3.还有就是文本的问题，像dos版pm2所处的时代可能是为了节省空间，所以会重复使用文本来节省空间，但是绮丽版所处的时代已经不用担心容量问题了，文本却还是和dos版的一模一样，这就导致游戏npc跟有失忆症一样，除了猫眼石和东部精灵以外的特殊事件外，第二次及以上触发相同的特殊事件时文本没有变化，比如西部扎营遇到魔王这个事件，明明女儿连续三个月扎营参加魔王酒宴，魔王却跟第一次遇到女儿似的：“嗯？怎么回事？这里怎么有个人类的女孩……”
4.最后就是存档位。一代都能有那么多存档位，二代反而变少了，是想怎样啊！(╯‵□′)╯︵┻━┻
5.配音问题。其实配音配的真的很好，但是旁白的文字却没有配音，看看人家主机版（如PC-Engine版、SS版，等）的配音，旁白文字都有配音耶，绮丽版反而没了这个旁白配音，总觉得很奇怪（好啦，我承认这点是我太苛刻了w）
虽然跟个牢骚不断的小基佬一样抱怨了这么多，但还是真的很喜欢Princess Maker 2 这款游戏，2代女儿最可爱了！！mua！(づ￣3￣)づ╭❤～

author: {'steamid': '76561198025658346', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 358, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 358, 'last_played': 1574823948}
review:
If you were to purchase 1 of the 3 Princess Maker series, choose this one. Refine's quality is amazing, the PM2 game itself is very well done. You really feel like an active part of your daughter's life. There's a lot of replayability that you could leave up to chance, your decision making, or follow guides to get the perfect achievement. 

The only flaw with this Steam game is, the achievements aren't in sync - I got achievements for things I haven't quite done yet! But the game is more important to me than Steam things- so not a problem for me.

review: 근 30시간 동안 일곱명의 딸을 키우면서 크게 눈에 띄는 버그는 발견 못했다. 성질 급한 한국인은 음성은 끄고 하길 추천한다. 중세 유럽 12세기경 잘 포장된 무법천지 같은 배경이니 보수적인 사람들은 21세기 근현대인 시각으로 접근하면 곤란할듯 하다. 닭 한마리 안먹는다 생각하고 질러라.  절대 돈이 아깝지 않다. 만약 가격보고 옛날 게임 이 돈 주고 사자니 돈 아깝다는 생각이 든다면 당신은 당장 이직준비 부터 하여 삶의 질을 높이길 바란다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198197468367', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 530, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 251, 'last_played': 1690130863}
review:
对女儿十分执着的我来点评了
玩过1.2.3.4.5代
印象最深刻的还是2代和4代！强烈推荐游玩！跟4代相比2代多了RPG的元素，玩法更肝了，立绘剧情比不上4代，但是2代玩的是情怀啊，身材系统比4代强，而且身材系统过于真实了，基本穿不上礼服 。。。。

author: {'steamid': '76561198272394908', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 419, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 254, 'last_played': 1602833274}
review:
Probably one of the best stat raising game I've ever played.

The difficulty is doable, but it's definitely on the harder side. Raising your daughter to be the ruling queen is a mighty task, but you'll get the gist after several game plays.
In my opinion, the art gets more charming as time passes, making it a timeless classic.

I can't really point out the bad qualities since I'm playing this game as a time killer, so overall I definitely recommend this game!

author: {'steamid': '76561198076867319', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 1746, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 643, 'last_played': 1583513055}

review: El juego es muy entretenido, como rpg y tiene muchísimos finales. Aunque estaría genial que metieran una actualización añadiendo el idioma español. Aún así se entiende perfectamente y lo único que puede costar de leer es la introducción  porque el dialogo va en automático.

author: {'steamid': '76561198136820535', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 967, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 967, 'last_played': 1571502312}
review:
自己是初玩,雖然是20多年前的遊戲,系統仍讓人覺得很有趣,
提供很多方法培養女兒,而且幾乎有全程語音,
音樂也是遊戲很神奇的地方,主旋律平常輕快,
女兒生病時只是同一首BGM改變節奏就表現出沉重氣氛,
現在很少有遊戲BGM使用這種有趣的表現,
隨著培養女兒進行,若滿足某些條件也會加入很多隨機與突發事件,
最後根據女兒培養的方向提供不同結局,去海邊還能看女兒裸體!
是非常有誠意的作品

review: This is basicly a child bride grooming simulator. The first game ended with your daughter getting a job. This game only ends at 18 with her getting married, and only who she marries scored for sucesss. Meanwhile the bulter keeps telling her anything over 110 pounds is too fat, youre encouraged to put her in progressively skimpy outfits and at a meer 8 shes already worried about her bust size. YIKES this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198018566461', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1238, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 434, 'last_played': 1687711584}
review:
왜 사람들은 프린세스 메이커하면 프린세스 메이커 2가 떠오르는 걸까요?
가장 기억에 남고, 지루한 부분또한 없는 프린세스 메이커 2는

author: {'steamid': '76561197992205413', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1569941304}
review:
이제 와서 플레이 할 생각은 없지만 학생 때 얻었던 그 때의 그 감동에 조금이나마 보답하고자

몇십년만에 오랜만에 듣는 BGM에 어린 시절 행복했던 기억이 떠오릅니다. 
말해봤자 입만 아픈 명작 중의 명작.

의외로 전 캐릭터가 풀더빙이 되어 있어 놀랐습니다. 학생 때는 없었는데, 귀여운 딸의 목소리를 전부 들어보고자
다시 플레이할 의욕이 생기네요.

author: {'steamid': '76561198281743635', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 653, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 653, 'last_played': 1557301959}
review:
가이낙스의 명작. 추억의 고전 육성 시뮬레이션 게임. 프린세스메이커2

판타지를 배경으로 소설같은 탄탄한 스토리와 설정을 갖고 있다. 

시리즈별로 있는 이런 깊은 설정들은 게임을 통해 숨겨진 설정들을 찾아내는 재미도 있으며. 
프린세스메이커를 소재로 한 가이낙스 애니메이션에서도 공통점을 찾아볼 수 있다.

이런류 게임이 주류가 아닌 당시 딸키우기 라는 새로운 장르의 시작을 연 작품이기에 
게임 그 자체의 가치도 높다고 판단된다.

추천 : 도전과제 달성 , 추억의 고전게임

author: {'steamid': '76561198119699751', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1283, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 783, 'last_played': 1618003932}
review:
Princess Maker 2 is certainly something of a game. I remember first seeing it on a PBG video. A couple years later i finally have it.
The game is actually very interesting and fun to play and I was surprised to see how long ago this game was made. It does have a few translation errors though but not enough to make it bad or unplayable. I have had a lot of fun playing this game. Its very engaging and quite nerve racking though. From what I have noticed it seems the easiest path to get is you daughter to become a warrior or general or fighting instructor simply because the things you do to get to that point make it easier. So this makes multiple play throughs harder because i am gonna be always tight on money early on and it makes everything difficult so I fall back on the easy path. But this does provide a unique challenge and experience. I love how much depth this game has for how old it is. The art style is cute and has this 80's and 90's anime style I find so damn charming. Not a single playthrough will be the same. Who knows what could happen. And the stress this game makes you feel sometimes is almost like you're a real parent but I wouldn't know so the previous statement is useless. Overall I would 100% recommend this game, or at least try it out. It is absolutely lovely and just a good experience. I can't praise the game enough for the fun time I have had. Though I will say keep the volume down because your daughter's voice may give anyone in the other room the wrong idea. Anyway just try it out.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056070829', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 520, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 520, 'last_played': 1540158348}
review:
Raise a beautiful young daughter by the blade, the broom, or by the word. She'll be hungry a lot though because as a father you're unwilling to spend money on her unless she can gave you that money from her work in the first place. Raally hard to enjoy if you're new to the genre and there's a lot of other choices on the market. This is moreso nostalgia express than a real market contender.

ehhhhhhhhhh.... 6.5/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198843051411', 'num_games_owned': 518, 'num_reviews': 1147, 'playtime_forever': 668, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 324, 'last_played': 1563128800}
review:
首先感谢黄油大师和制作人给予我这次评测《美少女梦工厂2重置版》的机会。

其次我给予这款游戏一个8分的评价——尽管说《美少女梦工厂重置版2》的原型游戏《美少女梦工厂2》上市时间是1994年，距今已然有25年历史，但是作为《美少女梦工厂》系列作品中的一部它的可玩性仍然非常的充足。

我个人推荐能够接受古典画风的养成类游戏玩家体验一番《美少女梦工厂2重置版》，作为美少女养成系列作品的第二部，它仍旧是那么的值得一试，即使是再多的时光悄然离逝，养成女儿的快乐，感动和成就感果然还是会令人念念不忘。

[h1]游戏背景[/h1]

游戏的背景是有一个王国不识天数，胡作非为遭到了上天的厌恶，最终魔王来到世间毁灭这个王国，就在王国即将倾覆，一切将无可挽回之时，神秘的主角猛然出现作为救世主拯救了这个王国，并且得到了神女的召唤被赐予了纯洁无瑕的孩子。

[h1]游戏主线[/h1]

游戏的主线就是作为勇者要在8年的时光里通过各种手段将这个孩子养大成人——不过可疑的是，救世主勇者一年的俸禄才区区500金币，竟然还要依靠女儿打工才有资金带女儿去旅游，这可真是……可悲可叹啊！

[h1]重置内容[/h1]

与94版的《美少女梦工厂2》相比2016年九月登录steam的《美少女梦工厂2重置版》除了保留了经典的游戏过程和古典的游戏画面之外，还增添了全新的cv。

[h1]游玩过程[/h1]

游戏游玩时除了要通过各种各样的教育培养女儿的各种属性，还需要让女儿打工挣钱来养活自己，让女儿去各地修行提升自己，让女儿去拜访各种各样的人物来提升自己，购买各种强大的武器装备来让女儿变得无可匹敌。、

[h1] 存在不足[/h1]

不过实话实说，因为游戏太过古老的缘故，看着古典画风的像素小人评测者个人实在是一言难尽，真的是只推荐能够接受这种古典画风的玩家尝试——画面重置不求像是5代一样优秀，最少也要把像素感降低一些吧？

[quote]欢迎加入[url=https://steamcommunity.com/groups/HY_Master]黄油大师[/url]，一同挖掘好玩的游戏吧~
欢迎关注[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/33741419/]黄油大师鉴赏家[/url]，查看趣味性评测
各种类型应有尽有。加入我们，搜寻更多精品游戏吧！[/quote]

review: A childhood classic that I had an unhealthy obsession over. Incredibly immersive and wild! I cant remember how many fighter saves I made in order to defeat the god of war himself! So when refined came along, it was an instant grab. Too bad that the cheat shops were left out tho.

author: {'steamid': '76561198023286742', 'num_games_owned': 1463, 'num_reviews': 247, 'playtime_forever': 1253, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 309, 'last_played': 1563439995}
review:
Nejak okolo roku 1995 firma Gainax urobila pokračovanie konzolovej hry Princess maker a bola to taká bomba na tú dobu,že sa mal dokonca urobiť PC port.Nakoniec z toho nič nebolo a tak sa na PC pod dosbox dostala až pomocou emulácie.
Čakalo sa 20 rokov a konečne niekoho napadlo to na PC prerobiť.Samozrejme sa jedná o remaster kde je zmenených len pár detailov inak hra zostáva úplne rovnaká.

Príbeh:
********
Kráľ vám zverí do opatery 10 ročnú princeznú a vy do jej 18 narodenín ju máte vychovávať.Čo z nej vyrastie je len a len na vás a možností je neúrekom....teda 74 ale myslím že je to slušné číslo.

Graficky ani zvukovo sa nejedná o nejaký zázrak,grafika je väčšinou statická iba rpg časť je riešená formou JRPG alias prvotiny final fantasy hier.

Gameplay:
*************
Napriek tomu,že drvivou časťou hry je klikanie na štatistiky je hra mimoriadne zábavná.Celé vychovávanie totiž spočíva v tom ako hospodárite s peniazmi.

Ak chcete princeznú vážne niečo naučiť musíte ju poslať pracovať lebo každoročný príjem od kráľa je naozaj málo.Samozrejme okrem práce nezabudnite jej dávať aj čas na zotavenie lebo inak by ušla z domu a vychovávala by ju ulica a nie vy.No a z nasporených peňazí ju môžete konečne posielať do školy lebo ak ju tam nepošlete tak z nej bude akurát robotnícka trieda.

Každoročne sa potom konajú turnaje v niekoľkých kategoriách kde vaša zverenkyňa môže ukázať čo sa za rok naučila a ak skončí do 3 miesta tak výhra vám zabezpečí jej ďalší rozvoj. 

Achievementy:
*****************
Zamestnaní je tak veľa,že splniť všetky je dosť časovo náročné aj keď niekedy stačí zmeniť jeden detail a máte z nej inú profesiu.Takže celkovo hodne náročné na splnenie.

Zhodnotenie:
***************
Jedná sa o výbornú zábavu kde tých 8 rokov dohráte síce za jeden deň čiže tak 8-10 hodín ale máte toľko možností že toto dohrať na max je hodne na dlho.A navyše veľmi chytlavé takže skúste a zistíte že sa od toho neodtrhnete pokiaľ to na jeden záťah nedohráte.
Nemám čo dodať:10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198368639635', 'num_games_owned': 121, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 217, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 217, 'last_played': 1619682130}
review:
게임 설명
육성 시뮬레이션 게임입니다.
인간들을 구원한 용사인 주인공은 신으로부터 딸아이를 내려받아 11년동안 이를 키우게 됩니다.
게임의 시작점은 신으로부터 아이를 받은지 1년 뒤인, 아이가 10살일 때부터입니다.
아이에게 아르바이트를 시키거나 학습을 시키고, 선물을 사주는 등의 플레이를 하게 됩니다.
아이가 성인이 되면 엔딩을 보게 됩니다.
리뷰
개인적으로 작중 딸은 프린세스 메이커 시리즈 중 가장 예쁜 딸이 아닌가 생각합니다.
웃는 모습이 특히 귀엽습니다.
수확제에서 콜로세움 경기를 보는 재미가 있습니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971468331', 'num_games_owned': 2419, 'num_reviews': 138, 'playtime_forever': 232, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 232, 'last_played': 1562026852}
review: For an old dos game,  its still highly playable and fun.   Sure, it can be difficult to learn the mechanics at first and you'll struggle to find a viable route but once you figure how to balance your stats with a stable income then you can start exploring the huge amount of possible different endings giving a rather large amount of replayability.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077986609', 'num_games_owned': 184, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 2954, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1740, 'last_played': 1682485017}
review:
Princess Maker 2 es un juego de elecciones, en donde luego de salvar al reino el cielo te da de regalo una hija.
Tu mision ahora es criarla durante 8 años. Tus acciones determinaran en que se convertira (princesa, guerrera, monja) hay 74 endings, lo cual lo hace muy variado y entretenido. 

Es un juego que parece simple pero sus mecanicas son bastante complejas, toma su tiempo para poder definir la mejor eleccion para el final que deseas. Pero es altamente adictivo :) dudo que lo lamentaran.
Ha sido una de las mejores compras que he hecho, puedo jugarlo y siempre sera otra historia diferente

author: {'steamid': '76561198365313127', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 193, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1644409774}

author: {'steamid': '76561198055878689', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 267, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 267, 'last_played': 1542961454}
review: This game is weird as hell, I won't beat around the bush there. I bought it based off a review for it I saw online (via PBG), but also the fact that it's developed by the same people that worked on Evangelion! The writing is tight, the mechanics are admittedly confusing, but you get a handle on it, and the game is infinetly replayable. It really is like raising a kid- not that I have experiance in that, but i imagine it is. If you want a game you can consume in one entire manic night, put down, then replay in a completley new way on another manic night a few months later, this is the game for you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198354157938', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 10606, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1352, 'last_played': 1651898073}
review:
I click on a Youtube video of a satirical review on this game, I though the video was funny. 
Weeks passed by 
wanted to get a new game I remember the video and that it was said to be on steam.
I wanted to buy the game as a joke, so i did obviously didn't install until a month later.
When I finally played it I ended up playing for hours 
I loved it.
 

it's just so fun it's not what the title suggest it is not making a princess 
it is a thing you can do technically but not the main point of the game,
its not a game where you only dress up can girl to made her cute or pretty. 
their a purpose of everything.
It is a game where you're at first figuring out what to do on your own

their is no tutorial to tell what to do which help the games to be so addictive
eventually you will understand how the game mechanics work.
the intricate stats system, the encounters, jobs, studies and the errantry
which bring a RPG element to the game, all leading on to they're many different endings 
The abundance of the well thought out sinuous endings make the game very compelling.
The fact you can Bounty Hunter or be a farmer at the end 
depending on if you killed a monster shows how you are responsible for your daughter 
for the most part.

their is many things that make this one game unique compared to other games and other in the princess maker series making the a hard to write a review on
nevertheless in my opinion this a game 9.5 out of 10
their many reason why it not a perfect 10 out of 10 but I can't say really without going in to much details so just buy it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198139754985', 'num_games_owned': 117, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 12362, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5477, 'last_played': 1706839736}
review:
Ahh... Princess Maker 2, a game of beauty, a game of love, a game of so much, and yet, it's all so little, the time you get to play it, 8 years, pass in but a few minutes, and yet everything you do in such little time counts, from having your daughter work a farm for a few days, to slaying a god, and taking his blade, this game offers so much, hundreds of hours of experiences all pact into a single game. If there is any game I could come close to calling a masterpiece, I believe this would be the one, thank you so much for the great times i've had, and the even better times i'm sure i'll have in the future.

Edit: 183 hours... I've done, I've gotten every achievement. This is a task I've been working towards since even before I've written this comment... This game is beautiful, and throughout all of it, I'm glad to have seen it in such magnificence... I love it, I love everything. This game is beyond perfection... Thank you...

author: {'steamid': '76561198090369971', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 4842, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2017, 'last_played': 1624589314}
review:
As someone who played this game on DOSBox back in the early 2000s, I can say this version is a HUGE improvement! I'm particularly am fond of the ability to speed through the game, allowing me to play multiple times in one sitting. 

I'm very fond of games that make me think before how I must use time and resources and this game always has me trying to beat my previous play through to get my daughter a better ending. 

While I'm personally a fan of the old pixel style, Olive hasn't lost her cuteness and the game is still just as fun as I remember.

author: {'steamid': '76561198425456477', 'num_games_owned': 215, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 701, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 701, 'last_played': 1561493708}
review:
[h1] 27년이 지나도 명작! 
명작은 죽지 않는다는걸 보여주는 프린세스 메이커2	[/h1]


1993년에 처음나와 전편의 개선 할 점과 후속작들이랑 비교해도 이만한 작품은 없을 것으로 보여지는 프린세스 메이커2입니다. 현재 스팀에 나온 버전은 리파인으로 2004년에 PC로 출시된 작품을 다시 스팀으로 출시했으며, 지금 해봐도 역시 명작이라는 소리가 나올 만큼 재밌습니다.


저는 이 게임을 처음 접하게 된게 1998~9년쯤 게임피아라는 잡지에서 부록으로 CD를 얻어서 했으며, 당시에 TGL사의 마법사가 되는 방법2, 유니소프트의 레이맨, 컴파일의 뿌요뿌요2등과 함께 어린시절을 알차게 즐겼던 게임 중 하나입니다. 당시에는 모험하는걸 상당히 좋아해서 딸을 키우는 목적보다는 무사수행을 해서 몬스터를 때려잡는 재미로 즐겼던 게임으로 기억납니다.


리파인버전에서 많은 수정이 됬지만,  과거에는 1편과 마찬가지로 CG가 매우 야했습니다. 누드패치도 존재했었고, 애초에 인외몬스터들이나 요정들이 벗고다녔기 때문에 지금 생각해보면 이게 정말 어린애들도 해도 되는 게임인가 생각되네요. 게임성은 1편이 성공해서 정말 마음 먹고 만들었는지 정말 2년만에 나온 게임인가 할정도 잘 만들었습니다. 무사수행을 하면서 여러가지 이벤트들이 존재하고, 스테이터스가 전작보다 매우 상세하게 나오며, 수확제에서 무엇을 즐길건가 컨테츠들도 엄청 납니다. 그외에도 집사 큐브라는 도우미가 존재하며, 여러가지 도움이나 충고를 해주기도 하지요. 


단순한 게임성뿐만 아니라 엔딩도 매우 다양해졌으며, 전작에는 존재하지 않았던 아빠와 결혼도 처음으로 도입하게 되는 작품입니다. 1편에서 딸이 고아인 인간이였다면, 2편의 딸은 천계에서 내려온 딸로 인간은 아닙니다. 그래서 저장할때마다 천계의여신?이 나오는데 엔딩장면에서도 너가 딸을 어떻게 키웠더라 이랬더라 저랬더라 하면서 정보를 줍니다. (정보보다는 뭔가 잔소리 같지만요;;;)


개인적으로 저는 1~5편을 다해봤지만, 솔직히 2편만큼의 재밌고 완벽한 시리즈는 찾기 힘든 것 같습니다. 1편에서의 너무 심플함, 3편에서의 뭔가 2%부족한 게임내용, 4편에서의 무사수행의 부재, 5편에서의 너무 난잡함, 이런 마이너스 요소를 배제하고 보완된 작품이 2편이라고 생각합니다. 이게임은 생각날때마다 또 할 것 같네요.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006605569', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 464, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 459, 'last_played': 1564294298}
review:
steam版进不了神秘商店的解决办法:
1,下载绮丽版XP,然后覆盖steam版游戏根目录,2个启动EXE可以共存,并且存档共通,所以先进绮丽版XP(无语音)的神秘商店,然后保存,再启动steam版(有语音)
2,鼠标停留在商店
3,CTRL+Z按住后,再F9,
4,松开CTRL+Z,F9一直按住不放,
5,鼠标点神秘商店,

review:
고전 명작 갓겜 ...
사실 씨디도 구하지 못해서 매번 어둠의 경로 다운로드로만 하다가 스팀에 출시됐다는 소식 듣자마자 달려와서 제가격에 구입했습니다..!
그동안 무료로 많이 했던 세월이 있어서인지 
2만원도 아깝지 않았습니다...!!
생각날때마다 꺼내서 추억을 곱씹기 좋은 아주 좋은 게임이고...
팅긴적도없구 버그난적도 없구 여태껏 잘 플레이하구 있어용~~!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198008107842', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 925, 'playtime_forever': 303, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 296, 'last_played': 1558502331}
review:
프메 팬들이 다른 프메를 못하는 이유.

시스템이나 밸런스나 이걸 따라오기 힘들고
아트면에서도 따라올수 없는 감성이 프메2에는 있기때문.

게다가 개발사가 무려 가이낙스...
아이 키우기 게임인것치고 묘한 감성이 있는것
그리고 묘하게 어두운 이벤트가 있는게 가이낙스 때문이라봄.

그리고 제일 좋은점은 역시 리파인인점 아닐까.
3,5는 예전판 그대로고 1은 리파인이여도 너무 낡았고.
2는 리파인으로 그래픽만 좋아진게 아니라
시스템과 편의성도 좋아져서 더 좋다
일본어지만 성우도 있고...

한가지 아쉬운점이라면 해상도랑 비율정도...

author: {'steamid': '76561198278043474', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 1108, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1003, 'last_played': 1560776078}
review:
这简体汉化很不用心，比老的繁体版本差太多了。一方面简化不完整，许多地方就是套用老版繁体的，然后这种不完全修正导致了不少名称不统一的问题，比如东方片刃剑在野外宝藏中与到手之后的名称就不统一；另一方面则纯粹就是汉化出错，比如每年的收获节发奖时跳出来的大字“搬奖”，拜托，还搬家呢，是颁奖好不好。

如果不是为了当年补票，建议别入，去玩非steam版的吧。

review:
어릴때 닌텐도로 프메4를 처음 접했어요!!! 그땐... 불법인지도 모르고 불법으로 접했었지만(지금은 없는 하하 여러분 정품삽시다)
덕분에(?) 프메시리즈를 접하게되면서 관심을 많이 가졌었는데...

이번에 할인하길래 냅다 사버렸고 지금도 하고있는데 정말 재밌네요!! 벌써 9시간 소멸...
다른 시리즈도 살까, 했는데 5는 플레이타임이 너무길다하고, 3은 버그가 너무많다길래.. 
2가 가장 무난해보이고 재밌어보여서 결국 사버렸죠!

좀 야하거나, 가끔 좀 그런 멘트가 나오긴하지만 뭐 게임이니까~

author: {'steamid': '76561198105716988', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 18872, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9478, 'last_played': 1707308625}
review:
Oh, Princess Maker 2...how would I describe this to someone who's never heard of it before?  Well...it's basically a simulator game, with a lot of different stats to keep track of.  It's...okay, you've heard of "Long Live the Queen"?  That was inspired by this.  It plays similarly in a lot of ways, except with less (accidental) death, and more than _70 endings_.  And yes, in one of them you CAN be Queen!  

Tons of stats, numbers all over the place and a girly-as-eff sounding premise...and yet it's _strangely addictive_.  I have seen several people who thought they'd NEVER play such a thing get sucked into the gameplay despite themselves.  There's such a huge variety of ways you can play--quiet, "normal" and domestic stuff, fighting, magic, elegant society lady...or if you're feeling ambitious you can try to be all at once!  
You can play an entire game without EVER adventuring or doing any of the more fantasy-based jobs...or regularly consort with demons and take down the War God by age 12.  It's all up to you, and that's a large part of the game's charm.

Is it for everyone?  No.  But I tried the old DOS version of PM2 that got leaked, long ago, and already knew I loved it, so I was very glad to see it appearing in an OFFICIAL English language release on Steam.  If you're into fiddly simulator games and multiple endings, you'll at least like the mechanics of this one.  And this time, you won't have to worry about those stupid chocolates!

author: {'steamid': '76561198011082531', 'num_games_owned': 347, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 270, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 265, 'last_played': 1602481738}
review:
Гра з культової серії компанії Гайнакс, найвідоміша на Заході (проте ми всі грали в піратську бета-версію, котра так і не вийшла в реліз). А ще багато хто накатував патч з японської версії, щоб грати в версію без цензури. А там була жесть (мало того що легка еротика всюди, наприклад на канікулах на морі, так цілком собі хентайні сцени в рпг режимі). Зараз же так не можна навіть і в Японії (бо педофілія, гра закінчується коли героїні настає 18). Ця серія створила цілий жанр рейзінг симів і можливо апогеєм цьому стали сімси. Але що це я все про історію.
Ця версія відрізняється від відомої нам бети по перше войсовером персонажів, іншою механікою *так часто до героя торгаш рідкими товарами наче не стукався, ще тут трохи краща графіка і є івенти котрі я в оригіналі не бачив. 
Від новіших версій відрізняється тим що тут є повноцінний рпг-режим*як і в першій частині, потім його нажаль понерфили, тому гра буде до вподоби і рольовикам.

author: {'steamid': '76561198279812755', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 5844, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1646, 'last_played': 1675887661}
review:
It's a good, fun, time consuming, addicting game. By all means, this game is entirely a time management game dressed up in the attire of otome game, but the sheer variety of what you can do within the scope of Princess Maker 2 has always kept it full out addicting. I loved the original DOS version and Refine provides much the same experience ... in some ways. I do have some issues with Refine in particular. Some of it I can admit point blank is personal bias, like a perference to the old pixel graphics. But some of the issues are undeniably genuine faults. The most glaring is the translation. There are multiple occasions in the Refine translation in particular that feel like they were directly translated from the original Japanese, and even times where the translation is so bad that the game is actually telling you the opposite of what happened (ex: whenever you win a fight, the game tells you '(daughter character) by beaten by (opponent)' and has a similar quirk when your character dodges an attack). The original game release translation in DOS wasn't this messy, so why is it such a disaster here? Aside from offputting details like that, though, the game is absolutely one that will steal your time for hours. The real draw in in the huge variety of endings and the variety of ways you could find yourself at many of them. And that is all still very present in the Refine version.

I'd absolutely recommend this but I have to stress that if you played the original, its a hardcore mixed bag. It has most if not all of the main mechanics but the translation is far worse, the graphics are a pitiful downgrade from the original ones, and one or two of the original cutscenes seems to be missing. From that standpoint its a pretty low quality transfer but it does still play well, and if you haven't played the original DOS version then these things probably won't be as glaring as they are to players of the original. This one is still absolutely playable but....it's not as much a 'Refined' version as is it a slightly visually cheapened version of the original game. The more lewd endings are now fully available and in the game, however, so there are definitely things that Refine has that the DOS one lacked. I'd still recommend the DOS over this but this game is pretty fun even with those issues.

author: {'steamid': '76561198820644624', 'num_games_owned': 1646, 'num_reviews': 537, 'playtime_forever': 10550, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8716, 'last_played': 1641711102}
review:
小时候的回忆阿，现在玩还是很好玩，算是历代除了4代以外，最自由的一款，基本上每个职业都可以配上王嫁，父嫁，管家嫁，龙嫁
，只差在能力跟4评价控制去配合各种婚嫁的可能性。。。除了某些职业基本上是不可能完成特定嫁以外，自由度很高的一代，硬要说缺点只有两个。。
1：STEAM不能作弊很好，但是国王的新衣就是每个HENTAI的遗憾。。
2：STRAM版本改得太简单了，零用金跟对话每月都可以执行，魔王酒宴给的能力基本45点～60点，虽然信仰扣得也多，
但是整体大大减低难度，，不过对于只想拼父嫁不太理会分数的很太玩家基本无所谓A－A。。所以是缺点也是优点

author: {'steamid': '76561198024066270', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 79, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 79, 'last_played': 1546933857}
review:
It is not a refine but a downgrade and it lost it's magic along the process of refinement.
Both music quality and crisp, dubbing of characters and linguistic changes has defected the solid refinement and the incredible magic the original Princess Maker 2 had. The incredible feeling of playing it on a PC-Engine related console has been lost trough what the authors has presented as refinement, The changes has offended my delicate mind, soul and effection I had toward the original version. It is an insult for me and is a horrible sign for the generatrion of players who experience the videogames of today.

I only recommend it on steam to tribute the original version, as I believe in paying the price for the games you are playing, or at least, in my case, buying it with a discount.

Buy it here and find a website that offers the original as an online Dosbox emulator free play.

review: This game is such a fun, goof-around game! You will never play it the same way twice, especially with the multitude of possible endings. And though the majority of it is really just choosing menu options, despite what should be "tedious", it's just a joy to play, with the fun animations and whatnot. If you're looking for an ultra-complex Tamagotchi, then you should check this out. You won't be disappointed!

author: {'steamid': '76561198206993385', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 7491, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 181, 'playtime_at_review': 305, 'last_played': 1711751029}
review:
I don`t know if this is a game or a very good attempt to let you doupt your parenting skills.
Short Example: Getting a child from heaven and have to raise it, so I think it is the best to raise her to a pure young Lady by letting her studying theology and let her work at the church and at the graveyard. First playtrough, I doesn't understandt everything so I try everything. My daughter becomes highly skillt in faith and morality, has not comited any sins, so I think she will become a nun or something similar. But when she moves out the game tells me she has no real skills and so she becomes a half-nacked jester and marrys a guy thats pretending to be a wizard. The game still tells me that I have been a wounderful father. End of example.
Overall a funny game with choises and endings that normaly doesn't occur in most games, some very ammoral like whoring your daughter out.
Graphic 7/10 older but still very fitting
Music 4/10 just background
Atmosphere 8/10 you get really into the parenting role
Story 4/10 not impressive, serves as kickstart for the games events
Fun 10/10 so many possibilitys, so many things can go wrong
Price 8/10 absolutly worth it
Motivation 9/10 serves as a longtherm challenge 
Complete 8/10 worth the time and the money
Buy it if you like a diffrent kind of simulation/visual novel crossover

author: {'steamid': '76561198012341087', 'num_games_owned': 1058, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 81, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 79, 'last_played': 1574984804}
review:
Jedna z nejpodivnějších a současně nejzajímavějších her, které se můžou dostat na váš počítač. Koho jiného by napadlo vytvořit simulátor výchovy dcery-princezny od desátého roku do plnoletosti než tvůrce z Japonska (konkrétně Gainax, známí díky anime Neon Genesis Evangelion). 

Zpočátku jsem se pokušel o nastartování kariéry světoznámé dobrodružky, jenže princezně se nechtělo pracovat na poli a už vůbec né na stavbě a díky tomu nemohla zesílit. Peníze ale rychle docházeli a tak bylo třeba jednat. Ukázalo se, že jediná práce která jí zpočátku šla, byla výpomoc v kostele a výchava dětí. Výchova jí ale, jak se ukázalo, mírně poznamenávala na inteligenci (negativně). Dlouhé měsíce tedy princezna strávila v rouchu v chladné a tiché kapli. Platily dva zlaté za den, princezna ale projedla za měsíc zlatých třicet. Díky stresu se, jak každý ví, nedá pracovat celý měsíc a tak dlouhé měsíce byla princezna v mínusu a nedostávala ani dárky k narozeninám, o vzdělání ani nemluvě. 

Během dalších let začala střídat vícero prací od vaření pro místní restauraci po úpravu kadeří místní smetánce. Majetek pomalu ale jistě začal nabývat a dokonce se princezně podařilo vyhrát na místních slavnostech soutěž ve vaření. Už jí bylo něco přes šestnáct let, když si vzpmněla na to, že ještě nenavázala žádný kontakt s místními vysoce postavenými občany. A to se jí také později stalo osudným. 

Celé snažení směřuje k tomu, jakým směrem se po dosažení 18. roku ubere. Konců je udajně 74, takže znovuhratelnost je zajištěna.

author: {'steamid': '76561198241905120', 'num_games_owned': 137, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 3561, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 853, 'last_played': 1577233230}

author: {'steamid': '76561198315581588', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2355, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1457, 'last_played': 1580387466}
review:
养成游戏的经典啊！可玩性较一代有很大提高，重复玩好几轮都不会腻~
有挺多挺用心的细节，如饮食管理、叛逆生病、太胖穿不了衣服之类的生活化的小细节；相较于第一代来说，上课不会失败，打工也有一种熟练度的体现，武者修行也有很多有意思的东西。结婚与事业的分开评判也很好评呀。
缺点的话，如果主线剧情、人物互动更多一点，人物塑造更丰满一点就更好啦！另外不看攻略非常容易搞出画家、作家结局，某些数值设置也略不足。
另外，游戏中有许多色眯眯的福利场景，嘻嘻。

author: {'steamid': '76561198059519024', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 7991, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1592, 'last_played': 1579243829}
review:
This is easily the most difficult game of its sort that I have ever played and stuck with. It is a choices matter game, but rather than being a choose your own adventure, it is an adventure in parenting. It is incredibly frustrating at times and takes patience, but it managed to suck me in for 65 hours of what ended up being a very fun experience. I am quite excited to try for other endings and get all of the achievements. If you are set on a particular ending, I highly recommend using guides. The problem is that no single guide was really everything I needed. I had to look at quite a few of them.

The only major critique I really have to say is that a couple of the translations are a touch funky, but everything was clear enough to easily understand. Be forewarned that there are some very backward standards for female roles and beauty. There is some sexual content, and technically some can happen before your daughter is of legal age of consent in some countries. I kept in mind that this is based on a Medieval Fantasy sort of background, so that would not have been at all unusual, nor would the defined roles for women. 

Overall, if you like these sort of games, this is one of the most in-depth I have ever played. I had a lot of fun playing it, and I expect I will put in many more hours in the future.

review:
Los clásicos no pasan de moda y Princess Maker 2 Refine lo demuestra. Sigue siendo igual de entretenido que la primera vez que lo jugué (por el 2K),

Es un juego de simulación en el que guías el destino de una pequeña al educarla y asignarle trabajos. La música le añade un toque muy especial a esta gran obra haciendo más profunda la experiencia.

Si te gusta la fantasía, el animé o los juegos de simulación, dale la oportunidad!

author: {'steamid': '76561198068659018', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 152, 'playtime_forever': 1434, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 665, 'last_played': 1591965384}
review:
다른건 다 필요없다
그냥 건강하게만 자라다오

프린세스 메이커 2 리파인
하늘의 '목소리'가 쥐어준 어린 여자아이 1명
그 여자아이에게 일을시켜 돈을벌게하고
벌어들인 돈으로 여자아이를 키워내는 그런 게임

개인적으로 왜인지 모르게 시리즈 1이나 3보단 2에 더욱 애착이  가고
여러 엔딩을 보기위해 달려보기는 커녕
매번 키울때마다 딸아이가 농사꾼이 되겠다카더라
난 내 딸아이가 아파하는 모습 보기 싫어서 식비는 언제나 든든하게 챙겨준다
어린앤 삐쩍 마른것보다 통통한게 보기좋으며
아르바이트로 가장 쉽게 배우는 일은 농사만큼 좋은게 없다
농사로 얻은 근력과 체력을 바탕으로 검술이나 체술을 익히게 해주지만
언제나 엔딩은 농사꾼이였다
왜일까
[strike]한번쯤은 나도 풍유환 사서 멕이고 야릇한 딸아이로 키워보고 싶다[/strike]

author: {'steamid': '76561198357470381', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 4863, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2044, 'last_played': 1709099123}
review: This game is fun if you already like these types of games. It can get pretty repetitive, and you can't skip past anything even if it's just the same animation over and over again. If you are going to buy this game I would wait for a sale because, while it's a good game and fun to play, it can get boring after awhile, so getting it on sale is better because you're going to get bored with it eventually. Other than that, there are tons of endings that can be challenging to get, the quest parts are really fun, once you earn money the game moves a lot faster.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031966441', 'num_games_owned': 1016, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 2560, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1099, 'last_played': 1636673705}
review: The best Princess Maker out there, following closly by the first one. It's bascially the 1 but much more technical, with more stats to take care of, more jobs, classes... The early game is a bit more difficult than the first, but it's still very accessible once you reached year 12 or 13.

author: {'steamid': '76561198144635496', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1586, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1146, 'last_played': 1602286221}
review:
La norma general de un videojuego es situar al jugador en el bergel de la experiencia del que su premisa sea definitoria de mecánicas, historia y temática que se habran y adecuen a la interacción con el jugador. Una batalla multitudinaria que simió a su mundo a una sucesión de eras oscuras, el advenimiento de un fin de la existencia de cuya evitabilidad dependa de un grupo de elegidos o el peligramiento de un estatus cuo favorable en deterimento de un villano con fines propios...

Princess Maker sitúa el conflicto en tiempo pretérito, el mal que amenazaba la tierra ha sido desterrado, toda vida que se pudiera salvar ya ha sido salvada y a más inri el jugador está desde la perspectiva del heroe artífice de la buena obra del día antes siquiera de que inicie su propia interacción con su mundo. Desde el primer momento el jugador ya ha echo todo lo que se requería de el para hacer rular los créditos en pantalla, un videojuego completo al uso. En vez de esto último lo que rula en pantalla es una divinidad que te cuestiona el significado de tales acciones: el mal que amenazaba la zona era fruto de la acción conjunta de sus habitantes por lo que, a efectos practicos, has salvado a unas personas que en su conjunto eran merecedoras de su propio destino. ¿Realmente crees que merecen una segunda oportunidad para hacer el mundo un lugar mejor cuando no lo hicieron? ¿Serias tú capaz, ahora que no dependes de tu espada, de hacer algo de probecho?. La niña que se te entrega ha nacido bajo la influencia de la luz como el hepíteto de el ser más puro que pueda haber, tu curso de acción con respeto a ella nos mostrara cuanto tú y este mundo tuyo es capaz de crear o destruir.

El gameplay en si se basa mucho en la planificación, hojas de personaje y el eventual choice-matter que en su disposición dan lugar a una partida con suficientes opciones como para que el jugador traze su propia dinámica y goze de una sensación de libertad interactiva al tiempo que la disposición de los endings y la recompensa por la especialización de los atributos que tiende a crear rutinas sostenidas -y que apenas dá espacio a una experimentación moderada- se encarga de incentivar a la rejugabilidad por nuevas rutas. Así mismo, la propia jugabilidad se ve condimentada con eventos aleatorios, predefinidos y de clase que ayudan a hacer del paso del jugador algo más "único".
Y como no, de aderezo visual y de progresión tenemos a la infante junto sus preciosos números en cuya progresión conjunta acompaña cierto sentimiento de realizacición cuando la niña va creeciendo lenta pero gradualmente y esta va aumentando su tolerancia a la frustración y el estrés junto al resto de sus atributos. Pasando así de una niñita con un palo a una brillante maestra estratega adiestrada tanto para el confrontamiento físico como para el uso de magias, en lo que personalmente encuentro cierta catarsis.

Juego, clásico, bonito y, si lo pillas de oferta, barato. Premisa interesante con mecánicas únicas que merecen ser jugadas. Buena traducción al ingles -que si no lo sabes: pues... jódete-. Como "Resource Managment" está muy bien diseñado. Como "Choose-your-own-path" es muy rejugable. Como RPG hace delicias de la progresión del jugador. Como "Dungeon Crawler" es puramente anecdótico para con el resto de sistemas, pero tampoco se echa en falta más de el. Y, como "Visual Novel" una de las pocas que cuyo personaje femenino principal importa algo más que para hacer lewds...y de ser lo contrario no querría tener nada que ver con este juego ¡por el amor de dios no-!

*Thud-Thud*
-No, otra vez no.
-¡FBI OPEN UP!
*Explosion noises*
