author: {'steamid': '76561197977024134', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 343, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 160, 'last_played': 1499104570}
review:
你不要看我的游戏时间只有这点。

这款游戏的原版，是我当年的Skyrim。

- 那年我还不清楚单亲家庭带个女儿有多难。
- 那年这款游戏的开发商GAINAX，还没攀上EVA的摇钱树。
- 那年我因为玩这款游戏太久被家里罚站（也可能是他们看到了那“皇帝的新衣”）。
- 那年我不敢想象20年之后，我还在玩这款游戏。
- 那年我还不懂“鬼父”是啥意思。

20年有多远？

- 我不记得用什么CPU玩《美少女梦工厂2》。
- 我不记得当时我手里是否有鼠标。
- 我甚至不记得自己玩到了哪个结局，如何与朋友们交换攻略……

但我却在游戏片头想起，对哦，那女儿的确不是我亲生的。

如果你问这游戏哪里像Skyrim，请让我来举些例子：

- 老滚有几十个支线任务，本作有七十个结局。
- 老滚可以提升十几个角色属性，本作需要平衡二十几个养成数值。
- 老滚说到底是打越来越强的Boss、做越来越奇怪的任务；本作不仅如此，连见个人也要分等级。
- 老滚打完黑龙感觉空虚，本作女儿嫁出去又何尝不是呢？

《美少女梦工厂2》，GOTY，1994。

("I THOUGHT THIS GAME WAS COOL BEFORE IT WON" AWARD)

author: {'steamid': '76561198076330644', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 405, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 405, 'last_played': 1479312828}
review:
Plan your daughter’s day simulator. 

You choose what classes your daughter take, what jobs she does, and work to raise her stats. You have some other mini- games such as a simplified battle system you see when wandering the wilderness and there are set events that happen every playthrough. As a game it can be boring if you don’t enjoy stat raising as a main mechanic. 
The biggest positive to this game is making your own story as you play. Do you raise a saint, a warrior, a housewife?  Crafting your own story is where the fun is at and I find the game enjobable because of it. There is replay value in raising the character a different way, focusing on combat skills, domestic skills, and others.

Negatives
There are many problems with the translation. There have not been instances that I couldn’t understand what it meant but it sounds very off. Nothing game breaking but still noteworthy.
The end text for me at least scrolled too fast and I couldn’t see much though I think that got patched after my playthrough.  
It’s an old game and it feels old. That said if you don’t mind that it is still a fun game. 
The above-mentioned focus on raising stats may not be enjoyable for many

Conclusion. 
I do like this game and think that people should give it a try as it is something different and has plenty of replay value with plenty of endings.  Grab it on sale and give it a go if you are unsure. Watch a video and see if it interests you. I enjoy and recommend it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198049183307', 'num_games_owned': 512, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 346, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 346, 'last_played': 1487376058}
review:
[i]Princess Maker 2 Refine[/i] es la primera versión comercial que llega a Occidente. Dicho juego consiste en criar a una niña, tu hija, hasta llegar a la madurez. En este tiempo, tendrás que enseñar habilidades (sociales, de combate o domésticas) y mejorar sus atributos. 

Aunque se le clasifica como un [i]Life Simulation Game[/i] —o LSG—, combina elementos de este género con los del RPG. En las fases de juego de rol, tu hija debe compeltar una serie de objetivos en un mapa, aunque no será fácil porque luchará contra enemigos. A diferencia de otros juegos parecidos, como [i]Long Live the Queen[/i], y otros afines, como [i]Tokimeki Memorial[/i], [i]Dōkyūsei[/i] o [i]Shin Seiki Evangelion: Ayanami Ikusei Keikaku[/i]; este juego es mucho más completo y variado. Esto lo demuestra el hilo argumental del juegos y sus más de 70 posibles finales. 

Los gráficos están actualizados y son más claros. Esta versión permite apreciar los diseños e ilustraciones de Takami Akai, aunque este viejo carcamal prefiere los antiguos gráficos de PC98. En cuanto a la música, la banda sonara de Masahiro Kajihara está remasterizada y sus notas más claras que la versión para MS-DOS en una SoundBlaster 16 (y ofrece también la elección la música en formato MIDI). No obstante, la mejor banda sonora pertenece a la conversión para PC-Engine. Además, este [i]remake[/i] incorpora voces en japonés ausentes en las versiones para ordenador, pero sí en PC-Engine o en PlayStation 2.

Para concluir este análisis, Princess Maker 2 es una pieza importante para entender la cultura contemporánea japonesa por dos motivos. Por un lado, la desarrolladora del juego, Gainax, creó las bases para el LSG japonés. Por otro lado, es de los primeros videojuegos comerciales multiplataformas en los que aparece la estética [i]kawaii[/i] y [i]loli[/i], tan popular entre los aficionados japoneses de hoy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032993749', 'num_games_owned': 2098, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 700, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 659, 'last_played': 1663549068}
review:
[h1] Princess Maker 2 Refine [/h1]
Ever wanted to create a princess and decide her fate? No? I was in the same boat until I played Princess Maker 2. The game is essentially about you shaping your princess' fate, whether it is working at a farm, dancing, slaying a god, making her mad so she runs off into the slums and becomes a prostitute, followed by you being scolded by an angel, because you're a horrid dad? There's an ocean of possibilities, you basically watch your princess work, study, relax and grow up the way you want her to. There's even some JRPG elements thrown into the mixture if you choose to make her a warrior of some sort. Depending on the route you choose different mini-games occur which could help you in you journey of watching your child grow up. The game has an insane replayability, with the multitude of endings you can strife for.
 
[h1] Final Thoughts [/h1]
Princess Maker 2 Refine truly is a game that has aged well! It's extremely fun as well as satisfying seeing how your princess grows up with your actions of what she does. I would've never have guessed this is a sort of game that I liked but in the end I actually found it immensely enjoyable and highly recommend it. 

      [td] Click [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/Kidomaro/recommended/] here [/url] for more Reviews - also follow my [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/36435986/] Curator Page [/url] if you want more recommendations. [/td]

author: {'steamid': '76561198053722597', 'num_games_owned': 2077, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 9642, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4088, 'last_played': 1679639523}
review: This game is as fun to play now as it was back when I first discovered the abandoned English translation many years ago. The refinement is mostly positive, with my only "complaint" being that I am still adjusting to some very minor differences in translation (for example, the charisma stat is now labeled as glamour). The improved artwork and soundtrack enhances the experience and the inclusion of voice acting is a treat despite being only available in the original Japanese language. The developers are taking customer feedback and improving the release all the time. I cannot recommend this game highly enough!

author: {'steamid': '76561198080165705', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 313, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 313, 'last_played': 1479976066}
review:
Before I say anything else. This is a good game. Raising a daughter who can kick a god's ass in under 3 years is a blast an there are a lot of cute events here and there to get you attached to the little darling.
There are a lot of good things to be said about having a version of this game you can play without using dosbox. As with all things though there are a few points that need to be addressed.

Localisation - could you please make a thread where we can submit ideas for better translations or something?
Cheat shop - yes, it wasn't meant to be in the game but it's a part of this game's history that everyone kinda became used to.
Lack of new features - this is the classical princess maker 2 experience. In all ways. Don't expect any new events.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017969451', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 2685, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 314, 'last_played': 1672185462}
review:
I've played Princess Maker 2 for many years (in the original DOS form, and the Japanese version of Refine), and it is one of the few games that has stood the test of time. With well over 40+ endings, it never gets old, and remains a great challege to get them all! With beautiful art, many choices, and many ways to manage raising your daughter... it is one of my personal favorites of all time.

The company that did the English Translation did a pretty good job. There are a few hiccups here and there with text speed in some areas, but they do not kill or ruin the game in any way. I highly recommend this game for folks who like managment games, raising sims, games with many hidden secrets, and games with many options! Princess Maker 2 Refine does not disappoint!

review:
i normally don't write reviews but in this particular case i feel i should.
this is a rerelease of a classic raising sim, in fact unless i'm very much mistaken it's the sequel to the game that created the genre.  it's pretty well made, there were a few glitches with achievements at launch but it seems like most of the bugs have been ironed out.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044116387', 'num_games_owned': 362, 'num_reviews': 104, 'playtime_forever': 1720, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1568, 'last_played': 1521989024}
review:
为童年买单。
美少女梦工厂2的武术修炼是全系列中最有特色的，单单多出这么一个系统就多出很多玩法。
现在几乎已经找不到什么像样的养成游戏了，美梦2算是成熟的养成游戏加上半个RPG游戏。
全配音，立绘也重新画过，不过小头像没有重置。
（女儿满15岁后的小头像有一张眼睛画的像螳螂眼一样，特吓人。）
没有鉴赏模式，可用的存档位太少了。
因为年代久远了，内容其实也不算多，事件也少。
不过相对的游戏体验不拖沓，不会像4代那样刷刷刷很头疼。

然后我想说：去你大爷的！我好不容易把成就刷完了你又更新成就！就不能一次定好吗！

author: {'steamid': '76561198004493142', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 940, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 671, 'last_played': 1565910752}
review:
Я знал, что этот день наступит. Я знал. 199 банок тушонки. 28 ящиков водки. 80 ящиков морали. И все ради этой игры. 
Если коротко - вам предстоит выступить в роли отца, который отправляет вашу дочь на лесопилку из года в год. 
Если более детально: игра с гигантскими масштабами, куча секретов (попробуйте поспать в четверг возле пещеры демонов. Вас удивит результат). Убейте бога войны. Убейте всех. Или нихрена не делайте и работайте на лесопилке. В совершеннолетие ваша дочурка чирканет вам элегантное письмо, в котором в подробностях распишет вам, как ей сладко жилось. 
Эй! Это же симулятор! Не жалуемся! Надеюсь, они оставили те похабные моменты, которые были в оригинале... 
Так, а теперь для тех, кто не в курсе. У вас есть дочь. Ее надо воспитать. Как - зависит от вас. Она может стать продажной жрицей любви или же принцессой. Я бы назвал это симулятором отца, будь у меня поддержка короля, но... вы поняли.  Вас ждет куча интересных событий, куча невероятных происшествий, куча... да куча дерьма даже. Все зависит от того, как играете. Извините, но руки уже дрожат, я побежал, мне нужно пройти эту игру в 52 раз.

author: {'steamid': '76561198127287880', 'num_games_owned': 91, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 223, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 223, 'last_played': 1478180299}
review: 小时候4399上有盗版，每次上网都喜欢跑去玩这个，真是童年回忆，现在补票正版，重玩还是非常有趣啊，虽然是很老的画风了但是女儿真是萌出血(¯﹃¯)，可玩性很高，美中不足是几条爱情线都太仓促了，有种勾搭到手就完事的蹩脚感，只能当做攻略对象来攻略，而不是当做有血有肉的人物来喜爱，总的来说还是很强的。

author: {'steamid': '76561197996933968', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 414, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 312, 'last_played': 1563892342}
review:
초기버전에서는 버그가 많았다는데 지금은 게임하는데는 크게 지장은 없는거 같습니다.
기능면에서는 기존 리파인이랑 동일한데 오프닝 스킵 기능 생긴건 좋네요.
도스 버젼의 F3 버튼 역할을 하는 키가 부활했으면 좋았을텐데 하는 부분이 아쉽습니다.

뭐 그외에는 딱히 할말이 없네요. 원본이 워낙 만듦새가 좋은 편이라 이식에 문제만 없으면 OK.

author: {'steamid': '76561198278935806', 'num_games_owned': 23, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 83566, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 284, 'last_played': 1691531955}
review:
Firstly, I adore this game, I used to spend hours upon hours on it! It's just as good now, there're some extra features, the music is improved and there's voice acting - though I usually disable it myself.

This port is fairly decent, there are a few grammatical errors here and there, but apart from that it's all fine.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053433011', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 144, 'last_played': 1476907372}
review:
추억팔이외에 뭐 얻을건 없었고  그마저도 그래픽수정이 저퀄리티라 완벽히 느끼기힘들다.
도트그래픽을 그대로써서 개발하긴힘들었을까, 도트쪽이 더 퀄이 좋았다.
세월이 가고 자라며 변한 개인적, 사회적 가치관으로 당시에 못느꼈던 비합리적인 부분들을 느끼는 것도 
추억의 게임을 하며 느끼는 재미가 될 수도 있겠지만
나로서는 과거의 추억을 흐리기만하는 불유쾌한 결과가 되어 삭제하게되었다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198034472251', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2960, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1574, 'last_played': 1521763825}
review: This is one of my favorite childhood game. I am so glad that they have brought it back/update it to a point where I can just play it on the modern computer whenever I want. Kinda wish they didn't remove the cheat code from the original version. But still tons of fun to play.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995945436', 'num_games_owned': 521, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 966, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 957, 'last_played': 1483419919}
review:
It's certainly PM2 all right and still just as fun but as mentioned it does have several issues.

- Translation is pretty subpar. They really need to get someone to localize it better / fix several programming issues.
- End text just fast forwarded through every dialogue box even though I never pressed or changed the setting to do so.
- Strange audio levels which leaves combat sounds much louder than the rest of the sfx.
- Don't really dig all the new art and some of the scenes border on questionable taste with less censorship than the DOS version. Would prefer an original art option like they offered with the WAV / MIDI choice.

I picked it up due to the amount of time I put into the DOS version and with hope that this one is "refined" a bit further.

author: {'steamid': '76561198257277323', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 910, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 563, 'last_played': 1487437730}
review:
国庆期间全成就了，给没有买的玩家来点小Tips吧，后面附带成就bug回避的方法。
1.没有神秘商店，之前各个版本的秘籍都无效。
2.没有皇帝新衣。丰乳丸健在。
3.逃犯失败事件个人不喜从没尝试过，不清楚，打还是能正常打的。
4.旅游CG和部分黑暗结局不像之前个别版本那样打了码，还是和原版一样有福利的。
5.用通用的游戏修改器就可以轻松改钱，锁属性了。

另外是一些成就Bug的解决方式，不清楚以后会不会修改：
1.女儿XX岁这个成就如果无法解锁，需要的是生日时不给她买礼物，就能正常解锁。
2.武者修行失败被吉普带回家的成就，如果无法解锁，请殴打普通民众，失败被带回家即可解锁。
3.看讨论区有些人无法解锁父嫁成就，具体我不太清楚，我二周目父嫁成功时也解锁成就了。
4.有些成就，比如打败武神，不需要打败，只需要对话就会解锁……

总之成就这边问题挺多的。之前还有些bug，不过开发还不错，陆续还在更新解决，挺好的。
个人建议如果之前买过绮丽版，如果不是特别喜欢成就功能，就不用买Steam版了，毕竟Steam版没神秘商店，其他内容也没做优化。
如果是从没买过正版，想情怀一下的，那还是非常推荐购买的！
毕竟买的多，就更快能玩到后续几代了嘛～
说不定正统续作也可以被提上日程了………………………………
我要收回之前的话了，就算入过绮丽版，比如我，你也可以买买买别犹豫！

author: {'steamid': '76561198318920224', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 482, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 424, 'last_played': 1529788946}
review:
I've been familiar with Princess Maker 2, mostly due to a Hardcore Gaming 101 article on the saga of this game's near localization back in the nineties. Being a fan of sim games and visual novels. this appealed to me. Then word came that PM2 was coming to Steam. As a port of the redone PS2 release. Well. I promptly bought it. 

Story wise, it's pretty simple. At some point, the kingdom the game takes place in got too prideful and full of themselves, so God sent the Demon King and his army after them. A young hero from the east, hearing about the people's plight, takes on the Demon King in battle, and wins. Graciously accepting his defeat, the Demon King leaves, later sending one of his warriors, Cube to serve as your butler. For what it's worth, this tidbit is never mentioned in game, only in extra materials. Anyway, at some point afterwards, Heaven sends you a little girl to raise. You shape her personality through jobs, classes, and errantry. Money WILL be tight, as you only get 500 gold a year, and your little girl helps with her earnings. 

For those who like getting Achievements, this game is a tad wonky when it comes to receiving certain ones.  There's also the translation, which is still a bit off. The developers are working on this, though. The PM community is passionate about these games, and they are considering releasing the others here on Steam (Yay!).

What will your daughter grow up to be? Will she survive to adulthood? Will she marry the Prince? A dragon? Your butler? Will her heavenly guardian chew you out for being a bad parent? There's twenty different endings, some of which overlap in a way.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079286823', 'num_games_owned': 458, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 448, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 388, 'last_played': 1476848342}

author: {'steamid': '76561198074817128', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 6123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3687, 'last_played': 1625354626}
review:
설명이 필요없는 명작!
50시간 이상의 플레이 끝에 올스탯999+4대평가 999로 여왕엔딩 봤습니다.
어디서 한 번 놓쳤는지 왕자와의 결혼이 물건너가는 바람에 1799점이 되어버렸지만 ㅠㅠ
치트 없이 공략 같은 거 보지 않고 이리저리 고민해보는 게 역시 제일 재밌네요
ㅎ어릴때 도스판이나 윈도우판 어디서 구해서 많이 했지만 정작 정품 산 적이 없어서
이참에 한 번 사봤는데 후회없습니다. 안해보신 분들은 특히나 꼭 해보시길.

author: {'steamid': '76561197982856637', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 186, 'last_played': 1476885988}
review:
個人的にはシリーズ最高傑作！そして全ての育成ゲームの中でも１，２を争うほど面白いです。
Refine版の声優さんは西村ちなみさんのようですが、
PCEやセガ版の久川綾さん、FMTOWNSの笠原弘子さん版も味があってオススメなので
これを機に中古ショップをあさることをお勧めします。レッツコンプリート！私は久川さんが好きです。

ゲームの流れは、オーソドックスな育成ゲームでRPG要素もあり。
天界の娘を義父として育てるゲームなのですが
いい子に育てたり、色んな意味で悪い子に育ったりと
８年後の能力値やそれまでのプレイ内容でエンディング（最終的に就く職業）がマルチに変化します。
最近のゲームでは考えられないくらい細かい条件で変わるので、かなりリプレイ性は高いです。

BGMもいいですね。特に夏のBGMが好きでずっと聞いていられます。

初プレイ時は小学生だったのですが、最初につける名前に真剣に２時間ほど悩み、
当時声優さんについて詳しくなかったにも関わらず偶然「綾」というまともな名前を付けた私は
間違いなく将来結婚して子供が生まれてもキラキラネームはつけません。
安心して私と結婚して下さい。
あの頃から父性というか保護欲のようなものが芽生え、
ロリキャラに対して萌えるよりもきちんとした大人としての目線を持つことが出来たので、
お子さんが将来ロリコンにならないための父性を育むゲームとしてもおすすめです。
王子にすらコイツどこの馬の骨やねん、うちの娘をやるかボケという気持ちを抱くことができます。
ただコスチュームチェンジの時に裏技で裸にできたり、
主人公である自分との結婚ルートもあるような気もしますが、そんなことは忘れました。
ダメな感じに育てると、将来割とリアルな職業に就くので幸せな将来を送ってもらう為にも
真摯に向き合い、子の幸せを一番に考えた育成をしましょう。

なのでみなさんも、実際に子育てする時はプリメ感覚で真剣に育てましょうね。男は知らん。

author: {'steamid': '76561198040574217', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 111, 'playtime_forever': 848, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 710, 'last_played': 1477816109}

review: In the old translation your daughter had a stat called "Sin." It Is now translated as "Karma." Completely lost the appeal, if you ask me. I don't want to raise a fukken hinduist.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072521694', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 340, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 224, 'last_played': 1477090536}
review:
I bought this game out of nostalgia. I don't really regret it either. I love Princess Maker 2. However, there are a few things that I definitely think can be improved upon:

1) In the orginal DOS game at the end of the game you get a letter from your daughter. She tells you her favorite subjects, what she remembers doing the most, etc. Instead, in Princess Maker 2: Refine, it shows a picture of your daughter, has her speaking in Japanese and absolutely no translation which is honestly super disappointing. (Disregard, I see they did an update last night that should have fixed this issue. I'll have to play through and see how it is!)

2) I wish the menu/interface were a little less clunky? I had the speech setting sped up to 'fast', and I got to the ending where my "daughter" became a mistress (oops). I was unable to change the text speed to read the conversation between her, Cube, and the man proposing to "my daughter". It kind of detracted from the ending since the speech went too fast and I was unable to change it back.

3) I think the translation needs a bit of work, and I saw in the recent updates that they have addressed that issue. In the original DOS game your "daughter" has a "Sin" stat bar, in Princess Maker 2 : Refine it's called Karma. It took me 2 play throughs to see that getting Karma up was not a good thing. This is due to the fact that I didn't think hunting would increase sin, and my first play through ended up with a thug ending because her sin was pretty high. I really hope to see an update with sentences and such fixed. I am not sure what it is supposed to mean when you lecture your daughter and she responds with "but she was not satisified".

Overall, I love this game. I'll keep playng until I get all 74 endings, I'll do all the marriages and I'll enjoy myself. I think I would recommend this to anyone who hasn't played it in their childhood, but is still interested in raising sims. With 74 endings, and so many different things you can do I don't know how you can't be entertained. I am really hoping the sales of this game will inspire them to translate and bring over Princess Maker 3, 4 and especially 5.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013549332', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 234, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 234, 'last_played': 1475325903}
review: All those Hanako games that we all know and love, this is the game that defined their genre. It's old, it's rough around the edges, but it's still every bit as fun. 100% recommend. And who knows, maybe if we buy it they'll give us translations of the other games? (Please!)

author: {'steamid': '76561198020170064', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 779, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 703, 'last_played': 1487699517}
review:
I am glad that this game finally got an actual english release after 20 odd years of being lost in translation, as I like to put it.  Very very glad to see this here, it's one of the better simulation series games and I'm really excited and hoping for PM4 and PM5 to finally be translated.  It has updated graphics because it's based on the 'refined' version, and it still retains the charm that I remember when I played it long ago.

Though the translation leaves something to be desired, I still recommend this, mostly because the company has taken steps to improve the game (They fixed the Fatih 0 bug and they recently translated the your daughter's letter at the end too) and listened to feedback from the fans, which is always a good sign.

author: {'steamid': '76561198328770829', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 1464, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 844, 'last_played': 1539990365}

author: {'steamid': '76561198098786405', 'num_games_owned': 168, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 435, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 276, 'last_played': 1586205382}
review:
[I played it as English, Japanese, Korean version]
The memory :') it was made from 1993, but still fun to play. I used to play DOS, window, Refine version, and now it's on Steam! instant buying lol


Pros :

- Various endings and events with great illustrations
- More understandable texts than DOS version.
- better graphics with retouched artworks
- Daughter's abilities and specifications can be different with birth date / blood type. You can challenge a specific ending even harder with different settings
- Errantry! The system from Princess Maker was great, but it gets better in Princess Maker 2
- Subtitles on endings! Originally, there were no subtitles on Daughter's monologue in Princess Maker2 Refine and his was a weakness. But after 10/12 patch, subtitles are added. OH MY GOD

Cons :
- (as English version) Some conversations' meaning are different from Japanese version. Not a big problem.
- Price. The game from 1993 is $19.99. Some people might criticize about it.
- Whenever you play this game, Errantry is like must-play content... maybe some people feel boring



Thanks to CFK to bring this game on Steam, now everybody knows I'm playing this game LOL

author: {'steamid': '76561198005771904', 'num_games_owned': 283, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 3089, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1237, 'last_played': 1484181206}
review:
I can finally recommend this game fully. I loved the original DOS PM2 game, and was overjoyed when I saw that it was finally getting an official release. At first however this game was plagued by bugs and translation errors, and the fear that this game would just be abandoned caused me to delete my first review.

However, CFK have shown their dedication. With their first two patches the game has been vastly improved. Given how amazing this game is, and CFK's dedication to fixing their mistakes I can fully recommend anyone who is a fan of simulation games or just a fan of Japanese games in general.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032589256', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1412, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1410, 'last_played': 1487602839}
review:
昔懐かしのゲームです。古臭く総当たりしないととても成功にたどり着けない難易度いまのジャパンゲー（とくにアドベンチャー）がヌルゲーだと思うかたはやってみてください。
理不尽に失敗しまくりますけど失敗には理由が必ずあります、その原因を見つけられたときの達成感はほんと今のゲームにも負けません。
後、お財布に余裕がある人はサントラを買ってみてください、DOS時代音源からCD音源への進化の歴史がよく分かります。

author: {'steamid': '76561198006795437', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 2047, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1983, 'last_played': 1476599563}
review: Some of my opinion is clearly nostalgia for the old version.  Obviously there's some issues here, it's a little dated in several ways that should have been refined for the steam release.  Pacing could be better, as could some control and interface issues, this translation has a few embarassing slip ups here and there, and the graphics can be best decribed as 'nostalgic'.  But at the end of the day I still recommend this, both historically and in it's own right.  It's an excellent life sim that still holds up and is still a lot of fun to try in different ways to try and get different things.  Finding and figuring out all the little tricks and secrets can be tricky but fun and satisfying to figure out.  If you're unsure it might be a good idea to wait for a steam sale but I have no complaints about my purchase.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027958778', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 1888, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1233, 'last_played': 1658431655}
review:
[b]pros:[/b] Cute stat raising sim with a shocking wealth of content, especially if you enjoyed the beta version as a youth. New art, new music, new translation, [b]full voice acting![/b]
[b]cons:[/b] Got some creepy stuff in it which they made no attempt to remove. This translation is a bit ramshackle. No fast forward button that I'm aware of.

My narrative is the same as a lot of people: got the unfinished DOS version as a child, played it extensively, rediscovered it later. It's a very cute game that I think ended up having a large female fanbase on accident, kind of like Harvest Moon. I hold it very close to my heart and would recommend it to anyone with even a passing interest in this kind of game because I think it's one of the best raising sims out there, but it's not without its flaws.

[b]The story goes as follows:[/b] you're a wandering swordsman, you save a kingdom from demons, God rewards you with a child. You get to raise her however you want, but you don't have a lot of money.

Each month is divided into 3 segments. For each of these, you can either:
[b]Send her to work[/b] - babysitting, church volunteer, farmwork, etc. more jobs unlock as you get older (raises stats, lowers others, gives money)
[b]Send her to school[/b] - dance lessons, Science, etc. (only raises stats, but takes money)
[b]Send her adventuring[/b], a sort of RPG overworld minigame (Yes, you can send your 10 year old into a frozen tundra with no weapons or armor if you really want to)
[b]Give her some free time[/b] (Work and school will both accumulate stress that needs to be relieved or she will fall ill)

Throughout your play, your daughter's stats will gradually shape into something that determines the final ending she gets. Will she become a member of the nobility? A child of the arts? A great warrior? Or something more sinister?

The game's most prominent feature, I think, is its replayability. [b]Notably, there are 74 endings[/b], and several possible marriages on top of that. Something as simple as your daughter's birthday and blood type might result in a different starting layout for your stats. There are a lot of hidden secrets, and you might find some of the stats have surprising uses (or consequences).

You can play the game in a lot of different ways and the game doesn't penalize you for it - maybe you want to be a magical girl and adventure every other week, paying your way through Theology and Magic classes with loot, or maybe you never want to touch adventuring and work her way through Poetry classes by working at a hair salon. Neither of these are wrong ways to play!

[b]Now, for the bad:[/b]

[b]This translation, as others have stated, is not as coherent as the original beta one[/b]. Fortunately and unfortunately, it's the worst at the start of the game and the end of the game, meaning that for the most part the translation is very serviceable, but you get dialogue like [spoiler]"From there, it would seem she made an excellent turn."[/spoiler] during your ending. Uh, what? I only knew it meant [spoiler]"Your daughter was excellent at her job."[/spoiler] thanks to having played the original.

However, the localization team seems to be responsive to complaints and committed to making edits to fix the game, including (supposedly, I haven't tested) fixing several broken achievements and adding subtitles to the voiceover-only ending after enough people complained, and there's a suggestion thread in the forums for finding typos or localization errors.

Also, for those of you hoping they removed the creepier parts of this game: [b]Nope.[/b] You can still:

1. [spoiler]MARRY YOUR DAUGHTER (it's not incest if it's not blood related, apparently!)[/spoiler], something that from the lack of an achievement for it I'd hoped they had removed for the Steam release
2. see your underage daughter naked in several vacation CGs, even if the beta version made attempts to remove this
3. hear your daughter talk to her FATHER about how she wishes her chest was bigger (please stop, oh my God)
4. buy pills that increase chest size from a shady salesman

These are gross and I wish they'd been removed. Unlike something like the shadier venues you can work at when you get older which you can argue serve a gameplay purpose, increasing your 12 year old's bust size serves no real purpose except being [i]extremely creepy![/i]

In summation, [b]if you love this kind of game or played it as a kid and are willing to overlook creepiness and translation errors, get it,[/b] it's a hidden gem with a lot of heart and seems to have a good team behind it. [b]If you think you'd enjoy it but you're not sure you want to spend $20 on it, wait for a sale[/b] or perhaps try the DOS version first to see if it's the kind of game you like before coming back to buy it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197976846524', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 379, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 379, 'last_played': 1475999803}

author: {'steamid': '76561197999600153', 'num_games_owned': 518, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1228, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 309, 'last_played': 1568769143}
review:
You play the part of a hero that was granted a child by the gods. A pure, innocent little girl who has been sheltered from the world in ways only the gods can shelter. Or at least, only the gods could get away with such treatment of a child. It comes across as being similar to keeping a newborn in the basement for the first ten years of her life, only interacting with her on a basic level and not allowing any contact with the world outside. Someone call heavenly child services! 

You have to raise her from that tender age of ten, arranging for everything from her diet, to her clothes, to her education. Raising a child and giving her a good education isn't cheap, either. How can a single adoptive father, on a stipend from the kindgom of a meager 500 gold per year, afford it? On a normal diet, the girl eats 360 gold per year, and the other 140 isn't nearly enough for all the little things a child needs, or anything resembling an education. Well, the answer is obvious. Put her to work! 

From the age of 10, your adoptive daughter can do work as a babysitter, watching over other children barely any younger than her and keeping them out of trouble. Or she could work on a farm, buiding up her strength and destroying her appearance. Or, for a penny a day, she could work at the church... she'll even get sundays off! Wait... what? 

Doing jobs and taking classes will raise some of the girl's stats and lower others, and the fun of the game is all the different ways your daughter can turn out. A dancer! A painter! A poet! She can become loved by high society, and leave her mark on the world through her arts. Or... an Archmage! A Hero! She can learn to wield might and magic, and even challenge the very god of war in her adventures! Or... A hunter! A... concubine? The [i]demon queen[/i]?!?!  You can hopelessly corrupt your child, and offend the gods with how bad of a father you have been.

The game is an interesting take on the life simulation genre, and offers dozens of endings for great replayability. Highly recommended for those that like stat management/micro management games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002868602', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 679, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 679, 'last_played': 1475961038}

author: {'steamid': '76561198007308928', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 181, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 181, 'last_played': 1475886651}
review: 删减了隐藏个商店和皇帝新衣,虽然之前版本就有删减.画面提升也不怎么大.内容感觉和过去几乎一模一样.音效满满dos感.不过作为一个超过20年的老游戏,能晚上就已经很不错了,还要啥自行车?

author: {'steamid': '76561198094970329', 'num_games_owned': 756, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 939, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 939, 'last_played': 1475844895}
review:
内容丰富，音画和谐，文字简约干练，世界观充实完整。尽管画风和分辨率已经落后于时代，但游戏本身放到现在也不过时，PM2可以作为养成游戏的教科书供同类游戏学习。
养成女儿只是一个视角，制作组提供多种行为，让玩家通过这一视角感受奇幻世界的方方面面。如果这不是好游戏，那什么是呢？

author: {'steamid': '76561198004203156', 'num_games_owned': 1489, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 355, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 355, 'last_played': 1475921289}

author: {'steamid': '76561197970573789', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1824, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1824, 'last_played': 1475864977}
review:
And old DOS classic brought to steam. The original Refine version is in japanese, and there are still several translation errors in this release. Some of the ending dialogue scenes are not even translated, so keep that in mind.

In essence this is a management game with RPG and adventure elements. Train your daughter by choosing her monthly schedule with part-time work, classes, free time and adventure. If you don't balance her stress levels with her stats, she may become ill or delinquent which takes precious time and resources. There's a limited 8 years time for upbringing, after which the ending is decided by her stats and your choices during the playthrough.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009057093', 'num_games_owned': 177, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 668, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 655, 'last_played': 1579583044}
review:
Well well well, it appears there was a patch after all. Goodie! So lets talk about the only negative; the removal of debug menu. This is a long game to play multiple times, and the debug menu helped swing the outcome of time in your favor.

Buuuuut

The game itself is still one of the most clever titles I've played in some time. For as short as I played it, I made sure to take good care and maticlous pride in raising a ballenced regal-to-be.

The elements of combat, morality, and social skills blend rather well. Coupled with reading phrases to address what should be studided, and NOT looking at the numbers all the time, this is something that in its current state, is worth checking out!



---OCTOBER 5 Original---
Let me be frank here and say I LOVE Princess Maker 2, But for the improvements made in its English release is very disapointing. Buggy achievment support, No end game text, and worse yet, typography issues that clutter the screen (I'm looking at you magic milk). Untill this game becomes fixed with an ending and better translation with achievments, I sadly can not reccomend it in its current state.

author: {'steamid': '76561197988379192', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 806, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 533, 'last_played': 1561905663}
review:
Well, well... it has been quite some time since english beta... long enough to raise a real kid, wasnt it?

If you have played this before, you should get this just for old times sake (i did).

If you havent, this one is piece of gaming history, which was nicely "refined" to avoid eye damage (if you are one of those who have never experienced the joy of fitting drivers into 640k of memory.. and arent into "modern indie retro"), with (nice) jap voiceover and so on... if you are into genre, there is no excuse for not buying this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041500335', 'num_games_owned': 504, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 615, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 538, 'last_played': 1680464493}
review:
Finally got into it after trying 3 times with old DOS version and bumping off. A hint: you can expect 10-year-old to go beat the mosters with a club and survive.Especially if she is magic-user by birth.
So go check the FAQ quickly first if you want some controlled dauther-grow experience.
Or just dive-in if you like trial and error way.

"Long live the queen" seems similar, but it  really a roguelike one-way semblance of Pricess Maker. This one can is more steady multi-way development and you can just go with the flow most of the time if you like. Thumbs up and waiting for PM3 and 4 translations.

author: {'steamid': '76561198086359498', 'num_games_owned': 494, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 73, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 73, 'last_played': 1475578798}
review:
本来是来怀旧养女儿来得
但是一进游戏这个重置版把BGM也重置了
瞬间一股乡村撒马特重金属的BGM就扑面而来
还有次时代的语音
以及每次存档都让我出戏笑出声的女神头像
神TMD这是女神哈哈哈哈哈哈卧槽这也重置的太喜感了
直播的时候差点笑岔气
发现能换回以前的BGM以及关闭语音时我立刻就给关了
总体来说是为了信仰，但为何不把美少女五搬上来
美少女四也好啊，国内美少女四是巅峰之作啊！
总之，重置不如不重置我还是想看像素的图片
为了信仰这钱我花了！

author: {'steamid': '76561198108869870', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 764, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 755, 'last_played': 1475753133}
review:
추억의 프린세스 메이커를 스팀에서 만나볼 수 있게 돼서 반갑습니다.
전반적으로 번역이 잘 되어 있으나, 몇 군데 문장이 빠져있다거나 (요정의 샘 이벤트 이후 1년 뒤 찾아온 요정의 한 마디 누락)
엔딩 씬에서 딸이 아버지를 평가하는 부분이 자막 처리가 되어 있지 않습니다.
일본어 더빙 버전은 처음 즐겨보는데 신선하고 좋네요.
가장 아쉬운 점은 기존 버전들과 마찬가지로 앨범 기능이 없다는 것입니다.
그리고 세이브 슬롯이 10개 뿐이고요.
엔딩 CG 모아볼 수 있는 앨범이나 세이브 슬롯 정도는 추가하면 좋았을 텐데..

author: {'steamid': '76561198007994237', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 707, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 680, 'last_played': 1477052436}
review:
First of all,i want to thank the developers for having the guts to bring and localise the Princess maker series offiically to English in this day and age where this type of games wouldn't be popular at all. 

Now,i have not finished the game yet but i'll put up an first impression of the game.

Pros
+Princess Makers in english officially
+High character resolution
+great gameplay
+translation is decent
+Classic game

Cons
-No customizable Resolution for both window and fullscreen
-some bugs
-Price tag does seem to a bit too high

So in overall,if you're into very old classic games and you like simulation games, you might like this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198137426576', 'num_games_owned': 1283, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 2525, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 553, 'last_played': 1499842425}
review: As it stands, this release is a little rough in translation, a little buggy, and yes, they did miss what, in the dos version would have been the daughter's letter translation at the end, but given that your daughter's guardian has the game critical text for the endings, it's a loss of flavor, seeing how your kid turned out in her own words, over a game breaking miss, now I've played a lot of badly done english translations done by the japanese company, this is not among them, it's understandable, in some ways it's arguably clearer than the cleaner dead softegg attempt, and the company so far seems to have lent the english community an ear, if you loved the dos version or the inspired games such as long live the queen, and you can handle a little bit of translation awkwardness, I'd say go for it, if the bugs worry you or you're hoping for a finer translation, then give them time to act on the feedback they're getting, but don't write this release off on those alone...as it stands, I'm more disappointed this didn't release together with pm 1 refine than I am in the quality, just remember, every princess maker game is planned for a steam release, but whether or not we see them in english, that's on us to support just as much as it is for them to make it

author: {'steamid': '76561198033920708', 'num_games_owned': 185, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 3294, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1518, 'last_played': 1688545043}
review:
EDIT: Princess Maker 2 launched long before it was ready to be seen by the public. That said, the company has continued to work on the game, and many of the breaking bugs that prevented me from enjoying it have been fixed. If you can't get yourself a copy of the original english game, this one is still very enjoyable. You can easily sink 100 hours into it trying to unlock all the endings.
-------
I am an old fan of this game, and played it to death years and years ago when only a leaked, unfinished english translation was available. When I heard it was going to get an official english release, I was ecstatic, and purchased it on the first day.

Unfortunately, I can not recommend the game for purchase in its current state. There are several serious bugs that heavily impact my enjoyment, the translation is /terrible/, and the entire ending sequence seems to have been missed. How do you miss translating the ending? I do not know. Someone dropped the ball very hard, here.

Most noteworthy bugs:
1) changing your equipment resets your faith stat to 0 ** they fixed this today in a patch **
2) During duels, even if you win, the text will tell you that you lost
3) the ending sequence of the game is completely untranslated **fixed in a patch**
4) Steam achievements are completely broken.

If you're interested in playing, track dow nthe old DOS version of the game. Honestly, the leaked, incomplete version was better. If a patch is released, I'll update my review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198213329076', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 1681, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1269, 'last_played': 1590329347}
review:
하하...
어떤상황에서인지 모르겠지만 신앙심이 0으로 초기화 되는 버그와
성품이 미친듯이 치솟는 버그가 있습니다.
솔직히 이거 가격 보시면 팬심으로 사는거나 다름없는데
버그까지 있고...
몇몇 도전과제 또한 조건을 만족 했음에도 불구하고 첫주차에 바로 달성이 되지 않습니다.
2주차 도니까 그제서야 달성이 되더군요.

특히 성품이 치솟는 버그는 치명적인데 성품이 올라가면 가사평가가 같이 올라가기 때문에
자기가 원하는 엔딩 보는 건 사실상 어렵습니다.
어서 고쳐 주시길...


게임진행에 치명적인 문제가 있는데
왜 이렇게 평가가 좋은지 모르겠내요.
구매하실 분들은 버그 픽스 된 것 확인하고 구매하세요.

author: {'steamid': '76561198125194498', 'num_games_owned': 127, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1606, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 959, 'last_played': 1483547608}

author: {'steamid': '76561198102162371', 'num_games_owned': 332, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 391, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 270, 'last_played': 1652604061}
review:
Compared to the old version, it runs smoother and looks nicer. Runs in fullscreen (which the screenshots don't show, it works with widescreen resolutions and looks good)
However, the translation isn't as good.
The big difference though is that this version is uncensored, there's nudity where there wasn't in the old one. 
The game is almost perfect for kids, and the updates are mostly making the game better for that. The nudity and sexual comments and innuendo being more direct now, take away all that.
Hopefully when the other games in the series get translated they're more kid friendly. As if it wasn't for the gross 'fanservice' they'd be the perfect game for kids. 
Beyond localisation there seemed to be only a couple minor bugs and some achievements not being counted. But nothing gamebreaking.

Past comparisons, PM2 is a fun game. Time management with a good story and a fun RPG minigame, where you can strike down the God of War. While theoretically you're playing an offscreen adoptive parent, really you're playing a demigod girl sent to live among the mortals and managing your education till the age of 18 when you find out how things turn out.
It's a bit old fashioned in its morals. Marriage and child raising are held above career achievements in measuring success. But thats a small thing, its a game where you can rise to being anything from the Queen, mercenary wizard to the ruler of hell. You can marry a Dragon too, oh also a Prince.

author: {'steamid': '76561198091181070', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 941, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 593, 'last_played': 1565549253}
review:
Just played my first playthrough. I must say... I really enjoyed it! I've never experienced this type of game before so it felt a bit strange. I would recommend this game to anyone that doesn't mind the old style anime appeal and a text based adventure that you play a part in. My ony major complaint is that at the end of teh game, the Daughter says how she felt in Japanese with no translation! I even used a translation app to try and get the gist of what she was talking about, but it couldn't hear her clear enough. Also, I'm not sure if this is a glitch or whatever, but my Daughter, kept failing doing the Inn job, even though I spammed it until I reached max cooking. As everyone mentions, the translation can be bad, but I haven't found it to be distracting at all. But in spite of the downsides, I really loved this game! The girl, seeing her age from 10 to 18 really pulls at your heartstrings and makes you feel like you bonded and raised this (hopefully) great girl thats now a woman. I felt proud knowing that my little girl turned into a noble soldier.

So in short:
Pros
Fantastic music
Engaging classic RPG fighting/adventure
Many Endings
Diverse ways to play
Truly endearing
Pacing feels great (8 years to see things unfold)

Cons:
Certain Stats feel a less useful (ie temperment)
Translation (Average player shouldn't be too annoyed)
Daughter's Life Summary words not subtitled (God this is the worst! Please fix)

Wishes:
More clothing would have been awsome. /thnking about all the playthroughs I could do, seeing the few thats present is kind of dissappointing. The could even have the same stats as clothing already present.Think of them as "alternative" outfits.
An "Ending Vault" so that I can view the Daughter's Life Summary after I unlock it. This would be cool, as the player would feel like even like their Daughter is gone but not forgotten.
The other Princess Makers! I saw that Princess Maker 5 was created in Japan. I'm thankful for this one we have, but I would expect Princess Maker 5 to be even more incredible. I would even be happy if we got 3 and 4 first within quick succession.

I hope my horrible review helps someone decide if this game is worth their time. If you enjoy life simulation, I think this "schedule" style simulation is a good approach. It really makes you feel like you're raising a Daughter in an anime styled world. I imagine the playthroughs feel uniquely different as you don't have time to make some "god" character. Can't wait for tomorrow since I will be making my second Daughter! 

If the Developer's see this review. Please fix that subtitle problem! I felt so disconennected from my Daughter at that time. It was almost sadder then knowing she has grown up and left her Father...

5 Stars *****

author: {'steamid': '76561198032044525', 'num_games_owned': 228, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 686, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 639, 'last_played': 1475464505}
review:
[h1]Princess Maker 2 combines three of my favorite things: pet-raising simulators, dozens of endings, and playing matchmaker.[/h1]

Unlike a Tamagotchi, your daughter (probably) isn't going to end up dead in a room full of nothing but poop. I can't confirm since I haven't gotten all 70ish endings, but she's a lot more likely to grow up to be the queen of all poops. Or a dancer, which might be worse--I didn't spend [i]eight years[/i] and tens of thousands of gold on a top-notch education just for you to become a [i]dancer,[/i] sweetie.

Now you, too, have the opportunity to probably be a terrible parent without risking permanent damage to your delicate lady parts or 18 years' worth of child support payments. In real life, careless parenting is pretty much limited to leaving your child unattended for hours in the nearest Walmart. In Princess Maker 2, your precious daughter can literally marry Satan when she grows up. Next time, don't let her work at the cabaret and partake in underage drinking, Dad.

You're (probably) not going to hell after playing this game, despite the old DOS version’s greatly exaggerated reputation. And if you do, at least you have a shot at marrying the supreme ruler of Hell--if your poorly raised daughter hasn't married him first. The only thing removed from the original game is the cheat/debug mode, so you have to actually raise your child and force her to work or explore and fight in the RPG sections if you want a steady supply of cash.

As I pushed my daughter to the brink of exhaustion and forced her to work on the farm for weeks at a time, I realized I didn’t care enough about her dreams and feelings. I cared about [i]results[/i]: getting her the best marriage partner, raising her to be the strongest combatant in the realm…okay, and the actual game achievements. Right now, some of them are kind of buggy, but they’re all legitimately attainable. I assume they’ll be fixed in a later patch.

As others have mentioned, the current translation is a bit rough around the edges and your daughter’s speech at the end of the game desperately needs subtitles—unless you’re fluent in Japanese. I am glad for the added voice acting, though it can get repetitive after a while. Setting the text to instant (or “Without wait,” as the odd translation puts it) helps a lot if you’re speeding through to get different achievements and endings. It’s a shame the Steam overlay doesn’t work, but it might be unavoidable considering the age of the game.

Despite the minor issues I have with PM2, I’d love to see Princess Makers 3-5 on Steam someday, so I can continue to accidentally torment my innocent blank slate of a child as I try to shape her into what I failed to become in my own life. But as [strike]I[/strike] they say, it's never too late to become a queen of darkness.

author: {'steamid': '76561198135706937', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 16584, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4589, 'last_played': 1682249214}

review:
（10月4日追記）
以下のレビューに書いたバグは10月4日に修正されました。
対応は早いと思います。


（10月2日記入文）
まだバグが残っている。

「鉄の長剣」「投げ焙烙」「人魚の涙」を雑貨屋で売ると
信仰が０になってしまうバグが深刻。バグの発生がわかるまで、
意味不明のパラメータ減少にけっこう困らされた。

（追記）
　どうやらアイテムの増減があると、信仰が０になるらしい。
　ならない場合もあるのだが、けっこうな頻度で発生する。

いったんバグ修正の精度や速さを見てから購入を決めても遅くないかもしれない。
GAINAX版からの大幅な修正はないので、かつて遊んだ人でも昔の感覚で遊べる。

author: {'steamid': '76561197998059793', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 5166, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1538, 'last_played': 1697670744}
review:
Good and fun game, lots and lots of option to raise/customize the kid.
[strike]Sadly, as this day ( 02 October 2016 ) the game also suffer from four problems : 
. first, the game is riddled with translation mistake. being told you lost when you won makes no sense.
. second, the steam achievement are or the most part broken, either by being unobtainable or by being obtained when they're not supposed to be obtained
. third, there are numerous bug and here and there in the game, the most annoying being that your "Faith" Stats is reseted to ZERO once you stock too many item.
. Fourth, they somehow forgot to add subtitle to the ending who's voiced.

Not recommanded in its current buggy state, will change the review once it's fixed ( assuming it is, which I hope )[/strike]

EDIT on 12 October 2016 :
The game got patched twice since the original review and many problems were fixed : 
Achievement are now fix'd, the faith bug is no more and the endings are now properly subtitled
The translation still has a few weird thing here and there, but it's playable with no problem and as fun as the original.

author: {'steamid': '76561197992893979', 'num_games_owned': 931, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 290, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 290, 'last_played': 1475860672}
review:
[한글 자막 + 일어 음성]


게임은 기존에 판매되고 있던 리파인 판과 차이점이 없는 듯


게임 창에서 따로 스팀 오버레이가 따로 활성화 되지 않아,
다른 사람과 채팅을 하고 싶으면 낮은 해상도의 창모드로 눈깔이 빠져가면서 게임을 해야 한다.
(창모드, 전체 화면 모드만 지원. 창모드에서 따로 모서리 잡아당기기를 이용한 확대는 지원되지 않는다.)

위의 이유로 스팀에 스크린샷도 찍어 올릴 수 없다.


도전과제 클리어가 너무 쉬운 것들만 모여 있다.
볼 수 있는 엔딩마다 전부 도전과제가 달려 있었다면, 도전과제 클리어를 목표로 여러번 재미있게 도전했을 듯


말은 이렇게 했지만, 추억 보정으로 추천을 누름.
(참고로 이건 DOS 판이 아닌 리파인 판이라서, 일명 dd라고 불리는 파일은 없다.)

author: {'steamid': '76561198314373041', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 17, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1487332041}
review:
个人认为2里面的女儿是最美的！

说老实话，我并不想推荐这个游戏的，因为登录STEAM的PM2和N年前的REFINE没有任何区别，没有高分辨率，没有16:9，没有新内容。

买这个游戏，还会选择推荐的人只有一个理由，情怀！！

但想想PM2作为美少女梦工场中游戏性最高的一部作品，我还是狠心选了推荐，我不期待能有什么新内容，但至少希望后续CFK至少给这个经典提供几个高分辨率窗口的选择，2K甚至4K屏幕下的那个小窗口完全是无法正常游戏的啊！

author: {'steamid': '76561198116943011', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 2530, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1410, 'last_played': 1509105966}
review: これを名作と言わずなんと言おうか。プリンセスメーカーシリーズの中でも完成度が高く人気のある２がついにSteam配信と聞き購入しましたがやはり名作はいつの時代でも名作、そのクオリティーは変わらず現世にとどまり続けています。ボイスやグラフィックはPC版を元に手を加えていますので夏のバカンスなんかは〈アレ〉です、やった！　とりあえず色っぽい娘を目指したら花嫁修業になりましたが二人目を育てようとするとオープニングが入るのがじれったいですね、飛ばせるようにしたかった。あと表示速度をウエイト無しにすればバイトなどが手早く済むのですが右クリックでそれができればというところ。まぁ面白いことには違いないので是非買ってプレイしていただきたい。

author: {'steamid': '76561198114520785', 'num_games_owned': 2577, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 3724, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1076, 'last_played': 1481387288}
review:
第一时间入的游戏。虽然是20多年前的游戏了，我依然记得我当时打出的第一个结局就是女战士，然后嫁给了老龙的儿子。毕竟看上去农场收益最高，探险武力高点安全啊。当时觉得养个女儿真爽，吃穿啥的女儿自己都会赚来的，年纪大点还一天到晚有人送钱。等现在自己真有女儿了才发现这花钱还不是一般般的快啊。按照游戏中的物价水平（一本书120元，勇者大人，您年薪500元估计买不起一套十万个为什么吧？）勇者没饿死真是奇迹。

    话说这类游戏中，PM2绝对是独一无二的。且不说当时国内的山寨游戏：皇后 的素质完全比不上PM2，就连他自身的续作也都比不上这作。所以玩PM2不仅仅是情怀，而是一种不可替代。

这个游戏的优点，不用我再说了，还是提几个缺点吧：
1、存档位问题：90年代你为了节约空间，只放10个存档位我认了。但是现在你还那么小气有点说不过去。
2、STEAM自带的截图功能似乎用不了，不知道有谁成功的？
3、游戏音乐显然没有重制作，音质有点赶不上时代了。
4、似乎缺少一个CG回观看的功能。



[spoiler][b]PS：看到某个朋友提到的本游戏的一个缺点是：
1. 文字用語不符合繁體中文習慣(Traditional Chinese text does not meet the language habits)
我觉得很欣慰！！看到你不爽我就开心了。
如果你能有理有利有节的说服我，请看我昵称。[/b][/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198062889566', 'num_games_owned': 1143, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 19519, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 183, 'last_played': 1604862445}
review:
Alright so, this port isn't quite as good as the original DOS version. The graphics while better aren't as charming, the music is a bit buggy and the translation has weird moments ("Your daughter has been defeated by" being your victory screen for example) but at the same time, its just as fun as the original game. I wouldn't go as far and say the port is terrible, but take it as a warning. 

Now onto the actual game. Its great. You ever play Long Live The Queen? They're fairly similar games. The main difference being that Long Live The Queen being more focused on political and militaristic aspect of castle life, this game is more of a general life simulator set in a castle. You can do so much with raising your daughter, its pretty insane how much content their is in that regard. You can train her to be a soldier, a priestess, a teacher, a dancer, a singer, an artist, a witch, any blend of those and so much more. The game has over 40 endings too!

The game also has a combat system and dungeon exploration if you chose a more offensive route. They're extremely simple, but they get the job done and are pretty rewarding. I do wish the dungeon exploration had more to it, but its still fun for what it is. On another note, the soundtrack of the game is pretty underrated. While its not the best, the tunes in the game are very relaxing and make me feel at ease. 

This game isn't without its flaws however. My biggest gripe is that your daughter can get extremely overpowered relatively early in the game. I'm only in Year 2 (out of 8) and I'm already one-shotting dragons and winning the Harvest Festival. I think they did it to try to make your daughter proficient at several task at once but its still a bit wonky. The game can also get weird sometimes. You can feed her breast-expanding pills as early as Year 1 and one of the endings involves you marrying your daughter. Weird stuff..

Overall, a great life simulation game. Probably my favorite, even better than Long Live The Queen in my book.

author: {'steamid': '76561198333732972', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 718, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 718, 'last_played': 1475314203}
review:
어떤 조건에서 신앙심 0으로 리셋되는 버그, 성품 100씩 자꾸 치솟는 버그 좀 어떻게 해주세욬ㅋㅋㅋㅋ 
(제 경우는 딸의 생일에 선물을 주거나 플레이어 생일에 선물을 받았을 때, 
잡화점에서 물건을 사고팔 때 등에 발생했습니다) 
공략을 제대로 할 수가 없잖아요... 
지난 추억 생각하면서 즐겁게 구매했다가 기존판에도 없었던 버그가 판을 치는 바람에 
시간만 낭비했습니다.  자잘하지만 상점에 물건 되팔 때 0원이 되는 버그도 있더군요... 
버그픽스가 되기 전까진 플레이하지 않고 주변에도 구매를 권유하지 않을 생각입니다.
버그가 애교 수준이어야지 지금은 플레이에 심각하게 지장을 주고 있습니다...

author: {'steamid': '76561198084093231', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1838, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1695, 'last_played': 1476021282}
review:
처음 시작부터 한글 이름 입력 버그가 있고, (문자 깨짐 및 여러 번 입력하면 아예 넘어가지 않음)

작명이 최대 4자라니 이게 무슨 소리요?? 한글을 눌러야 8자까지 지원되는 걸 확인했는데
거기선 영어도 숫자도 적용이 안 됨... 이름은 또 쓸데없이 전각문자고.

엔터를 눌러서 창을 닫으면 뒤에 P 글자 같은 이상한 것이 붙어서
지우고 다시 찍어 줘야 제대로 나온다. 그것도 몇 번 반복해야 되는 경우가 있다.


키보드 입력도 방향키 말곤 전혀 지원되지 않고,
이벤트 스킵이 잘 되지 않음. 음성을 꺼야 그나마 동작한다.

매 번 시작할 때마다 영상을 주구장창 봐야 됨...

껐다가 다시 켜면 텍스트 표시 속도와 전체화면 매 번 재설정해야 하는 것도 은근 거슬리고,
도중에 새로 시작할 때 항상 끄고 다시 시작해야 한다. 이 뭐...


한글 텍스트가 긴 경우, 스크롤이 아예 안 되는 상태로 나와서
식비 방침 다이어트 같은 건 대사 전체가 보이지도 않는다. 뒷 부분만 나온다.

도전과제가 제대로 적용되지 않아서 11세가 되었는데 완료가 안 찍혔다.


그리고, 가장 중요한 갤러리 기능이 없다.


요새 게임으로 나오기에는 좀 뭐시기한 감이 있다.
이 정도 가격이면 어느정도 편의성이랑 버그는 잡고 나와야 되는거 아닌가.

시작한 지 한 시간도 안 되서 푸념글 쓰고 있는 거 보니 너무 기대치가 높았나보다.
게다가 조금씩 진행할 때마다 발견한 문제 수가 점점 늘어만 간다...

author: {'steamid': '76561198108090276', 'num_games_owned': 153, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 9541, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 985, 'last_played': 1556825243}
review:
扣除回憶不推薦購買，原因如下(Not recommended)
1. 文字用語不符合繁體中文習慣(Traditional Chinese text does not meet the language habits)
2. 部份文字出現"？？"的字型不對應(Some text appears "??" The font does not correspond)
3. 程式執行和顯示效率很低，不是針對現在的系統重新編寫，也很容易當機(Game execution and display efficiency is very very low, not for the current system re-write, it is easy to crash)
4. MIDI只有GM，不支援MT-32(MIDI only GM map, does not support MT-32. yes I have it)

16년 10월 4일자 수정

드디어 클리어해보고 다시 평가 답니다. 일단 버그가 좀 있습니다. 스크린샷이 찍히지 않는것도 거슬리지만 특히 딸의 일부 스탯이 초기화 되는 버그가 발생합니다. 특정 엔딩을 볼 수가 없다는 말입니다.... 빨리 수정버전이 올라왔으면 좋겠네요. 그리고 버그는 아니지만 일부 자막이 안나오네요 -_-  제가 서술한 단점때문에 강추급은 아니지만 추억의 젖어서 겜하는데에는 부족함이 없었습니다. 후 딸이 용사가 된 후 떠돌아 버리는 엔딩을 보게 되어 현타오네요. 그래도 추억을 잘 마무리 한 것 같습니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119283014', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 525, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 171, 'last_played': 1546195829}
review:
I was very excited to play this game after I had played the beta version of it many years ago. I hope they translate more princess maker games in the future. It's exactly how I remember it , while changinag a few minor things. It was fun to play. 

The only con I have is at the end of the game. In the beta there was a letter of your daughter writing to you of how you did.  And there is a letter that is voiced to you...in japanese. The problem? I don't speak japanese. If I could I would have gotten all of the princess maker games already. I really hope they go back to the letter format.

(edit)
So I checked out the new translations of the daughter's letter to you, and it can definetley use some refinement. Please keep trying!

author: {'steamid': '76561198140766401', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1618, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1707016631}
review:
The game of my generation!

I encountered this game when I was 9 at my friend's house, who are not very close to me, but the game was just mind blowing so I never wanted to home. 

PrincessMaker3 was the first game I ever purchased with my own money, and I was playing it on daily basis.

21century, the era of internet started and first thing i searched from internet was to get Princess Maker 2, the game of my generation.

me and my friends were so crazy about this game, we were only talking with lines of the game.

I have been playing this game regularly till now. ( I am in my 30's and a mother of a child)

I have laptop with window XP operating system only to play Princess Maker.

I purchased this game to just to show support and love to princess maker so producers will know this game still sells and might continue making the series..

EVERYONE in this universe should play this game to really understand life.

this is the best game of my generations and had huge impact on our generation's mentality.

review: 돈 받고 팔려면 버그라도 없게 만들어야지. 왜 원작에는 없는 버그까지 묻은 게임을 치킨 한 마리 값에 파는건데. 도전과제만 올 클리어하고 접고 싶은데 버그 때문에 사냥꾼 아르바이트 도전과제 클리어가 안된다.  하루도 실패 안하고 다 성공인데 왜 클리어가 안되는거야

author: {'steamid': '76561198041915688', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 439, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 182, 'last_played': 1543966703}
review:
One of the best life simulators I ever played. If you like these type of games this is the best experience you'll ever have. With simple, yet deep gameplay the game has 74 possible endings, making the replayability of this game HUGE even more for the price you're going to pay. Princess Maker 2 Refine is a remaster of the original game released for MS-DOS, which at least IMO is the best game to start with the franchise. I really recommend buying this game.

By the way, don't worry about Princess Maker 1. Each game of the franchise has it's own universe.
The game is originally developed by Gainax, You can't go wrong by buying this piece of art.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017433681', 'num_games_owned': 634, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 2486, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 558, 'last_played': 1673964832}
review:
tl;dr - Far inferior to the unreleased DOS version.  I can only justify buying this to send a message that the west wants these games.  It's up to you to decide if you want to spend $20 on a worse version of a game from 1993 - along with my hesitant recommendation, I recommend reading into the history of SoftEgg's attempt at bringing the game to the US if you're on the fence.  I may not know how tl;dr works.

Like most of the other reviewers, I played the DOS version of this game a TON when I was growing up.  I consider the story behind that version's failed release to be one of the greatest disappointments in video game history - look into it, if you feel so inclined.  Had the release succeeded, we may well have seen official English releases for many more Gainax titles.  Titles I have never played, and would sorely like to.  The fact that this is actually getting an official release in western markets now, so long after the fact, is surprising.  However, there is one thing that is preventing me from fully embacing this release: the translation.

As others have noted, the translation is vastly inferior to the unreleased DOS version.  The opening text crawl, which you can see on the Store page, has some amazing Engrish (to be fair, nothing else in the game quite reaches that level).  There are grammatical and spelling errors abound, and in a game that is largely text based it's pretty annoying.  In addition, certain stats and skills now have names that don't really make sense.  Charisma has become Glamour, Refinement has become Elegance, and neither of those are really troubling.  But in a game where the religious symbolism is extremely western (crosses and nuns), why has "Sin" become "Karma?"  It doesn't even make any sense.  You actually GAIN karma for doing sinful things, and if I hadn't made the connection to the DOS version, I may have thought that was a good thing.  Also, and this is admittedly a minor point, Conversation is now "Speech."  The skill is basically tracking your daughter's ability to engage in witty conversation with people, so Conversation is far more appropriate.  Speech sounds more like she's learning to speak properly... yet, the only way to increase it is by working at the Bar, and proper speech is actually governed by Decorum.  It's silly.

It makes me sad that such an inferior version of the translation has seen a release that the DOS version never did.  I yearn for the days of the original's nostalgic, pixelized art, though I'm willing to accept that that's more about my own nostalgia - the art isn't really bad.  I think some of the art has altered your daughter's poses as she grows, but that may have something to do with blood type, and I've only played one game, so I can't definitively state that's the case.

Also, another minor point (not so minor?) - going full screen stretches the game's aspect ratio rather than retaining it via a border or something.  It looks terrible, so play windowed.  And why did my daughter stare lovingly at me and speak Japanese to me for 90 seconds upon completion of the game?  There was no text in that segment, which if I recall from the DOS version, was a letter your daughter wrote to you thanking you for all you've done for her.

Honestly, I'm not sure if I want to recommend this.  The unofficial DOS version is better in just about every way.  I don't condone piracy at all, but it's hard to justify paying $20 for an inferior version of a game from the early 90s.  I haven't looked into what the community is doing with this release - if smarter people than I are going to find a way to crack and fix this game, then buy it.  I bought it solely because I want to send a message to the Japanese makers of games like these that there is a market for them in the west.  They're fantastic and I want them.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011427361', 'num_games_owned': 395, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 383, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 383, 'last_played': 1475203617}
review:
Neon Genesis Evangelion
Panty and Stocking
Gurren Lagann
Princess Maker 2

What do these have in common? Gainax...let that sink in for a moment. Gainax that made alot of really weird anime made a game or two that wasn't weird! It's a life simulation game where you beat Satan who does God's dirty work and be rewarded by having the roman/greek gods give you a naked 8 year old girl to immediately begin working to earn more money then you do a year, become anything from a legendary hero like you, to a queen, to a harlot, or even deciding to let daddy marry her cause he took really good 'care' of her.

Cringe as you can be an asshole and agree to sell her out for arranged marriages, give her breast enlargement drugs, put out for demons, and don't buy her any birthday presents while your demon butler complains about you being cheap to what is meant to be like a girl jesus until she turns 18 and becomes one of many flavors of horrible person. And the worst you'll get is gods complaining about you, or getting her raped/killed.

Huh...ya know, Gainax having their hands on this at all makes too much sense now...
OH and for anyone wondering, cheat codes are gone.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041201967', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 890, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 839, 'last_played': 1475483468}
review:
Great game, and the remake adds some good things. Voice acting was a nice bonus, although I did end up skipping through it later in the game when going through repeating dialogue. I liked the new graphics, but there's a good amount of people who prefer the old DOS graphics of the original. 

This release had some problems, though, like the daughter's head being replaced by the "Summer" desert picture when changing outfits once. Fortunately it fixed itself after a scene change, but it's just one of a few little bugs that pop up every now and then. The translation outside of the Stats is pretty solid, so if people were afraid of Engrish, it's not there. The only real thing I'll complain about is the naming of Stats since some of them are a bit confusing, like Karma.

author: {'steamid': '76561198239534934', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 828, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 388, 'last_played': 1477052694}
review:
23 years and this game is still holds up!

This game was originally a DOS game, the refined edition was made to be compatible with windows... and it's playable in a "window"!

My daughter spent her youth in a farm, her teen years working as a short order chef and the last year of her life reading poetry and yet somehow she ended up as a professional dancer... WHERE DID I GO WRONG!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198078480376', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 76, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 76, 'last_played': 1476024059}
review:
개인적으로는 구 명작의 그림체가 더 좋지만 이번의 부드러워진 그림체도 괜찮다고 생각합니다.
비싸다면 비싸다고 느껴질 수 있지만, 추억의 가격으로는 크게 부담 없다고 개인적으로는 생각 되네요.
단, 이번에 다시 리메이크 되어 나올때에는 3이상의 시리즈에 있는 엔딩, 바캉스 등 여러 그림을 저장할 수 있는 엘범기능을 제일 기대했는데, 그 기능이 없는게 많이 아쉽습니다.
아무튼, 개인적으로 프린세스 메이커를 인생게임으로 생각하는 사람으로써 가끔 재밌게 추억 생각하며 할만하다고 봅니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198136665644', 'num_games_owned': 1110, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 711, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 336, 'last_played': 1576077892}
review: 很令人懷念的一款遊戲，可是目前問題還很多，比如說成就明明就達到了卻沒有解鎖。 最明顯的例子就是年紀到了，年紀成就卻沒解除... 大神官也拜訪了，大神官拜訪成就也沒解除。還有翻譯很多錯，「搬獎儀式」跟高階禮儀課程升級到專家課程時，顯示成中階課程。其他有些太過煽情的元素被拿掉就不說了。我在推薦這款遊戲時，其實還蠻猶豫是否要按是。希望這些問題在將來能看到有所改善。

author: {'steamid': '76561198293227992', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 245, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1475845905}
review:
旧作プレイヤーは、音声OFFの方がしっくりくるかも知れない。
PC98時代に遊んでたのですが、今やっても楽しいゲームでした。
ちょっと懐かしいかも。ほぼ完全移植と言って差し支えないと思います。
旧来のいわゆるFM音源26や73、86音源でのBGMとではちょっと異なりますが、WAVE(PCM)音源での雰囲気は壊れてません。
再生するまでに一呼吸ぐらいある感じですけど、まあ許容範囲でしょう。
MIDI音源出力にも対応しているみたいなので、もう20年近くホコリを被ってるRoland GSでも繋いでみようかなあと。

全画面表示でも全体に拡大されるわけではないので、ウィンドウ画面でプレイした方がいいのかな？
SVGAなど、少し解像度の粗い旧来的なモニターがあれば、それに映した方が綺麗に見えるかも。

1600円前後という値段も、手軽かと思います。
フルプライスの6000円超えとかだったら、ちょっと躊躇うかも知れませんが。

author: {'steamid': '76561197979322316', 'num_games_owned': 769, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27, 'last_played': 1656744412}
review:
If you're familiar with the old never-completed English beta, this is an official release of a later Windows-compatible remake. It has somewhat improved art and music that is... well, it's not actually WORSE than the original. The game itself, however, is as wonderful as ever and is a great life simulation. There are some possibly-creepy bits - given one can marry your adopted daughter or have her take over as the new Lord of Hell - but these are the bad endings that ought to be avoided unless you are a completionist; otherwise, well, how would you know you were a good parent without the possibility to mess up?

The translation isn't quite as refined as the old beta and has several typos, but is generally easier to understand what is going on.

review:
전체적으로 2% 아쉬운 게임.

1. 오버레이, 세이브 클라우드 왜 지원 안 하는가? 최소한 오버레이는 기본이 아닌가? 스샷조차 찍으려면 다른 방법을 모색해야 했다.
2. 스팀판이면 좀 추가해주지... 게임 그대로 들고온 것 같다. 해상도 확장이나 앨범정도는 추가하지...

...불만만 토한 것 같지만, 게임 자체는 괜찮기에 추천을 눌렀다. 다만, 너무 날로 먹는 거 아니냐? 싶을 정도로 스팀 기본적인 기능조차 지원하지 않는 것이 너무 아쉽다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198170068583', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 576, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 358, 'last_played': 1490102188}
review:
Finalmente! Una joya de PC-98/DOS al fin disponible en Steam!

Princess Maker 2 es la segunda entrega de la serie del mismo nombre desarrollada por GAINAX (Sí, oyeron bien, los mismos de Neon Genesis Evangelion, Kare Kano, y FLCL, entre otros títulos). En este caso es la versión Refine, relanzada con Gráficos Mejorados, y con Voces en el Japonés original para todos los personajes (salvo tu personaje por obvias razones). La trama del juego es la siguiente: luego de haberte retirado al salvar un reino de un Lord Demonio, recibes poco después un regalo del cielo: una hija! Así que ahora tu nueva misión es cuidar, enseñar, y dirigir a tu hija al cabo de ocho años para que al final se convierta en una Princesa, pero tus acciones determinarán si ella se convertirá en Princesa, o en Guerrera, o en Granjera, o se casará con un noble, o con otra persona...mejor dicho: hay 74 (!!!) posibles finales. Y TODOS dependen de lo que tú hagas desde el día uno.

Los jugadores de más edad tal vez recordarán que este juego tuvo una primera traducción al Inglés para la versión de DOS, pero resultó estar muy incompleta y mal hecha (tipo mala traducción aficionada), pero no se preocupen, porque esta versión está completamente traducida al Inglés!

Para aquellos que les gusten los juegos de simulación, sin importar la edad, este juego se los recomiendo mucho! (Veré a ver cuántos finales saco, este juego da para MUCHO tiempo).

author: {'steamid': '76561198069992809', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 5878, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 595, 'last_played': 1604631207}
review: One of the very first PC games I've ever played. While I'm overjoyed that it's available on Steam, there are still some glitches which the developers should fix soon. Faith stat always reverts back to 0 no matter whether your daughter works in a church or takes theology classes. Instead earning more magic rep from accepting challenges, I get housekeeping rep instead.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007507742', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 305, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 256, 'last_played': 1475434099}
review:
I feel like I've waited all my life for this game to see an official English release.

The translation here is quite sketchy (the 1994 DOS vaporware version's translation was much better) and there are certainly other issues (see other reviews mentioning the letter at the end not having subtitles) but anyone who has ever wanted the Princess Maker series in English to pick this baby up. It's just as fun as ever and opens up the possibility of PM3 ~ 5 being translated. I could die happy with these games translated, even as roughly as done here.

No censorship, but there wasn't much to censor from the original Japan-only release of PM2 Refine in 2004. The art was toned down in the original Refine release. No Mad Eddy. Steam overlay doesn't work. Can't screenshot in Steam. There's a bug where Faith reduces to 0 when you sell things out of your inventory when your inventory is maxed.

Release isn't perfect but it works and it's better than nothing. Community has figured out how to edit the game's images day one, I'm sure a method to change the game's text is soon to follow.

[Update Sept 30 2016: CFK are reaching out in a thread in the forum to sniff out bugs and text issues based on player feedback. This is a lot more than I expected from them. Hopefully they fix this release's problems. I'll update this review when/if they do.]

author: {'steamid': '76561198139260685', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 268, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 221, 'last_played': 1488097219}
review:
★★★★☆    5점만점에 4점!

도스판에 비해서 그래픽이 둥글둥글해지고 딸래미가 덜 이쁜감이 있음 (기존 리파인버전과는 동일)
무신을 이기는 도전과제가 만나기만 하면 깨짐 (졌는데도 깨짐)
엔딩에서 딸래미 일러나오는 나레이션 자막이 안나옴 ( 일어 잘못하시면 구울체로 들림 아버지..감사..알바...싫다..)


딸래미 한번 키우는데 2시간 반 정도 드네요. 타입스킵 기능이 음슴 ㅠㅠ 
일러스트 수집하는 병에 걸렸는데 엔딩 60개에 매번 다른엔딩이 나온다는 보장도 없으니  [오열]
그래도 프린세스 메이커를 한다는 그 자체만으로도 참 좋음! 게임을 켜니 특유의 브금이 나오는데  
어릴때 학교 마치면 프메할거라고 바로 집에 뛰어가던 그 시절이 생각났음. 
유통사에서 모든 프메시리즈를 이식할거라고 하던데 빨리좀 내주면 좋겠네여  아빠말고 엄마가 되고싶다
5편 시디로 샀는데 왠일인지 안돌아가서 한번도 못함... 내돈...ㅠㅠ
